job title: ប្រធានការិយាល័យសវនកម្ម​
position: ប្រធានការិយាល័យសវនកម្ម​
Job Description:
•ធ្វើរបាយការណ៍ និងផែនការប្រចាំថ្ងៃ 
•ពិនិត្យរបាយការណ៍ប្រតិបត្តិការប្រចាំថ្ងៃ
•ពិនិត្យលំហូរសាច់ប្រាក់
•ពិនិត្យរបាយការណ៍ចំណាយ
•ពិនិត្យការរក្សាទុកឯកសារ
•ពិនិត្យរបាយការណ៍បិទបញ្ជី
•ពិនិត្យសកម្មភាពការងារបុគ្គលិក
•ចូលរួមប្រជុំប្រចាំខែ
•រាយការណ៍ប្រចាំថ្ងៃ
•អនុវត្តន៍ការងារផ្សេងៗតាមជាក់ស្តែង
Job Requirement:
- បញ្ចប់បរិញ្ញាប័ត្រ ផ្នែកច្បាប់ ឬ អនុបណ្ឌិតដែលពាក់ព័ន្ធនិងការងារខាងលើនេះ
- មានបទពិសោធន៍យ៉ាងតិចបំផុត៣-៥ ឆ្នាំពាក់ព័ន្ធ និងការងារខាងលើនេះ
- មានចំណេះដឹង computer Microsoft office, Excel & Internet, email
- មានចំណេះដឹង Quick Books, Peachtree and SAP កម្មវិធីគណនេយ្យផ្សេងៗទៀត
- មានភាពរុសរាយ រាកទាក់ និងម៉ឺងម៉ាត់ចំពោះការបំពេញការងារទៅតាមតួនាទី និងការទទួលខុសត្រូវ
- មានភាពស្មោះត្រង់ និងប្តេជ្ញាចិត្តខ្ពស់រាល់ភារកិច្ច និងតួនាទីរបស់ខ្លួន
- ប្រើភាសារអង់គ្លេសបាន និងចេះភាសាថៃ កាន់តែប្រសើរ

អត្ថប្រយោជន៍ទទួលបានៈបាន
- ផ្តល់ជួនប្រាក់បៀវត្សសមរម្យ                                                                      - ផ្តល់ជួនប្រាក់ភាគលាភប្រចាំឆ្នាំ
- វាយតម្លៃតំឡើងប្រាក់ខែជាប្រចាំឆ្នាំ
- ផ្តល់ជួនប្រាក់ឧបត្ថម្ភផ្សេងៗ
- ផ្តល់ជួនប័ណ្ណសមាជិកបេឡាជាតិ របបសន្ទិសុខសង្គម (ប.ស.ស)                   
- ទទួលការបណ្តុះបណ្តាលជំនាញបន្ថែមមុនពេលចូលបម្រើការងារ                     - មានឱកាសក្លាយផ្លាស់ប្តូរតំឡើងមុខតំណែង 
- ទទួលបានថ្លៃកាតទូរស័ព្ទ ថ្លៃសាំង និងថ្លៃទំនាក់ទំនងផ្សេងៗ                                - មានឱកាសក្លាយជាម្ចាស់ភាគហ៊ុន ។ 

បែបបទក្នុងការដាក់ពាក្យៈ
- សូមភ្ជាប់ជាមួយនូវ អត្តសញ្ញាណប័ណ្ណ ថតចម្លង សំបុត្រកំណើត   សៀវភៅគ្រួសារ ឬ សៀវភៅស្នាក់នៅ   រូបថត (៤x៦) ចំនួន២ សន្លឹក 
- សូមភ្ជាប់ជាមួយនូវ ប្រវត្តិរូបសង្ខេប (CV & Cover Letter)
- លិខិតបញ្ជាក់ពីការពិនិត្យស្វែងរកសារធាតុញៀន 
- លិខិតថ្កោលទោស
- លិខិតបញ្ជាក់ឥរិយាមាយាទពីអាជ្ញាធរមូលដ្ឋាន
- លិខិតបញ្ជាក់សុខភាពពីមន្ទីរពេទ្យ 
- កាតចាក់វ៉ាក់សាំង

job title: អនុប្រធានសាខា
position: អនុប្រធានសាខា
Contact Info: Contact Information Sophanny Vandy  066 55 66 69 / 070 806 669 prngroup.biz@gmail.com ការិយាល័យកណ្តាល ផ្ទះលេខ៤៤០ ផ្លូវ៤៨ ក្រុម១៥ ភូមិ១ សង្កាត់ស្មាច់មានជ័យ ក្រុងភូមិមិន្ន ខេត្តកោះកុង 066 55 66 69 / 070 806 669

Job Description:
•Conduct Collect data on consumers, competitors and market place and consolidate information into actionable items, and reports to management. 
•Knowledge on developing research proposal.
•Conduct surveys to discover prospective customers’ preferences
•Perform valid and reliable market research SWOT analysis
•Use online market research and catalogue findings to databases
•Perform competitive analysis on various companies’ market offerings, identify market trends, pricing/business models, sales and methods of operation
•Evaluate program methodology and key data to ensure that data on the releases are accurate and the angle of the release is correct. 
•Remain fully informed on market trends, other parties researches and implement best practices
•Other task assigned by management
Job Requirement:
•BS degree in Statistics, Marketing, Economics, Mathematics, Business, Management, Social Science or related fields.
•At least 1 year experience in marketing research (field research, data collection, analysis). 
•Interviewing skills and capacity to carry out research.
•High motivation, initiative, willing, and able to travel to field.
•Ability to interpret large amounts of data and to multi-task
•Strong communication and presentation skills
•Excellent knowledge of statistical packages (SPSS, SAS or similar), databases and MS Office
•Search engines, web analytics and business research tools acumen
•Adequate knowledge of data collection methods (polls, focus groups, surveys etc)
•Working knowledge of data warehousing, modeling and mining
•Ability to work independently and with others
•Be committed, result-oriented and willing to learn new skills
•Excellent in English
Company Profile:

- ម៉ាយក្រូហ្វាយនែន ភីអិលស៊ី
- ហាង បញ្ចាំ
- ក្រុមហ៊ុន មេគង្គអ៊ិនសូរេន
- មន្ទីរពហុព្យាបាល និង សម្ភពអរៀនដា

job title: ប្រធានផ្នែកទីផ្សារ និងការលក់
position: ប្រធានផ្នែកទីផ្សារ និងការលក់
Job Description:
-ចូលរួមប្រជុំសូត្រវប្បធម៌ក្រុមហ៊ុនរៀងរាល់ព្រឹកនិងសរសេរផែនការ ការងារប្រចាំថ្ងៃ។
-ធ្វើផែនការអនុវត្តន៍ការងារប្រចាំថ្ងៃដោយចាត់ទុកការងារណាមានអត្ថិភាពសំខាន់ធ្វើមុន និងឱ្យបានត្រឹមត្រូវទាន់ពេលវេលា 
-ផ្សព្វផ្សាយលក់អំពីផលិតផល សេវាកម្ម គោលការណ៍ ផែនការរដ្ឋបាល ដល់ដៃគូសហការ អតិថិជន និងកម្មករនិយោជិត 
-ធ្វើការវិភាគការងារកមិ្រតទំហំនៃការងាររាយការណ៍ជូនថ្នាក់ដឹកនាំ។
-សហការគាំទ្រតាមបណ្តាការិយាល័យនិងផ្នែកបច្ចេកទេសផ្សេងៗដើម្បី ជួយសំរួលឱ្យការងារមានភាពរលូន។
-គ្រប់គ្រងការថែទាំទុកដាក់ទ្រព្យសម្បត្តិបិទបើកទឹក-ភ្លើងរបស់ក្រុមហ៊ុនប្រកបដោយ ការសន្សំសំចៃ និងមានសណ្ដាប់ធ្នាប់ សុវត្ថិភាព ។
-រួមចំណែកដល់ការធ្វើផែនការនិងការអនុវត្ដន៍នៃការផ្លាស់ប្តូរនៅក្នុងការផ្តល់ សេវាដើម្បីបំពេញតាមតមូ្រវការរបស់អតិថិជន។
-ផ្ដល់បឹ្រក្សាដល់ថ្នាក់ដឹកនាំទៅលើវិធីសាស្រ្ដសមស្របទៅនឹងការ ទទួលស្គាល់នៃការប្រតិបត្តិការងារ 
-ទទួលការងារអនុវត្តតាមផែនការរដ្ឋបាលដែលមានលក្ខណៈចង្អុល បង្ហាញឱ្យប្រតិបត្តិការណ៍ប្រចាំថ្ងៃ 
-ធ្វើការពិនិត្យចំណាយដោយអនុលោមតាមការសម្រេចចិត្តរបស់គណៈកម្មាធិការប្រតិបត្តិ និងប្រធានក្រុមប្រឹក្សាភិបាល។
-បណ្តុះបណ្តាលនិងផ្ទេរជំនាញបច្ចេកទេសការងារជាក់ស្តែង ដែលធ្វើរាល់ថ្ងៃដល់ កម្មករនិយោជិតចាស់និងចូលបម្រើការងារថ្មី ។
-ជួយបុគ្គលិកលក់រាយរួមទាំងអ្នកគិតលុយតាមតំបន់អោយបានច្បាស់លាស់។
-បង្ហាញបុគ្គលិកថ្មីនិងចាស់ផ្តល់ការបណ្តុះការធ្វើការងារជាក្រុម
-អនុវត្តយុទ្ធសាស្រ្តប្រចាំតំបន់តាមកាលវិភាគប្រតិប័ត្រការលក់និងធ្វើតារាងតម្លៃលក់នឹងប្រម៉ូសិនផ្សេងៗទៅអោយក្រុមលក់តាមតំបន់និងធានាថាតម្លៃលក់ស្របតាមគោលការណ៏ត្រឹមត្រូវរបស់ក្រុមហ៊ុនពន្លឿនដំណោះស្រាយអតិថិជននិងបណ្តឹងតវ៉ាដើម្បីទទួលបានការពេញចិត្តជាអតិបរមា។
-ធានាថាការផ្សព្វផ្សាយមានភាពត្រឹមត្រូវ
Job Requirement:
- បញ្ចប់បរិញ្ញាប័ត្រ ផ្នែកទីផ្សារ និងការលក់ ឬបញ្ញាប័ត្រដែលពាក់ព័ន្ធនិងការងារខាងលើនេះ
- មានបទពិសោធន៍យ៉ាងតិចបំផុត៣-៥ ឆ្នាំពាក់ព័ន្ធ និងការងារខាងលើនេះ
- មានចំណេះដឹង Quick Books, Peachtree and SAP កម្មវិធីគណនេយ្យផ្សេងៗទៀត
- មានភាពរុសរាយ រាកទាក់ និងម៉ឺងម៉ាត់ចំពោះការបំពេញការងារទៅតាមតួនាទី និងការទទួលខុសត្រូវ
- មានភាពស្មោះត្រង់ និងប្តេជ្ញាចិត្តខ្ពស់រាល់ភារកិច្ច និងតួនាទីរបស់ខ្លួន
- ប្រើភាសារអង់គ្លេសបាន និងចេះភាសាថៃ កាន់តែប្រសើរ

អត្ថប្រយោជន៍ទទួលបានៈបាន
- ផ្តល់ជួនប្រាក់បៀវត្សសមរម្យ                                                                      - ផ្តល់ជួនប្រាក់ភាគលាភប្រចាំឆ្នាំ
- វាយតម្លៃតំឡើងប្រាក់ខែជាប្រចាំឆ្នាំ
- ផ្តល់ជួនប្រាក់ឧបត្ថម្ភផ្សេងៗ
- ផ្តល់ជួនប័ណ្ណសមាជិកបេឡាជាតិ របបសន្ទិសុខសង្គម (ប.ស.ស)                   
- ទទួលការបណ្តុះបណ្តាលជំនាញបន្ថែមមុនពេលចូលបម្រើការងារ                     - មានឱកាសក្លាយផ្លាស់ប្តូរតំឡើងមុខតំណែង 
- ទទួលបានថ្លៃកាតទូរស័ព្ទ ថ្លៃសាំង និងថ្លៃទំនាក់ទំនងផ្សេងៗ                                - មានឱកាសក្លាយជាម្ចាស់ភាគហ៊ុន ។ 

បែបបទក្នុងការដាក់ពាក្យៈ
- សូមភ្ជាប់ជាមួយនូវ អត្តសញ្ញាណប័ណ្ណ ថតចម្លង សំបុត្រកំណើត   សៀវភៅគ្រួសារ ឬ សៀវភៅស្នាក់នៅ   រូបថត (៤x៦) ចំនួន២ សន្លឹក 
- សូមភ្ជាប់ជាមួយនូវ ប្រវត្តិរូបសង្ខេប (CV & Cover Letter)
- លិខិតបញ្ជាក់ពីការពិនិត្យស្វែងរកសារធាតុញៀន 
- លិខិតថ្កោលទោស
- លិខិតបញ្ជាក់ឥរិយាមាយាទពីអាជ្ញាធរមូលដ្ឋាន
- លិខិតបញ្ជាក់សុខភាពពីមន្ទីរពេទ្យ 
- កាតចាក់វ៉ាក់សាំង

Company Profile: Panda Commercial Bank is an innovative financial enterprise aiming to bring leading financial technology services to the world. The team of Panda Bank is composed of top bankers, security experts and software and hardware technology elites. By analyzing the path from the first coin to the Internet Financial Group, it provides a forward-looking basic service platform and widely accepted ideal financial lifestyle. We are committed to providing high-quality financial services that are easy to operate, safe and reliable, convenient and efficient, to benefit sharing to customers around the world through technological innovation capabilities, and become the world's leading digital bank.Panda Commercial Bank是一家旨在为世界带来领先金融科技服务的创新金融企业，公司团队由顶尖的银行家、安全领域专家和软硬件科技精英组成，通过分析从第一枚硬币到互联网金融的路径，提供前瞻性的基础服务平台和广泛接受的理想金融生活方式。Panda Bank致力于通过科技创新能力，向全球客户提供操作简单、安全可靠、方便快捷、利益共享的优质金融服务，成为全球领先的数字银行。

Job Description: Experience in Laravel Framework.- Enable working on our CMS (Backend & API).- Manage on CMS Process with MySQL Database.- Developing API Modules for Client/Customer For rendering additional data.- Developing some functions for CMS both primary and secondary base on Supervisor provided.- Researching & Building Java Spring Web App.- Support Frontend Web Developer in render data functionality.- Learning some functionalities and follow the Process workflow like API,Data Model & Process Model from Team Leader.
Job Requirement: • Proven work experience as a Back-end developer• In-depth understanding of the entire web development process (design, development and deployment)• Hands on experience with programming languages like Java, PHP Working knowledge of CMS framework• Familiarity with front-end languages (e.g. HTML, JavaScript and CSS)• Excellent analytical and time management skills• Teamwork skills with a problem-solving attitude• BSc degree in Computer Science or relevant field• Understanding the concept on OOP and MVC Design Pattern

Job Description:
Job Description

Payroll:
- Reconciles payroll accounts in line with the reporting requirement to ensure all accounts are correctly identified and recorded in SUN for all approved payment vouchers related to payroll payables

Fixed Asset:
- Plans and prepares for the physical inventory to be streamlined and reduced errors and rework
- Conducts the physical count process
- Reviews the physical inventory journal entries and reconciliation prepared by team member.

Tax:
- Reviews PIT reports prepared by staff and posts those transactions in SUN
- Prepares CIT reports for the company and ensures timely filling taxes and the taxes are paid keeping in compliance with the local requirements.
- Ensures timely reporting and payment of the employer’s and employees’ withholding tax
- Critically reviews and analyses tax procedures in order to recommend and implement changes leading to best-practice operations
- Updates local financial manual with changes in tax & FA regulations and payroll accounting treatment
- Deal with tax consultant and other professional firm in accounting related issues.

Month End Close / Year-end Audit:
- Responsible for month-end close process, included preparing and reviewing journal entries, reconciling accounts and maintaining the integrity of the general ledger system.
- Ensures that the majority of month end transactions to be cleaned up
- Coordinate the annual audit and manage relationship with the external auditors
- Preparation of work papers supporting the annual tax return
- Coordinate the preparation of annual tax return with tax consultants
Job Requirement:
- Bachelor Degree in Accounting/Finance, ACCA is preferred
- 5 years experience in Finance/accounting
- Knowledge of PIT regulation application, VAS
- Detail and customer oriented, Team working, Computer Skills (Excel & Sun system)
- Direct people management skills and experience
- Fluent English speaking and writing.

Job Description:
• Coordinate and oversee all phases of the youth planning, implementation, development and evaluation of the
project, making sure that goals and objectives are met in accordance with proposal and approved strategic plan.
• Assist village director to make arrangement for youth house functioning, health, education, social activities,
security and orders.
• Provide direction, modeling, and mentoring for youth, work with cook and youth in establishing healthy
attachment and promote appropriate developmental skills
• Facilitate and participate in activities, including recreational, social, educational, and daily living activities,
implement point level contingency management system
• Provide discipline in the form of natural and/or imposed consequence, supervise and monitoring resident in all
aspects of the project, provide direction and feedback to youth in a constructive manner.
• Document interaction and behaviors of youth through loggings, point sheet and incident reports, provide
appropriate supervision of youth during all activities, monitor on routine housekeeping as need on shift, assist in
management of cost effective of the project.
• Producing of reports such as, weekly, monthly and on ad-hoc manner when required to village director.
Job Requirement:
- University Degree
- Other qualifications relevant the job.
- Cambodia National age 25 up, is committed the SOS Childre n & Village Values.
- Experience with children must.
- Good command written spoken English, Khmer languages the ability communicate clearly concisely, good writing skills.
- Computer literate MS Word, Excel.
- Ability work independently, under pressure, after hour.
- At least 2 of relevant experience NGO
- Good interpersonal skills, Good teamwork.
- Accommodate work with youths.

Job Description:
• Assist mothers and children in resolving their inter-personal, educational, health and other problems by provide
guideline and counseling when required
• Identify and coordinate with relevant partner for selection of children, ensure all necessary documents obtained, sufficient of material, health and safety, create plan for growth, and monitoring on children's daily schooling.
• Coordinate with schools, hospital and other agencies for proper placement of each child for education, career
plans and health care on a regular basis
• Diversify and organize variety of children’s activities, games, sports, hobby and library facilities as well as
outdoor visits for recreation
• Maintain and follow up on personal records of each child on health, education, special interests and incident.
• Initiate and develop new programs for benefit of all children and organize creative activities to promote talented potentials
• Perform all such other duties entrusted to him or her by the village director for the care of children, mothers and
proper maintenance of the village
• Co-operate with SOS mothers on preparation of child development planning, priorities and tactical execution.
• Ensure that SOS mothers receive support such as remedial, special needs and educational programs
• Responsible for the child-admission process. Ensure all necessary documents related to legal compliance must
obtain with closed collaboration with biological family or local authorities.
• Facilitate or participate in any meetings/trainings organized within the village related to educational program by instruction from village director
• Producing of reports such as, weekly, monthly and on ad-hoc manner when required to village director.
Job Requirement:
- University Degree in education required
- Qualification in pedagogy, Teacher Training level is a plus
- Communication and facilitation skills required
- High commitment to the SOS Children's Village Core Values, vision and mission
- Experience working with children a must
- Excellent command of written and spoken English, and Khmer language and the ability to communicate clearly
and concisely, and good writing skills
- Computer literate in MS Word, Excel
- Ability to work independently, under pressure, after hour
- At least 2 years of relevant work experience with NGO
- Good interpersonal skills, and teamwork

Job Description:
JOB RESPONSIBILITIES:
To report to Building Manager, this role’s responsibilities include:
• Ensure all owners, tenants, contractors and building users are provided with the information and guides required. 
• Regularly update owners / tenants regarding any on-going building work; to receive comments, suggestions or complaints. 
• To monitor and review the operation of all term service sub-contractors such as cleaning, security, pest control, landscape and lift contractors, as well as to ensure that those services are performed satisfactorily as agreed to in the contract and at the costs quoted. 
• To ensure the smooth daily operation of the building such as car park, vehicular and pedestrian access and security etc. 
• Follow up on any comments, suggestions or complaints until the matter is resolved. 
• Carry out regular building inspections and view from the client perspective. Report any issues or abnormalities to the Property Manager with a recommendation for improvement. 
• Perform other related tasks as assigned by the supervisor
Job Requirement:
JOB REQUIREMENTS:

1. Bachelor’s degree in any related field 
2. Male, minimum 21- years old   
3. Minimum 1 years’ work experience, property related work experience preferential 
4. Good appearance and personal presentation  
5. Service-orientated 
6. Good English communication both in verbal and written 
7. Good computer skill 
8. Able to work on weekends (Days off will be arranged during weekdays)

Salary: $450-$500

Location: BKK1

Working Hours
- Shift 1: 6am to 6pm
- Shift 2: 6pm to 6am

Benefits:
- Leaves (AL, Sick Leave, Special Leave...)
- Public Holiday( Follow Cambodian Labor Law)
- Lunch Allowance
- NSSF
- Provide OT
- Seniority Pay
- Career development 

Interested candidate should send their Cover Letter and Curriculum Vitae with a recent photo to the following:

Contact Person:
Name: Mr. Ry Sokleang
Tel: 069 567 238
E-mail: monyneath.sar@c-herald.com.kh
Website: https://c-herald.com.kh/
Company Profile: C-Herald Property Service is a global leading property management company which was established as a joint venture company in 2017. Since its establishment, C-herald has introduced Phnom Penh City with the new concept of Japanese Property management and a rigorous service spirit. It combines the rich management experiences and management model of the international market with the local national culture and develop a management service model that meets local needs. The successful model of the country has crossed the international map of the ASEAN. To promote the spirit of service with a high degree of trust in Japan. Base in Japan’s advanced business philosophy, management model and high-quality services, it still maintains its leading position in the industry. Take care of every customer and every owner with professional spirit, innovative thinking, and excellent services. Our vision is to become the recognized, respected and successful property management organization in Cambodia.

Job Description:
JOB RESPONSIBILITIES:
Report to Technical Supervisor/ MEP Manager, this role’s responsibilities include:
• To implement the property management system at the assigned property. 
• To ensure the following functions run efficiently run efficiently and compliance with the Standard Operation Procedure (SOP)  
• To maintain the building and system of mechanical, electrical and plumbing
• Control the Owner fit-out works to make sure they follow the fit out guidelines 
• To support the property management office and follow-up on any outstanding technical issues relating to facilities or operation disruption and working closely with contractors/suppliers to make sure that the issues is solved on timely manner
• To identify problem areas at the property and recommend improvement plans to maximize the efficiency of site management. 
• To maintain good public relations with clients, owners and tenants of the property
Purchase order, record and manage inventory for any equipment or materials required for the effective management of the property

Job Description:
1.	Human Resource Strategies: develop and implement human resource management strategies, HR policies, and procedures in line with the business needs to proactively impact and contribute to achievement of the CML’s objectives.   
2.	Lead and Manage HR & Training Department: ensure that the HR & Training team delivers their planned outcomes and their agreed targets (KPIs) are met in line with the HR & Training plan. Monitor report and advice on the performance of functions for which the HR & Training team is responsible. Coach and develop staff and encourage continued learning and development of individuals within the unit that increases HR’s capacity and competence to meet current and future needs.  
3.	Workforce planning and Recruitment: participate in determining manpower strategy and manage the actual labor cost against the approved budget. Ensure recruitment of quality staff in accordance with the required manpower plans.
4.	  Performance Management: develop and implement performance management policies and procedures to ensure smoothness, effectiveness, and efficiency are in place as follow:
-	To manage and follow up Employee Performance Appraisal  
-	To work closely with Compensation and PM Manager in designing or updating appraisal and career development policies or procedures to ensure the effectiveness and efficiency.
-	To work closely with CPM for performing performance appraisals for all employees.
5.	Remuneration and Reward: develop and ensure the implementation of staff compensation policies to retain and attract key skills and enhance employee commitment.  
6.	Employee Relations and legal compliance: develop and implement employee relations policy and guideline to be consistent with relevant labor legislation and business needs to promote an effective working environment.
7.	Management Team: be a proactive participating member of the management team and contribute to the managing of the business to positively impact the CML’s strategies and objectives.
Job Requirement:
-	Master degree of Management or related fields.
-	A minimum of 3 year experiences at a management level in HR within the banking/MFI sector. 
-	Experience in employee administration, HR policies, practices and procedures 
-	Knowledge of HRMIS
Company Profile:
1. VISION:
“A leading Cambodian social microfinance institution working to achieve positive and lasting changes in the livelihoods of economically active poor families in a socially responsible manner”

2. MISSION:
“To improve the livelihoods, skills, and self-confidence of poor families in Cambodia by providing responsible microfinance and complementary socio-economic services”

3. CORE VALUES:
■ INTEGRITY: 
Chamroeun provides financial services and socio-economic services to its clients to enhance their well-being. It achieves this ethically and with transparent, fair, and cost effective methods. This manner is also applied to Chamroeun’s other stakeholders.

■ QUALITY OF SERVICES: 
At Chamroeun, we believe that our clients deserve tailored as well as efficient services. We provide these services in a convenient, proactive, and timely manner.

■ TRANSPARENCY: 
At Chamroeun, we provide our clients and other stakeholders with complete and accurate information about the terms and conditions of our products and services. Information is provided in a user-friendly manner to enable them to easily understand those terms and conditions.

■ FAIR PRACTICES: 
At Chamroeun, we ensure that the services we provide to our clients as well as the interactions we have with other stakeholders are not unethical or deceptive. We are committed to building relationships that are based on respect, fair treatments, and courtesy.

■ CONFIDENTIALITY: 
Privacy of our clients and other stakeholders is strictly safeguarded and stored, and such data is only used upon their consents, and they are well informed on specific purposes of data usage.

■ NON-DISCRIMINATION: 
Chamroeun considers its clients and other stakeholders as value assets and take all of efforts to make sure that the institution treats them in appropriate manner.
Contact Info: Contact Information Mrs. Nhong Korane  070 960 666 job@chamroeun.com #425, St. 271, Sangkat Toul Tompong II, Khan Chamkarmoan, Phnom Penh, Cambodia 070 960 666

job title: Senior Finance Admin- Purchase to Pay
position: Senior Finance Admin- Purchase to Pay
Job Description:
Job Purpose
To support Accounting & Reporting  Team, driving the agenda of the team and the Accounting & Reporting team along with other key priorities in order to accomplish effective transitions, maintain high standards of service & processes and deliver on-going continuous improvements, in line with our company expectations and business strategy.   

Automation and Simplification of PtP Processes 	
- Lead PtP project (i.e. Finance digitalization project, Invoice management tools, etc.) 
- Support Project of Internet Banking, Host to Host 
- Support Project of staff expense claims 	

OTIF Payment to Suppliers 	
- Verify invoice, goods/service receipt, purchase order and payment document to ensure they are matched and okay to process payment. 
- Act as “Approve 2” in JDE system for all payments 
- Ensure that payment to supplier is correctly made and on time based on payment term. 

Accounts Closing & Reporting 	
- Verify the supplier's statement of accounts vs company's record 
- Post all invoices, payments in accounting system. 
- Verify Account Payable Ageing report 
- Follow up and clear long outstanding invoices 
- Verify the accounts reconciliation for prepayment to suppliers, open GR/IR accounts related to PtP 
- Lead PtP team to ensure that monthly accounts closing is properly done on time. 	
- Set meeting with other sections/ departments/ suppliers for process improvement. 
- Raise “issue ticket” and/or “request ticket” in SNOW and coordinate with relevant consultant to get issue/request tickets resolved. 	

Operation Process & Compliance 
 - Ensure that there is no pending issue in BWise system for ICFR testing for OtC section.
- Effectively lead the day-to-day operations with continous improvement and innovation mindset

job title: Senior Finance Admin - Report to Record
position: Senior Finance Admin - Report to Record
Job Description:
Job Purpose:
To support RtR Team, driving the agenda of the team and the Accounting & Reporting team along with other key priorities in order to accomplish effective transitions, maintain high standards of service & processes and deliver on-going continuous improvements, in line with our company expectations and business strategy.   


General Ledger Accounting 
- Run and check data from PLANON system for Lease Contract (IFRS 16)
- Prepare JE for insurance expenses
- Upload JE into JDE system
- Reconcile balance sheet accounts
- Prepare discount JE
 
Fixed Asset accounting
- Checked disposal & write-off fixed assets in JDE
- Checked Fixed Assets Summary
 Accrual Accounting
- Ensuring all manual JEs  are automatically reversed in JDE system with support and verification from RtR Manager.- Ensure accuracy in the accruels from the business in YTD (Year to Date) Business Performance Figure 
Banking & Accounting 
- Cash Journal Accounting
- Check manual Journal Entries (JE) based on daily bank statement vs Sales collection for USD
- Check JE based on daily bank statement vs Payment to suppliers for USD
- Make manual Journal Entries (JE) based on daily bank statement vs Sales collection for EUR, KHR
- Make JE based on daily bank statement vs Payment to suppliers for EUR, KHR
- Upload JE into JDE system
- Make manual Journal Entries (JE) based on Petty Cash Replenishment statements
- Maintain new, existing and old bank accounts in JDE system
Tax Compliance
-Prepare monthly input VAT declaration form
-Prepare monthly withholding tax declaration form

Performance Management & Development 
- Provide on-the-job training, and new way of working to OtC team for any new process related to the section. 
- Conduct regular performance discussion with team members with proper development guidance and coaching.
Job Requirement:
. Strong understanding of Supply Chain and Commercial (Sales, Marketing etc) parts of the organisation
. Good understanding of ERP Accounting Systems (JDE), as well as of enabling Infrastructure (workflow, invoice management, etc.)
. Ability to add value in standardisation and continuous improvement programmes 
. Experience of leading change programmes affecting large groups of individuals within organisations undergoing significant change
. Excellent interpersonal skills with the ability to quickly form working relationships, gain credibility and influence solutions at a senior level
. Proactive in identifying and solving problems/issues 
. A drive for continuous professional development in self and others

Job Description:
Job Purpose
To support Accounting & Reporting  Team, driving the agenda of the team and the Accounting & Reporting team along with other key priorities in order to accomplish effective transitions, maintain high standards of service & processes and deliver on-going continuous improvements, in line with our company expectations and business strategy.   

Sales collection, sales order and sales invoice	
- Check daily DIS sales order and invoice issued by Agents. 
- Check daily sales collection against sales invoice and key receipt into BASE JDE.
- Knock off receipts, debit/credit notes Vs invoices in BASE JDE after run sales update.	

Non-Trade sales collection and invoice
- Issue sales non-trade invoice from BASE JDE to customers (i.e. Sales of scrap/miscellaneous item, spent grain, fixed asset disposal).
- Check sales non-trade collection and key receipt into BASE JDE.
- Knock off receipts Vs non-trade invoices in BASE JDE after run sales update.	

Credit/Debit note	
- Issue credit/debit note to Agents (i.e. Credit note pays for Agent claims; Debit note charges for DIS licenses).
- Check credit/debit note amount based on approval list before releasing to Agents.

Accounts Closing & Reporting 	
- Sales update and post all invoices, debit/credit notes, and receipts into accounting system. 
- Verify account receivable ageing report. 
- Follow up and clear long outstanding sales credit invoice (including consignment invoice).
- Prepare daily sales out reconciliaiton.
- Prepare sales non-trade and collection reports.
- Prepare accrual expenses related to OTC stream.
- Prepare account reconciliation for prepayment from Agents, and account related to OTC stream (i.e. Revenue, transportation...).  	
- Close month end activities by deadline. 

Operation Process & Compliance 
 - Support leaders/managers to ensure that there is no pending issue in BWise system for ICFR testing under OTC stream.
 - Work effectively from day-to-day operations with continuous improvement and innovation mindset
Job Requirement:
- Ability to add value in standardization and continuous improvement jobs/programmes 
- Excellent interpersonal skills with the ability to quickly form working relationships, gain credibility and influence solutions in team.
- Proactive in identifying and solving problems/issues 
- A drive for continuous professional development in self and others

Company Profile:
Wing Bank (Cambodia) Plc – the bank for every Cambodian – is driven by the vision to provide every Cambodian with convenient access to financial services relevant to, and for the improvement of their daily lives.

Wing Bank has revolutionized the way Cambodians access financial services by introducing instant, secure, and convenient Mobile Financial Services since 18 August 2008.

Today, Wing Bank serves the entire Cambodian population with 100% coverage of the districts in Cambodia thanks to the innovative Wing Bank App, over 10,000 Wing Cash Xpress agents, over 55,000 merchants, and partnerships with industry giants such as Mastercard, MoneyGram, AliPay, WeChat Pay, Western Union, Visa, and Ria.

Wing Bank provides an array of advanced financial products both for individual and corporate customers. These include loans, deposits, micro savings, credit referral services, money transfers, utility and insurance payments, supply chain payments, payroll services and even phone top-ups. In addition, Wing offers retail payments via “WingPay”, and has also introduced the “WingMall” e-commerce platform.

Both small and large companies alike are now using Wing’s payroll and disbursement services, speeding up their payments. Over 80% of Wing’s agents and 50% of customers are women, making Wing a shining example of gender inclusion in the region.

Wing Bank is committed to providing financial, gender and digital inclusion to the unbanked and the under-banked, allowing every Cambodian to enjoy convenience and security when it comes to financial services
Contact Info: Contact Information HR Department   078 988 290 / 078 989 509 / 078 989 114 jobs@wingbank.com.kh No. 721, Preah Monivong Blvd., Sangkat Beung Keng Kang 3, Khan Chamkar Mon, Phnom Penh, Cambodia 078 988 290 / 078 989 509 / 078 989 114

Job Description:
* This job contributes to the Company success by assisting the IT Manager to maintain and enhance the company operation systems covering the office and all stores in Cambodia.  Models and acts in accordance with the group’s guiding principles.

* Role and responsibility:
Responsibilities and essential job functions include but are not limited to the following:
•Setup data backup & restoration test planning to make sure for disaster recovery capability of IT system and ERP server farm.
•Setup preventive maintenance plan for IT system and ERP server farm.
•Preventive maintenance and administer on core IT system and ERP server farm, plus monitor ERP server health and performance.
•Perform monthly basis for ERP database re-index and provide recommendation on ERP server farm enhancement if needed.
•Implement, coordinate and support on new infrastructure enhancement project.
•Primary contact on infrastructure system for vendor and facilitate system enhancement/requirement with local/oversea vendor.
•Provide system support to core users/vendor on IT Infrastructure.
•Troubleshoot functionality on IT system with proper guideline and documentation record.
•Coordinate between business owner and vendor on infrastructure enhancement project.
•Facilitate on resource planning, scope of work defining and budgeting for infrastructure development milestone.
•Provide training on new deployment of using IT infrastructure system.
•Facilitate in end user policy revision on using IT infrastructure.
•Manage documentation on any changing of IT infrastructure in proper manner for each specific revised version.
•Prepare IT infrastructure diagram and maintain it with each specific updated version.
Job Requirement:
•Degree in Computer Science or equivalent.
•5 yrs. hands-on experience in IT system and infrastructure management.
•Experience with SolarWinds monitoring system.
•Solid experience on windows server implementation and configuration.
•Capability and fully experience on server administration.
•Ability to manage complex server farm environment with proper maintenance.
•Strong on virtualization system environment.
•Strong on backup solution system for IT infrastructure.
•Fairly experience with SQL server and database environment.
•Fairly understanding on IT system security.
•Able to work at night-time for ERP system maintenance occasion.

Company Profile: TUBE COFFEE created by 3 Cambodian Shareholders. Tube is inspired by London’s metro system, the underground TUBE, for which its fast speed, reliable quality, and affordability are world-renowned. Naturally, these are the very essence which Tube coffee strives to be. We aim to bring fast, affordable, and quality services to Cambodia just like our underground counterpart, but in a coffee way. As synonymous as the tube is with London, Tube coffee aims to be the same in Cambodia, simply by being a Khmer brand created in Cambodia and made by Cambodians to compete with foreign brands. By using yellow, we hope to present to the world the warmth, freshness, happiness, optimism, and positivity of the Khmer culture. So, hop aboard and enjoy a smooth ride on the Khmer tube.

Job Description:
Scope of work:
Brand Executive will assist Brand Manager in managing both ATL & BTL Marketing campaigns.
His/her duties include developing concepts & strategies with agencies, monitoring social media
implementation, liaising with Sales & Marketing executives, distributor & agencies to oversee
on-ground activation & branding, keep track of competitors' activities & market trends.

Duties and Responsibilities:
- Develop and plan marketing strategies of the assigned brands
- Plan and implement ATL & BTL activities such as promotional activities, print
advertisements, events, point-of-sales marketing, etc.
- Create, direct and monitor product launch thematic advertising, advertorial, editorial
approval and joint promotion with media partners and third parties.
- Co-work with respective trade channels for promotional mechanism, special offers, instore
display and POS materials.
- Plan, monitor and review on the marketing budget
- Plan and execute new product launches
- Conceptualize and initiate digital and social media campaigns through working with
various digital agencies.
- Responsible for planning and delivering innovative content across all social media
platforms
- Responsible for content creation including design and copy writing for digital ads and
related marketing collaterals.
- Measure and report performance of all digital marketing campaigns
- Manage the ecommerce business by planning and executing online campaigns and
promotions
- Monitor competitor’s activities through print, TVC advertisement and data analysis, as well
as current market performance and trends.
Job Requirement:
- Bachelor’s degree in Business Administration, Sale/Marketing & other related fields
- At least 2 years’ experience in a marketing or brand management role
- Relevant experiences in Data analysis, Sales & Marketing/ Brand management is a plus
- Passionate & up-to-date with latest trends and marketing best practices
- Willing to learn, creative, good negotiation & interpersonal skills
- Good command of speaking and writing in English
- Willing to travel & able to work under pressure
- Strong organizational and time-management abilities
- Proficient in MS Office (Word, Excel & Power point)

Other benefits:
- Working 5 days/week from Monday to Friday
- Provided Travel, Food and Phone allowance
- Provided monthly attendance bonus
- Seniority Pay
- NSSF & Forte for GPA and Health insurance

Company Profile:
RMA entered the Cambodian market in 1992 as an exclusive provider of dedicated system solutions for commercial and non-commercial enterprises in the sectors of infrastructure, energy and logistics. Gradually, the company has been growing alongside the development of Cambodia and expanded to automotive, agricultural and heavy equipment, warehouse solutions, financial services, car rental and food franchise management.  In addition to business expansion, RMA Cambodia has also focused its attention on human resources by providing internships and employment opportunities to approximately 2,000 local and professional staff with a number of expatriates working together to share their skills and expertise.

RMA Cambodia has also been very active within local communities. We consistently work with local authorities and organizations to provide financial and technical assistance in essential key sectors, such as health, environment, education and sports.

We aim to help Cambodia grow and prosper.

OUR SERVICES AND PRODUCTS:

RMA Cambodia and its affiliate Asia Vehicle Rental (AVR) are offering franchised car rental services through the global brand AVIS. Rentals are customized with brand-new Ford vehicles and experienced English-speaking chauffeurs. AVIS also offers car rental and leasing that meets all types of customers requirements for business trips, leisure or field work, with or without chauffeurs.

RMA Cambodia has a financing arm, RMA Financial Services, offers financing solutions to flexibly meet the needs of corporate and retail customers for the purchase of their own automotive and heavy equipment, agricultural machinery and warehouse solution equipment.

RMA Cambodia is also a provider of heavy equipment products and solutions in construction, road building and maintenance, and agriculture, namely JCB, Mitsubishi FUSO and John Deere. RMA Cambodia is an agent for the world’s leading brands in these industries.

Company Profile:
At DKSH, our purpose is to enrich people’s lives by providing access to goods, services and insights. United by our vision to be the trusted partner, we help companies grow in Asia and beyond across our Business Units Healthcare, Consumer Goods, Performance Materials and Technology.

Delivering life-saving drugs to hospitals, bringing high-quality products to remote villages, installing technology that raises living standards and providing new formulations for healthcare products that make life easier. These are just a few examples of how DKSH touches people’s lives around the clock. We do this while helping our clients and customers grow by providing services including sourcing, market insights, marketing and sales, eCommerce, distribution and logistics as well as after-sales services.

Listed on the SIX Swiss Exchange, DKSH operates in 36 markets with 32,450 specialists, generating net sales of CHF 10.7 billion in 2020. Founded by Swiss entrepreneurs in 1865, we have been deeply root

Since commencing business in 2017, we’ve become the first life insurer to provide coverage on 26 critical illnesses. Job Description: Objective: The position is required to perform the critical Data Governance role for AIA Cambodia. The role is set up in alignment with the requirements from Group’s Data Governance StandardsJob Responsibilities:• Drive initiatives in defining, documenting and maintaining data management policies, standards and procedures in alignment to the AIA Data Governance Standards.• Drive the development, documentation, and updating of technology and business processes pertaining to data governance across business functions.• Work in collaboration with Local Data Council, Business Divisions and IT to enforce data management policies for addition, removal, modification, and use of company data.• Perform the main coordinating and communication function of the local data council. • Identify sensitive personal or proprietary data (PII / PSI etc) that requires protection and establish and execute appropriate policies• Understand and map out flow of data internally & externally• Establish and maintain a data dictionary• Help build processes to maintain clean and consistent data across the organization• Collaborate with the Software Development teams to identify potential issues related to data usage during development efforts.• Participate and represent Data Management team in the Local Data Council to discuss and act on data usage, consistency, and issues.• Collaborate with Compliance team on capturing and implementing regulatory requirements for relevant to data management• Prepare Data Profiling / Data Quality report to monitor data quality KPIs for Local Data Council• Lead the follow-up actions related to data challenges and remediation resulted in the Local Data Council meetings•  Ability to maintain, execute and constantly improve the data governance standard of AIA Cambodia•  Ability to deliver to data quality goals defined in Local Data Council•  Effectiveness in stakeholder management•  Effectiveness in team management
Job Requirement: Education• Bachelor / Master’s degree level education from a recognized University preferably in Information Technology, Business Administration and/or Insurance Studies etc• Certified Professional level certification in Data Architecture, Data Analysis etc is a definite advantage.Work Experience• Minimum of three (02) years of work experience having demonstrated the application of Data Governance / Management experience in a similar functional role and in an enterprise level working environment.• Having lead and provided policies, industry best practices guidance and supervision relating the Data Governance to relevant teams from Business and Technology.• Having managed cross functional multiple projects in parallel at project portfolio basis.• Ability to work cross border and multinational working groups.• Experienced in executing regulatory requirements for data privacy protection from PDPA, GDPR or any other international standard acts is an advantage.Knowledge and Skills• Excellent skills in Business user engagement and stakeholder management• Strong analytical and problem-solving skills.• Domain proficiency in insurance business and its operations including distribution channels would be an advantage.• Experienced in Informatica or any ETL and DQ tools would be added advantage.• Able to work independently and highly self-motivated.• Able to work with peers and other stakeholders, a team player.
Company Profile: AIA Cambodia is guided by our Purpose to help Cambodians live Healthier, Longer, Better lives. Since commencing business in 2017, we’ve become the first life insurer to provide coverage on 26 critical illnesses. Job Description: Objective: To drive the end-to-end delivery of the AIA TDA (Technology, Digital and Analysis) and its related IT project(s) on time, within budget and to support deriving the expected project KPIs. This role is responsible for defining, tracking and communicating in a consistent and effective manner and incorporating effective change, resourcing and risk management controls at project level. Job Responsibility: 1. Manage the assigned IT related project(s) as per AIA Standards and within given budget and timelines, including:• Define project scope, goal, deliverables and identify resource that support business goals in collaboration with senior management and stakeholders.• Develop full-scale project plans and associated communications documents with identified project dependencies and critical path.• Closely track project milestones and deliverables and document the identified risk and issues until closure.• Develop and deliver progress reports, proposals, requirements documentation, presentations and its timely reporting.• Proactively manage changes in project scope, identify potential crises, and devise contingency and mitigation plans.• Effectively communicate project expectations to team members and stakeholders in a timely and clear manner.• Coach, mentor, motivate and supervise project team members and contractors, and influence them to take positive action and accountability for their assigned work.• Manage project budget according to established accounting policies and procedures; forecast project cash flow and report actual cash flow and variance to senior management on a regular basis• Ensure that project activities operate within the policies and procedures of the organization• Conduct project post implementation reviews and submit appropriate recommendations in order to identify project overview, assessment of the predefined KPI achievements and the key lessons learnt. • Keep and archive project documents for audit and future reference purposes.2. Cultivate and support an ethical culture to fulfill legal and compliance requirements and encourage professionalism amongst stakeholders.3. Perform other related project management responsibilities and duties periodically assigned by the reporting line management in order to meet operational and corporate objectives.
Job Requirement: Education• Bachelor / Master’s degree level education from a recognized University preferably in Project Management, Information Technology, Business Administration and/or Insurance Studies etc• Certified Professional level certification similar to Prince2 / PMP is a definite advantage.Work Experience• Minimum of three (03) years of work experience having demonstrated the application of Project Management Principles in an enterprise level working environment.• Having managed cross functional multiple projects in parallel at project portfolio basis.• Ability to work cross border and multinational working groups.• Having exposure to the agile project management fundamentals is an advantage.Knowledge and Skills• Strong interpersonal and leadership skills and ability to motivate and engage team members.• Excellent communication skills at all levels (all levels of project stakeholders).• Excellent time management and tasking skills.• Ability to organize and prioritize multiple tasks to meet deadlines, flexible and adaptable to a dynamic working environment for program delivery.• Strong analytical thinking and problem-solving skills• Ability to work independently in a structured organizational operating environment• To be able to perform collaboratively as a good team player• Skilled ability to foster continuous improvement and innovation; ability to accept and lead change initiatives throughout the organizationPassion in project/program management with proven track record of result orientation

Job Description: The position objectives are to ensure smooth and effective sale event management, enhance quality & assignment of leads & engagement to maximize sale opportunities. Closing Date: 16 April 2021
Company Profile:
As Cambodia’s longest-serving and only 100% locally owned mobile communications company, Cellcard has more than 24 years of service to the Kingdom maintaining a customer base of more than 4 million subscribers.

Cellcard launched in 1997 in a joint venture with Millicom International Cellular providing its customers with the first prepaid service with scratchcards.

What followed for Cellcard was a number of firsts in the market such as introducing SMS, Value-Added Services, a dedicated Loyalty program, roaming services and a credit sharing platform.

Cellcard is Cambodia’s most-awarded mobile network having achieved more than 30 industry awards for network excellence including an impressive six consecutive Ookla Speedtest awards and a number of category wins from Opensignal including Best Games Experience in February 2020.

It’s most recent market firsts include the Cellcard Network Guarantee launched in 2017 reimbursing any customer who experiences a dropped call, the award-winning App-based Super Data Race held each year since 2017 and its move to lead the esports agenda in 2018 followed in 2019 with Cambodia’s first virtual gamer platform PlayGame and the first tailormade gamer data plan PlayGame Unlimited.

In February 2021, Cellcard revealed its latest innovation, the Pouk Mak chat app, the world’s first major Khmer languaged messaging App.

A major focus for Cellcard now is its evolution to 5G for consumers and enterprise, including Smart City applications across Fintech and web security, data privacy, public safety and security, environment protection, education, healthcare and e-government.

In terms of 5G network readiness, Cellcard has conducted numerous live tests on its stand-alone site reaching speeds of 1.8 gigabytes per second. These are Cambodia’s first and only tests conducted on a real end-to-end with 5G radio to a 5G core network able to accommodate network slicing for dedicated use cases.
Contact Info: Contact Information Human Resources Department  (855-12) 800 800 | 017 333 589 | 077 906 555 | 077 907 555 careers@cellcard.com.kh No. 33 Preah Sihanouk Blvd., Phnom Penh (855-12) 800 800 | 017 333 589 | 077 906 555 | 077 907 555

Job Description:
Job Description
To manage and lead day to day farm operations.
- To train, support and develop Farm Supervisors and workers.
- To continuously look for creative ways to improve and execute FARM MANAGER
farm policies and strategies.
- To plan and optimise farm inputs to minimize wastage, maximise yield and reduce operating cost where appropriate.
- To oversee and manage security related matters around the farm and come up with the recommendations to improve
identified flaws/loopholes.
- To set up proper rice production protocols, rice planting manual and action plan.
- To collect data such as plant height, number of tillers, disease index, panicle weight, grain yield, yield survey and provide (daily, weekly and monthly) report of rice plant conditions to management team.
- To prepare and submit report/records to management on matters relating to the farms operation
- To conduct a project/rice production evaluation at the end of each planting season.
- To perform any other ad-hoc task as and when required.

KEY CHALLENGES:
- Working under harsh weather conditions.
- Work long and irregular hours.
- Manage farm workers to achieve goals set by management.
Job Requirement:
- Minimum 3 years working experience in the managerial levels in the mentioned area    and or related
- Knowledge and experience in growing paddy is compulsory.
- Honest, highly responsible and reliable
- Good computer literacy (Internet and Email, Ms. Word, Excel)
- Ability to manage multi-tasks
- Proven management skills and ability to negotiate effectively with partners
- Proficient in English speaking, report writing and presentation
- Good integrity, positive attitude, helpful, high commitment, competence and motivation

QUALIFICATIONS/LICENSES
- Diploma/Degree/Masters in Agriculture/Agronomy or Equivalent.

EXPERIENCE
- Knowledge and experience in growing paddy is compulsory.

Company Profile:
OUR HISTORY
PTC Computer Co. Ltd was established in Phnom Penh since 1996. We started with a small business, but as a result of our dedication, loyalty, reliability, affordable prices, excellent customer services, excellent range of products and technical expertise, we have grown remarkably successful that we are now well recognized as one of the biggest IT store in Cambodia. Our reputation, in the last two decades, has gone far and beyond which has led us to expand as the largest IT company to supply genuine products and warranty services to customers. PTC Computer is privileged and honored to be partners with well-known international IT brands as authorized distributor and service provider in Cambodia. As a result, we are the Authorized Distributor of over fifteen brands.

Job Description:
‐ Involved in the construction planning, organizing and manage construction team to meet the standard
and quality and monitor the construction process from ground to finishing.
‐ Meet with supplier, sub‐contractor, expertise for the specification and method statement.
‐ Preparing and presenting construction report, budget report proposals to site manager.
* Duties and responsibilities
‐ Follow the master schedule reviewing the resource materials equipment/tool comparing with work
and provide the solution for the Master schedule to reach the deadline and goal.
‐ Prepare the planning all the site work and assign to team member to assure the construction progress
is within the control.
‐ Coordinate with other department/supplier/sub‐contractor for the progress follow up, document,
materials, schedule or reference requirement make sure all the require work deliver on time to the
team and get the job done properly and on time.
‐ Lead the team to hand on the project according to the method statement, Review the Method of
Statement, and the technical documents including drawings, BoQ, General Specification, and Materials.
‐ Lead the team to coordinate with other design department expertise.
‐ Lead the research construction method and technical idea.
‐ To assist Manager Check the quality of the construction, and following the quality control system and
provide in advance warning of quality, technical, method statement and solution to the team member.
‐ Coordinate with team member make sure all the revision is being spread and well understood.
‐ Well understanding general design concept of architecture, structure, MEP.
‐ Able to self‐manage own work/ Team work with high degree efficiency.
‐ Always work under respect, responsible cooperate and communicate with team member and other
staff.
‐ Multi‐tasking, self‐motivated, independence, able to work under pressure.
‐ To exhibit tasks using computer programs such as AutoCAD, Sketch
Job Requirement:
•Minimum of 4 years Supervisory experience in concrete and heavy civil construction.
•Experience in working in remote locations, able to travel and willing to work overtime. 
•A demonstrated ability to communicate effectively at all levels both internally and externally. 
•Proficient with computers.
•Strong leadership capabilities and able to motivate and direct work crews. 
•Strong Safety First Attitude. 
•Have a logical, analytical and creative approach to solve problem
•Have good presentation skills.
•Have good oral and written in Khmer and English, Chinese (Priority).
•Have good negotiation skills, Communication skills, interpersonal skills; and problem solving skills.
•Be friendly, flexible, honest, hard-working, and be able to work under pressure.
Company Profile:
Established in the early 1990s, UC has more than 10 years of experience in the construction industries. Stared out in building row shop house in Olympic Market, UC has evolved and move on to build many famous Villas in Boung Keng Kang District. With growing construction industry, UC gets more involved and cooperation with foreign investors and work closely with the government to help build a more vibrant city.
In The year 2000, UC has expanded into the market in Siem Reap building 5 Star Hotels equipped with large Spacious function halls, Khmer style design restaurants and exquisite swimming pools. At the same time, UC also constructed Bopha Angkor Restaurant with a massive area of 4000sqm. by mixing Khmer style Architecture exterior with modern classical interior. Bopha Angkor is highly well known for its Glass roof top design which allows natural light into the building to support the ever growing vast palm trees inside.

It is essential that a support consultant has an excellent working relationship with all members of our team. Company Profile:
Qingjian Realty (South Pacific) Group Pte Ltd , is a subsidiary of CNQC (South Pacific) Holding Pte Ltd, is the regional headquarters of South-East Asia that focuses on property development including residential, commercial, office and industrial.

Our first residential property development was in Singapore, a HDB-DBSS development at Bishan, Natura Loft (2008), which was awarded the BCA Green Mark 2010 Award (Gold Plus).

Since 2010, Qingjian Realty actively participated in Singapore Government's Land Sales exercise and has successfully acquired and launched quality luxury residential developments including NiN Residence (2010), RiverParc Residence (2011), Riversound Residence (2012), River Isles (2012), Waterbay (2012), Ecopolitan (2013), Bellewoods (2014), Bellewaters (2014), The Visionaire (2015), iNz Residence (2016) and Le Quest (2017). 

In 2012, Qingjian achieved S$2billion revenue in residential properties sales in Singapore within three years between 2010 and 2012. In addition, Qingjian Realty is listed as one of the Top 5 best-selling developer in 2012, a sign of its strong foothold in Singapore and the first foreign developer in Singapore to break into the Top 5 list. Today, we are Singapore's largest developer of executive condominiums. 2016 marks the year Qingjian paved the way for Smart Living in Singapore.

Qingjian Realty's commitment to provide quality homes in Singapore is widely recognised with multiple awards, including FIABCI Singapore Property Award, BCA Green Mark Award, BCA Universal Design Mark Gold Award, BCI Asia Top Ten Award and Asia Property Award

job title: Head of Marketing and Product Development Department (1 position)
position: Head of Marketing and Product Development Department (1 position)
Job Description:
- Develop up-to-date policy, procedures, form templates, guidelines and protection of Camma Microfinance Limited in a sufficient and timely manner.
- Analyse the market research conducted by the Marketing and Product Development Department to be aware of market trends, market competition, and gaps between exiting microbusiness, personal consumption and staff loan products and market needs.
- Manage on oversee the feedback collection analysis and give recommendations for ensuring of smoothness the policies and procedures implementation and product modification.
- Obtains market share by developing marketing plans and programs for each product; directing promotional support.
- Managing all marketing activities such promotion, campaign, or other special event timely and effectively regarding to marketing plan.
- Monthly, quarterly and yearly review actions plan to achieve KPIs setting.
- Develop an up-to-date, sufficient and specific debt resolution strategy.
- Develop, maintain and update marketing materials such as brochures, posters, leaflets, website, Facebook, YouTube, etc.
- Give productive ideas and comments to be better for the design works.
- Ensure that all marketing materials and product development designs are addressed to the customers’ needs and market competition.
- Monitor medium-sized loan and staff loan quality and take a proper and timely action against arising issues.

** Salary and Benefits:
A competitive salary based on education, prior-experience and potential are provided. Camma offers annual salary increase plus other benefits such as annual incentive, pchum ben and Khmer new year’s bonus, medical allowance, life and personal accident insurance, staff wedding, maternity, paternity and children allowance, scholarship, uniform, and good working condition with other human resource policies paralleling to labour law of Kingdom of Cambodia.

The successful candidates will be equipped with numerous training and development programs in order to enhance the competency to be high dedicated and talent employees by corporative colleagues and managements and be long term career with Camma.

- Bachelor or Master’s degree in Marketing, Business, Management, Banking, other related field.
- At least 5-year experience in Marketing and Product Development in MFIs or Banks.
- Commitment to the Camma MFI’s vision, mission and core values.
- Work hard under pressure and on time manner.
- Good communication, facilitation and interpersonal skills.
- Strong analytical and project management skills.
- Good inter-personal skill and communication with internal and external customers.
- Good written and spoken English.
- Strong computer skills (Microsoft office) Design.
- High motivation and ability to work without supervision.
- Self-motivated and goal-oriented; leads by example.
- Able to establish credibility with managers and employees.

Job Description:
Job Scope
• Prepare the annual sales budget and business plan.
• Identify and secure new and regain loss customers.  This would include cold calling on new customers.
• Selling freight forwarding and non-vessel operator (NVO) services.
• Develop a strategic network of agents.
• Participate in project.
• General administration of customer records, and others.

Definition
• Freight forwarding services refer to:
- Sea, Air, and Road transportation between Singapore and other countries, or between countries (i.e. cross trade).
- Warehousing.
- Import and Export customs clearance.
- Cargo insurance.
- Packing and Unpacking, and delivery services.
• Network agents refer to overseas agents with nomination and or support for OV Logistics Pte Ltd free hand shipments.
• Principals refer to NVO i.e. box operators.
• Selling refers to identifying customer needs, preparing, and presenting the product and its value, quoting, and negotiating rates, and closing the sale.
• Cold calling refers to identify customers (i.e.suspect) from media such as Newspaper, Trade Magazines, Facebook, LinkedIn, and others, and calling the suspect if they are potential customers.
Job Requirement:
Knowledge and Skills
** Qualification:
- University degree holder or equivalent education

** Knowledge and Skills:
- Sound understanding of international air and sea documentation, freight forwarding and logistics operation, Incoterms, Customs clearance procedure, and others.
- Able to create solution and business proposal.
- Interpersonal communication skills 
- Problem-Solving skills 
- Presentation Skill
- Analytical Skill
- Negotiation and Persuasion skills.
- Good command of spoken and written English. 
Computer literacy i.e. familiar with Microsoft office application of Excel, PowerPoint, Outlook, Words, and CargoWise.
- Understanding of Quality Management
- Understanding of Change Management

** Experience:
- At least 3 years related working experience preferred in 3PL / Freight and Transportation Industry.
- Experience in consultative selling in Logistics and other industries.
Company Profile: OV Logistics Cambodia, a member of the Phee Group of Companies, provides global freight forwarding and logistics services since 1993. Headquartered in Singapore, we have our own operations in the In-China region, and provide services to more than 200 countries and territories worldwide. Our Culture of ABC encourages our people to be Energetic, Fun-loving and Resourceful. Our employees and young leaders are Accountable, Evolving and Perseverance. Our people are Loyal, Passionate and Inspirational. We provide a healthy and conducive work place with career growth opportunity. If you are looking for an exciting and challenging career in the freight forwarding and logistics Industries we are the company for you. Find out more about the Phee Group of Companies by visiting us at: www.pheegroup.com

Company Profile: The Institut Pasteur du Cambodge (IPC) is a Cambodian non-for-profit research institution established in 1953, IPC is today a scientific research establishment declared of public utility placed under the high patronage of the Ministry of Health of the Kingdom of Cambodia and under the responsibility of the Institute Pasteur on the scientific and technical levels. The IPC is a member of the Pasteur Network, which brings together 33 institutes present on five continents. It shares the Pasteurian values and the ethical charter to which the Pasteur Institutes are bound. The IPC has more than 250 employees, including about 30 expatriates of 10 nationalities and includes 5 research units. It carries out research activities in health biology, public health and service activities (Medical Biology Laboratory, vaccinations and water and food analyses) and training.

job title: Assistant Strategist, Market Intelligence and Strategy

company_name: ធី ខេ អេស គ្រុប
Job Description:
ក្រុមហ៊ុន ធី ខេ អេស ត្រូវការជ្រើសរើសបុគ្គលិកផ្នែក (Sales Executive) ចំនួន ១២នាក់៖ រាជធានី ចំនួន ៤នាក់ តាមខេត្តចំនួន ៦នាក់  លក់គម្រោង ២ នាក់។

ការទទួលខុសត្រូវ
• បង្កើនការស្វែងរកអតិថិជនថ្មី និងថែរក្សាអតិថិជនចាស់ដើម្បីជម្រុញ និងពង្រីកការលក់ទៅតាមតំបន់គោលដៅ និងផែនការកំណត់ ។
• ចុះជួបទំនាក់ទំនងអតិថិជន និងសាធារណជនដោយផ្ទាល់ និងពន្យល់អំពីផលិតផលរបស់ក្រុមហ៊ុនដើម្បីសម្រេចការលក់ទៅតាមផែនការ និងឈានទៅរកបង្កើនការលក់លើសផែនការរបស់ក្រុមហ៊ុន ។
• បង្កើនការផ្សព្វផ្សាយ និងពង្រឹងកេរ្តិ៍ឈ្មោះផលិតផល និងកេរ្តិ៍ឈ្មោះក្រុមហ៊ុន ។
• ត្រូវដឹងពីទីតាំងភូមិសាស្រ្តតំបន់ត្រូវលក់ ។
• ទទួលទូរស័ព្ទ និងទូរស័ព្ទទំនាក់ទំនងអតិថិជនដើម្បីធ្វើការដោះស្រាយយ៉ាងឆាប់រហ័សនូវរាល់បញ្ហា និងការត្អូញត្អែររបស់អតិថិជន ដើម្បីបង្កើនការពេញចិត្តរបស់អតិថិជនដល់ចំនុចខ្ពស់បំផុត ។
• ស្រាវជ្រាវ តាមដាន និងវិភាគតម្រូវការទីផ្សារ និងគូប្រជែង រួចរាយការណ៍ជូនប្រធានក្រុម-ផ្នែក ដើម្បីយកឈ្នះលើទីផ្សារ ។
Job Requirement:
លក្ខខណ្ឌជ្រើសរើស
• មានបរិញ្ញប័ត្រផ្នែកទីផ្សារ រឺមានជំនាញដែលទាក់ទង។
• មានបទពិសោធន៍ការងារយ៉ាងតិចពី ៣ ឆ្នាំទៅ ៥ឆ្នាំក្នុងខាងផ្នែកលក់ឧបករណ៍សំណង់ កសិកម្ម។
• មានចំណេះដឹងភាសាអង់គ្លេស និងកុំព្យូទ័រ។
• ឧស្សាហ៍ព្យាមយាមនិងសហការល្អ មានអត្តចរិតស្លូតបូតក្នុងការអនុវត្តន៍ការងារ
• មានភាពស្មោះត្រង់ និងយកចិត្តទុកដាក់ចំពោះការងារ។
• មានទំនួសខុសត្រូវខ្ពស់ និងបេ្តជ្ញាចិត្តក្នុងការធ្វើការងារ។

ព័ត៌មានទំនាក់ទំនង
ការិយាល័យរដ្ឋបាល និងធនធានមនុស្ស
• ទូរស័ព្ទលេខ៖ ០៧៦ ២៣៤ ៧៥៥៩ /០៨៦ ៧៥១ ៤៣៣
• អ៊ីមែល៖ recruitment@tksgroup.com.kh
• ផ្ទះលេខ ១២A & ១៤A, ផ្លូវលេខ ៧០ សង្កាត់ ស្រៈចក ខណ្ឌ ដូនពេញ ភ្នំពេញ។
Contact Info: Contact Information HR & Admin Department Operation Director ០៧៦ ២៣៤ ៧៥៥៩ /០៨៦ ៧៥១ ៤៣៣ recruitment@tksgroup.com.kh លេខ ១២A & ១៤A, ផ្លូវលេខ ៧០ សង្កាត់ ស្រៈចក ខណ្ឌ ដូនពេញ ភ្នំពេញ ០៧៦ ២៣៤ ៧៥៥៩ /០៨៦ ៧៥១ ៤៣៣

job title: 机电工程师/土建工程师/装饰装修工程师/预算员/安全员/材料采购员/资料员
company_name: 上海宝冶（柬埔寨）有限公司
position: 机电工程师/土建工程师/装饰装修工程师/预算员/安全员/材料采购员/资料员
Job Description:
1.机电工程师
岗位职责及工作内容：负责专业材料、设备选型的合理性和报审工作；参与机电专业的招标、技术答疑、合同谈判、图纸会审工作；负责专业工程技术方案编制，技术问题解决；负责专业工程施工进度计划编制并落实；负责专业工程技术变更、日常验收、设备调试等；工作负责专业工程与其他专业之间的协调工作； 
专业要求：电气自动化专业及相关专业
2.土建工程师
岗位职责及工作内容：负责材料设备选型的合理性和报审工作；参与相关的招标、技术答疑、合同谈判、图纸会审工作；负责土建工程技术方案编制，技术问题解决；负责土建工程施工进度计划编制并落实；负责土建工程技术变更、日常验收、设备调试等工作；负责土建工程与其他专业之间的协调工作；领导安排的其他工作
专业要求：土木工程、工程管理、工程技术等专业
3.装饰装修工程师
岗位职责及工作内容：负责装饰装修材料设备选型的合理性和报审工作；参与相关的招标、技术答疑、合同谈判、图纸会审工作；负责装饰工程技术方案编制，技术问题解决；负责装饰工程施工进度计划编制并落实；负责装饰工程技术变更、日常验收、设备调试等工作负责装饰工程与其他专业之间的协调工作；领导安排的其他工作
专业要求：土木工程、工程管理、工程装饰装修灯专业
4.预算员
岗位职责及工作内容：负责项目工程成本要素计量；负责施工图预算和施工预算的编制，负责二算对比；负责项目“建造合同成本管理报表”；负责项目各类资源市场价格的汇集与管理；
专业要求：土木工程、工程管理、工程造价等专业
5.安全员
岗位职责及工作内容：协助施工经理做好工程项目安全管理工作；协助技术人员编制工程项目安全保证计划；组织项目部安全宣传活动；制定安全专项方案；
专业要求：安全管理、工程管理、安环管理等专业
6.材料采购员
岗位职责及工作内容：根据施工预算及计划、平衡现有资源、编制采购计划；在合格供方范围内实施采购，并负责采购合同的编写、会签；监管物资领用，按预算计划核发材料，积极开展利旧利废工作；负责所在项目物资计划、验收、报监、入库耗用、贮存防护等全过程的供应管理工作；
专业要求：工程管理、工程采购及贸易等专业
7．资料员
岗位职责及工作内容：工程报审资料整理；业主及分包来往资料收发；内部文件传递及汇总整理；项目经理安排的其他工作。
专业要求：与建筑工程专业有关等专业
Job Requirement:
三、应聘条件：
1、一般应取得毕业证书、学位证书。
2、具备本科及以上学历，专业知识扎实。
3、有较强的团队协作精神和沟通、协调、组织能力。
4、中文、英语能力优秀的优先考虑。
5、计算机办公软件操作较熟练。
6、身体素质好，积极乐观，能到外地施工现场工作。
四、福利待遇
1、公司将提供具有竞争力的薪酬、福利待遇和个人发展机会。
2、参加柬埔寨当地社会保险及医疗保险、意外伤害保险等。
3、出差补助、电话费、通勤费、餐补、防暑降温、高温补贴、年底双薪、参加当地医疗保险及社保等。
4、提供完善的教育培训与人才培养体系。
5、提供良好的晋升空间、发展通道。
6、员工享有探亲假、带薪休假、婚假、产检、特别假期等，以及当地法定假期
7、以上信息具体在面试时详谈。

job title: 综合管理员/合约管理员/预算员（土建）/预算员（机电）/材料员（现场）/检试验工程师/技术工程师
company_name: 上海宝冶（柬埔寨）有限公司
position: 综合管理员/合约管理员/预算员（土建）/预算员（机电）/材料员（现场）/检试验工程师/技术工程师
Job Description:
金边新国际机场飞行区项目
1.综合管理员 
工作职责：                                                                1.负责日常报表的制定                                                                  2.负责员工日常需求的采买                                                            3.负责员工报销及考勤                                                                4. 负责传达与处理公司要求的各类事物                                                  5.配合各部门需求招聘人才                                                            6.配合领导处理各项事宜                                                            

2.合约管理员:
工作职责：
1、负责对FIDIC合同条款解读与执行；
2、负责根据总包合同、指定分包合同、自行分包合同的合同条款，进行合同的履约工作；
3、负责与业主、分包商合同执行过程中的，往来函件的发送与回复，及日常基础资料收集等；
4、进行合同及资料管理工作。


3.预算员（土建）
工作职责：
1、负责机场场道、土建工程算量，清单编制；
2、负责机场场道、土建工程施工图预算编制；
3、负责对业主工程量上报的基础资料编制；
4、负责对场道、土建分包的工程量审核工作；
5、提交分包付款计划；
6、配合预算主管完成分包招标工作。


4.预算员（机电）:
工作职责：
1、负责机场水电、消防、灯光照明等专业工程算量，清单编制；
2、负责机场水电、消防、灯光照明等专业工程施工图预算编制；
3、负责对业主工程量上报的基础资料编制；
4、负责对水电、消防、灯光照明等专业分包的工程量审核工作；
5、提交分包付款计划；
6、配合预算主管完成分包招标工作。


5.材料员（现场）
工作职责：
1、负责现场收料验收；
2、负责内业资料工作；
3、负责材料招采计划的实施；
4、负责出入库的登记做账等；
5、负责材料付款计划的提交工作。                    


6.检试验工程师
工作职责：
1、负责制定测试产品的测试计划、方案；
2、熟悉机场跑道材料试验工作的方针、政策和规定；
3、负责组织选定试验方法、质量标准和技术规则，检查试验安全措施的落实情况；
4、负责校核试验报告单；
5、交办的其他工作。                    


7.技术工程师
工作职责：
1、参与科技开发工作；
2、参与CAD画图、方案编制、PPT汇报编辑、word文档编辑等工作；
3、负责技术交底、技术指导；
4、交办的其他工作。                    


7.计划工程师
工作职责：
1、负责编制进度计划、生产任务；
2、负责编制相关报表；
3、负责技术交底、技术指导；
4、交办的其他工作。
Job Requirement:
金边新国际机场飞行区项目
1.综合管理员 
岗位职责：                                                                           1.熟练掌握word、excel等各类办公软件                                                      2.中文听说读写精通优先                                                                3.善于交流、人品端正、认真负责、有强烈的求知欲望                                        4.年龄25-30岁

4、善于交流、人品端正、认真负责、热爱学习。

岗位要求：
1、熟练掌握材料设备的质量、规格、性能等；
2、了解FAA及FIDIC合同等相关技术标准中的材料、设备要求；
3、做好材料出入库管理，及时按照公司要求做好内业资料；
4、善于交流、人品端正、认真负责、热爱学习。

6.检试验工程师                  
岗位要求：
1、熟练掌握材料设备的质量、规格、性能等；
2、了解FAA及FIDIC合同等相关技术标准中的材料、设备要求；
3、熟悉FAA机场相关材料的检测及试验；
4、有相关工作经验，会中英柬语者优先考虑。

7.技术工程师                   
岗位要求：
1、熟悉科技开发相关工作；
2、熟练操作excle、project、word等办公软件；
3、有相关工作经验，会中英柬语者优先考虑。

7.计划工程师

2、熟练操作excle、project、P6等办公软件；
3、有相关工作经验，会中英柬语者优先考虑。

job title: 金边新国际机场飞行区项目急招安全员/BIM工程师/计划工程师/技术工程师（科技与技术）/技术工程师（场道、机电专业）
company_name: 上海宝冶（柬埔寨）有限公司
position: 金边新国际机场飞行区项目急招安全员/BIM工程师/计划工程师/技术工程师（科技与技术）/技术工程师（场道、机电专业）
Job Description:
安全员
工作职责：                                                                1.协助项目经理建立安全生产保证体系、安全防护保证体系、机械安全保证体系。                                                                 2.纠正一切违章指挥、违章作业的行为和不安全状态。                                                          3.肩负管理和检查监督两个职能，宣传和执行国家及上级主管部门有关安全生产、劳动保护的法规和规定，协助领导做好安全生产管理工作。                                                              4.做好安全生产中规定资料的记录、收集、整理和保管。                                               5.按职权范围和标准对违反安全操作规程和违章指挥人员进行处罚。

BIM工程师
工作职责：
1、负责BIM的实施方案、制度的建立；
2、建模：机场、排水沟、给水、消火栓、消防管道的三维建模；
3、模型集成与优化：在Naviswork和Infraworks中进行整体专业3D模型集成与优化；
4、机场、排水沟、管道之间的碰撞分析；
5、利用Prepare3d对集成模型进行可视化分析和飞行仿真。 

计划工程师
工作职责：
1、负责编制进度计划、生产任务；
2、负责编制相关PPT/报表；
3、负责技术交底、技术指导；
4、交办的其他工作。                    

技术工程师（科技与技术）
工作职责：
1、负责组织科技开发一系列工作；
2、负责施工过程中的技术指导；
3、负责科技文件的收集、编制、归档等资料管理；
4、交办的其他工作。                    

技术工程师（场道、机电专业）
工作职责：
1、负责各个施工阶段的方案编制；
2、负责施工过程中的技术指导；
3、负责方案等文件的收集、编制、归档等资料管理；
4、交办的其他工作。
Job Requirement:
安全员
岗位职责：                                                                           1.熟练掌握word、excel等各类办公软件                                                      2.中文听说读写精通优先                                                                3.善于交流、人品端正、认真负责、有强烈的求知欲望                                        4.有获得相应证书，有在相应岗位从事相关工作者优先。  

BIM工程师                
岗位要求：
1、有BIM相关工作经验；
2、熟悉排水、给水、消防等图纸；
3、熟悉revit、Naviswork、Infraworks、Prepare3d软件的操作应用；
4、有BIM实操相关工作经验。

计划工程师
岗位要求：
1、熟悉机场建设相关工作、施工流程；
2、熟练操作excle、project、P6、ppt等办公软件；
3、有相关工作经验，具备进度计划编制能力，会中文并能用中文进行办公。 

技术工程师（科技与技术）
岗位要求：
1、熟悉工程方面的科技开发；
2、熟练操作CAD/PPT/word等办公软件；
3、有一定的组织协调能力，具备2年工程实践经验，会中文并能用中文进行办公。

技术工程师（场道、机电专业）
岗位要求：
1、所学专业为场道、机电专业或者熟悉场道、机电施工；
2、熟练操作CAD/PPT/word等办公软件；
3、有一定的组织协调能力，具备方案编制能力，会中文并能用中文进行办公。

Job Description:
• Develop and implement marketing strategy to meet established sales and market shares target.
• Responsible for leading, developing and implementing: the brand strategy, market research, communication strategy, media planning and promotion strategy.
• Responsible for driving and developing marketing campaigns for the brands, managing brand’s profitability and A&P budgeting, growing brand volume share growth and tracking all key brand health tracking indicators.
• Responsible for brand communications that cover ATL national campaigns and new brand visual for through-the-line development and channel visibility.
• Responsible for key relations with ATL, media, digital and PR agencies, external media partners and key internal stakeholders within organization. Main ATL focus is on Print, TV, Cinema, Radio, Outdoor and Digital.
• Research and analyse the marketplace and target consumer to proactively respond to changing customer demands, market trends and gain insights on the consumer.
• Manage day-to-day activities associated to all marketing efforts including project management, creative development, cross-functional implementation, campaign tracking and reporting as necessary as related to brand development and performance.
• Work closely with Trade Marketing and Sales teams to drive integration and execution of plans.
• Be the brand advocate through promoting and educating the internal audience on the brand initiatives, programs, values, attributes etc.
• Provide support in Corporate Relations, Corporate Communications, CSR matters
Job Requirement:
• Master/Bachelor’s degree in Sale & Marketing
• At least 5 years of experience in Sales & Marketing/ Brand management 
• Knowledge of market research and analysis 
• Knowledge of business models and strategy 
• Good computer literature: Microsoft Office (Word, Excel, and PowerPoint) 
• Valid driver’s license 
• Good negotiation and interpersonal skills
• Good speaking and writing in English
• Ability to think creatively and indicatively
• Good time management and leadership skill
• Good problem-solving skill
• Attended to detail and mature 
• Able to work independent and as a team

PTC Computer Co. Ltd was established in Phnom Penh since 1996. As a result, we are the Authorized Distributor of over fifteen brands.

Job Description: Drafter responsibilities include gathering drawings and specifications, calculating material and equipment requirements and setting up production methods. If you have hands-on experience with computer-aided design (CAD) software and are familiar with building processes, we’d like to meet you.Ultimately, you will help us build functional, secure and well-designed products and structures that meet our needs.•This role reports to Head of Design & Shop Drawing Department.•Has exceptional modern design sense•Assisting in preparing for conceptual diagrams and presentations•Develop & implement quality of production according to building codes, law, requirements and architectural graphic standards•Develop & implement the smooth flowing of the operation system from concept, schematic design through the development of construction documents as per guidance from the Project Manager and/ or Project Leader.•To exhibit strong technical expertise with clear understanding of space requirements, materials, color, lighting systems and construction methods.•To exhibit strong computer skills in software such as AutoCAD, sketch up, 3Dmax, and all of its functions•To exhibit strong detailing skills such as wall sections, windows and doors sections, structural joints, finishing materials and carpentry construction.•To exhibit strong rendering skills using programs like V-ray render.•To exhibit good model making skills and good understanding of the concept model, schematic model, site model, building model and detail model is a plus.•To coordinate with Project Manager involved and the production team in developing project plans such as project feasibility, financial, quantity estimation, marketing materials, master planning design, scheduling and technical expertise•Taking design direction from pre-concept through design development and detailing•Inspire passion for elevating design within the firm.•Coordinating with suppliers and sourcing for design materials.•Other tasks assigned by supervisor.
Job Requirement: •Bachelor architectural degree from an accredited institution•Minimum 1 year’s relevant experience (post-grad)•AutoCAD proficiency, 3D proficiency and Adobe creative suite a must, Max rendering skill a plus•Familiarity with international building codes•Currently living in or ability to move to Phnom Penh, Cambodia•Good English language communication skills•Work examples that demonstrate a strong design sensibility and superior technical knowledge•Ability to produce detailed and coordinated construction documents•Comfort with multi-tasking and collaboration within a context of fast-paced projects•Ability to use multiple media (hand sketching through advanced digital) to develop, test, and communicate design ideas quickly and effectively
