company_name: ក្រុមហ៊ុន ម៉េងលី ជេ. គួច អេឌ្យូខេសិន (Mengly J. Quach Education)
Job Description:
Play a role as receptionist:
• When patient is arrived, Check ID Card, Check in, Print Treatment forms and find patient file.
• For new patient, ask patient to complete form first then register to create a new file for patient, check in and print treatment form.
• Both of action above is done then take patient with file to Nurse to take vital sign, brief chief complaint and the nurse take patient to see doctor.

Cashier:

• First verify Prescription with the file and system, make sure that is all are correct then print invoice for patient to sign for staff free, for cash payment print invoice for patient to sign and received cash.
• After seeing doctor, get medications, invoice payment sign check out patient.
• All cash received for all day have to pay to Bursar and sign received note from them.
• Hold cash float $100 for exchange in daily operation, this cash is kept in closed locker and secure place.

Insurance Patient:

• Scan Patient ID Card and print to keep in file.
• Write down in the insurance form describe about the accident, what does it happen, time, place and all kind of injury, fracture…etc.
• Print invoice for patient sign all time when patient seen by doctor.
• When the patient insurance is closed must total al the payment and issue to Bursar.

Patients file:

• Check for all patient who has seen doctor today organized file in the chat and keep in the file room.
• Check for all stationary, request to refill stock.
• Check for all patient form and copy for making a new file.
• All new patient file who is seen by doctor, print patient code to attach to file, making a new file chart then keep in the file room by swift numbers easy to find next time.  

Patients Care:
• Process patients into the Student Health Center.
• Triage patient when she/he arrived to Student Health Center.
• In case patient in not urgent or not emergency let patient wait to consult with doctor.
• In case the patient is in urgent or emergent let patient lie down in the bed, take vital sign brief chief complaint write in the chart and calling to see doctor first and complete process to help patient as soon as possible.
• For patient is not urgent or emergency, Help patient to complete patient form for new patient.
• Ask patient history, does she/he has any severe allergy with medication or food.
• Register patient’s information in to database and in the patient’s chat.
• Take vital sign, Chief Complaint, weight and high then calling to doctor to consult with patient by phone and provide treatment. 
• In case patient has accident and injuries, clean wound and do other procedure for patient.
• In case patient has trauma or fracture need to do bandage to prevent immobilization and transfer to Central MTT-SHC for further management and treatment.
• While patient in SHC, administer Medication for patient and observation as doctor’s advice.
• Nursing note and documentation in the patient note.
• Observe vital sign intake and output in case patient has vomiting, diarrhea and high fever.
• Assist patient as needed (Sponge bath to reduce fever, to bathroom, or walking…etc.). 
• To be flexible and quickly to help patient setting.
• Clean and organize all medical supplies and hand washing before and after touching patient to be prevention Nosocomial infection.
• Organize patient bed and keeping the patient’s area clean and tidy.
•  Clean and Control clinic environment in the SHC is always cleaned and hygiene.   

Pharmacy:

• Dispensary medication by doctor’s prescription and explains to patients to use for the right way at home 
•  Organize medication in the Medication Cabinet by alphabet, check for expired date, Stock control, physical count, amount of medication every week to verify with stock in database. 
•  Request order medications from MTT-SHC to refill stock.
•  Medication monthly Physical count and report to Head Nurse at Central SHC at MTT.
•  Medication is keeping safety in the cabinet and always locked.
•  Help to prepare Medication and Dispensary for Dr. Quach Mobile clinic.
•  After Dr. Quach Mobile clinic help to do physical count medication and keep it back then give statistic to Head Nurse to do report to finance and MJQF and Group of operation unit.

Medical Equipments:

• Know how to operate all medical equipment being used in Student Health Center.
• Recognize all new medical equipment and how to use it.
• Proper use medical equipment and responsibility for all of them.
• Clean and organize Medical equipment after used it and peek back the same place.
• Teaching:
• Instruction to patient how to take medication with the right way at home.
• Teach to Patient about nutrition which is related to their diseases.
• Instruction to patient to avoid alcohol during taking medication.
• Explain patient to see doctor by follow up or come back as soon if not better.
• Medical Team demonstration First Aid to teacher and student.
• Teaching to Patient for new disease, prevention and announcement.
• Teaching to student or Staff about hygiene.

Communications: Team Work:

• Work as team and communicate with receptionist front desk, Doctor, Head nurse, Laboratory to help to improve our primary care for staff, student and patients.
• Work as team to promote to sell our package to student families and staff family
•  Good relationship with customers, student and all staff in all departments. 
•  Provide First Aid for student and Staff for field trips.
Job Requirement:
• At least bachelor degree in Nursing or relevant major 
• Fresh graduate are encourage to apply
• 3 years of professional working experience in this field
• Good customer services for all patients and good communication departments
• Computer sciences Microsoft word, Excel, Power point, database, internet searching, e-mail and class lectures
• Result Driven and Proactive 
• Branch ChroyChangva.

** How to apply:
1. Please send your Cover Letter, CV with 4x6 Current Photo to us by email hr@mjqeducation.edu.kh, and only short-list candidates will be notified.
2. Please always put your email subject as “Application for…………. (Position you applied)’’, and rename as your attached file in your full name, e.g. CV_Name. 
3. Please put all your attached documents into one file as combining as PDF file only.
Address: #11A, St. 402, Sangkat Tumnup Teuk, Khan Boeung Keng Kang, Phnom Penh.
Visit our website: www.mjqeducation.edu.kh.
Contact us via: (855) 12 797 939, Mon-Fri, 8:00am to 6:00pm.

ក្រុមហ៊ុនផ្តល់អត្ថប្រយោជន៍ជាច្រើន ជូនដល់បុគ្គលិករបស់ខ្លួន ដែលក្នុងនោះរួមមាន៖

•  ប្រាក់បៀវត្សរ៍ប្រកួតប្រជែងជាមួយទីផ្សារ
•  ប័ណ្ណធានារ៉ាប់រងសុខភាព ប.ស.ស. និងធានារ៉ាប់រងលើគ្រោះថ្នាក់ការងារ២៤ម៉ោង នៅទូទាំងពិភពលោក
•  ច្បាប់ឈប់សម្រាកលំហែមាតុភាព បិតុភាព និងច្បាប់អាពាហ៍ពិពាហ៍
•  ច្បាប់ឈប់សម្រាកប្រចាំឆ្នាំ និងច្បាប់ឈឺ
• ច្បាប់ឈប់សម្រាកបុណ្យជាតិដោយមានប្រាក់ឈ្នួល យោងតាមសេចក្តីប្រកាសរបស់ក្រសួងការងារ និងបណ្តុះបណ្តាលវិជ្ជាជីវៈ
•  ឱកាសអភិវឌ្ឍអាជីពការងាររបស់ខ្លួន
•  វគ្គបណ្ដុះបណ្ដាលល្អៗសម្រាប់ការអភិវឌ្ឍអាជីពការងារ
•  អាហារូបករណ៍ដល់បុគ្គលិក និងសមាជិកគ្រួសាររបស់បុគ្គលិក
•  ការតម្លើងប្រាក់បៀវត្សរ៍ប្រចាំឆ្នាំ ដោយផ្អែកលើបទពិសោធន៏ការងារ និងតាមការវាយតម្លៃគុណភាពការងារ
•  ប្រាក់បំណាច់អតីតភាពការងារ
Company Profile:
Mengly J. Quach Education (MJQE) is known as a unique education system for its superior quality, discipline and services. It is remarkably consistent with the use creative, innovative, and critical thinking to make a difference for our young generations. We are always optimistic that our standard system will surly provide the best education for our kids and help shape their life to act with respect towards themselves.

MJQE is in a restructuring period of change. MJQE focuses its efforts to ensure all students have the academic and personal skills required to succeed in college and life. Currently, MJQE is one of the 4 companies in the MJQ Group (MJQ Education, Prasethpheap Finance, MJQ Travel and the Mengly J. Quach Media Network (MMN)). MJQ Education has 4 school-companies (Aii Language Center (Aii), American Intercon School (AIS), Go Overseas Study Overseas (SOGO) and i-Learn). There are 7 campuses of Aii and 8 campuses of AIS throughout Cambodia serving more than 17,000 students with more than 500,000 alumni since 2005. 

The MJQE is committed to building talented and committed students and providing the appropriate supports to schools to ensure all students can be successful.

MJQE is an Equal Opportunity Employer. MJQE ensures equal employment opportunities regardless of race, creed, sex, color, national origin, religion, age, sexual orientation, disability, citizenship status, political affiliation, marital status or other human differences. MJQE has a policy of active recruitment of qualified minority employees.
Our Benefits:
Competitive salary 
- Scholarship for employee, employee's children, and spouse 
- NSSF and 24 - hour worldwide accident insurance 
- Maternity, paternity, and marriage benefits
- Benefits as compliance to Prakas of Ministry of Labor and Vocational Training 
- Career advancement opportunities 
- Training opportunities for professional development 
- Annual salary increment based on experience and performance review.

Job Description:
• Administer all servers’ services to make sure they are all properly running
• Administer all storages to make sure they are all well-functioning
• Analyze technology trends on servers and storages and propose the latest technology solutions
• Conduct regular preventative maintenance and administer the servers and storage of DC and DR sites.
• Actively involved in the discussion of IT issue and its status, provide feedback on the effectiveness of post- IT corrections process and give recommendation for change
• Encourage and promote a collaborative, trust and transparent working culture
• Other tasks assigned by Assistant IT Network and System Manager
Job Requirement:
• Bachelor’s Degree in Computer Science or relevant field.
• At least 5 years of servers and storage experience
• Certified VMware, MCSE is preferred
• Experience in Server and storage vendor or Microfinance or Banking sector is preferred
• Good analysis and troubleshooting system and configuration
• Experienced in
• Honesty, excellent interpersonal skills, strong negotiation • skills and attention to detail
• Ability to apply IT solutions to business challenges in a cost-effective manner
• Ability to manage teams
• Meticulous approach to analysis, evaluation and problem solving
• Staff supervision, training/coaching 
• Good written and spoken English

company_name: ក្រុមហ៊ុន ម៉េងលី ជេ. គួច អេឌ្យូខេសិន (Mengly J. Quach Education)
Job Description:
● គ្រប់គ្រងដំណើរការរៀន និងបង្រៀនប្រចាំថ្ងៃ
● ដោះស្រាយបញ្ហាសិស្សានុសិស្សថ្នាក់ទី៧ ដល់ថ្នាក់ទី៩។
● ជួបអ្នកអាណាព្យាបាលសិស្សទាក់ទងនឹងការសិក្សារបស់សិស្សថ្នាក់ទី៧ ដល់ថ្នាក់ទី៩។
● តាមដានការបង្រៀនរបស់គ្រូមធ្យមសិក្សាបឋមភូមិ និងការរៀនរបស់សិស្សានុសិស្សថ្នាក់ទី៧ ដល់ទី៩(Do round)។
● អនុញ្ញាតច្បាប់ឈប់សម្រាកប្រចាំថ្ងៃរបស់គ្រូមធ្យមសិក្សាបឋមភូមិ និងចាត់ចែងគ្រូជំនួស។ 
● ចូលរួមសកម្មភាពផ្សេងៗរបស់វិទ្យាស្ថាន និងសាលារៀន អន្តរទ្វីប អាមេរិកាំង។
● ផ្សព្វផ្សាយបញ្ជូនព័ត៌មានសាលាទៅលោកគ្រូ អ្នកគ្រូ ឱ្យទាន់ពេលវេលា។
● បំពេញភារកិច្ចផ្សេងៗតាមការចាំបាច់របស់គណៈគ្រប់គ្រងសាលា។
● ចេញមើល និងរៀបចំសុវត្ថិភាពសិស្សពេលចូលរៀន និងចេញទៅផ្ទះ។
● មើលការខុសត្រូវសម្ភាររូបវ័ន្តសាលារៀនក្នុងអគារ លីម គីម ណយ។
● គ្រប់គ្រង និងសម្របសម្រួលថ្នាក់ជំនាញថ្ងៃសៅរ៍។
● គ្រប់គ្រង់ និងសម្របសម្រួលថ្នាក់បំប៉នពេលល្ងាច (FD)។
● ការងារគរុកោសល្យ
● ដឹកនាំលោកគ្រូ អ្នកគ្រូរៀបចំ និងអភិវឌ្ឍកម្មវិធីសិក្សាប្រចាំឆ្នាំពីថ្នាក់ទី៧ ដល់ទី៩។
● ការចុះសង្តេតខ្លីលើការបង្រៀនរបស់លោកគ្រូ អ្នកគ្រូ (Sport Check)។
● ចុះអធិការកិច្ចលើការបង្រៀនរបស់លោកគ្រូ អ្នកគ្រូ។
● ផ្តល់មតិយោបល់កែលម្អលើការបង្រៀនរបស់លោកគ្រូ អ្នកគ្រូ (Feed-Back)។
● ចូលរួមប្រជុំក្រុមបច្ចេកទេសគ្រប់មុខវិជ្ជា។
● រៀបចំ និងដឹកនាំលោកគ្រូ អ្នកគ្រូរៀបចំថ្នាក់និទស្សន៍តាមមុខវិជ្ជា។
● ដឹកនាំកម្មវិធីចុះកម្មសិក្សារបស់សិស្ស(Study Tour)។
● រៀបចំ និងដឹកនាំកម្មវិធីទស្សនកិច្ចសិក្សារបស់សិស្សានុសិស្សថ្នាក់ទី៧ ដល់ទី៩(Field Trip)។
● តាមដានលទ្ធផលការសិក្សារបស់សិស្សានុសិស្ស និង សហការដោះស្រាយជាមួយអ្នកប្រឹក្សា សិក្សាសាលា។
● សម្របសម្រួលការងារផ្នែកបច្ចេកទេសបង្រៀន និង រៀនដល់លោកគ្រូ អ្នកគ្រូ និងសិស្សានុសិស្ស។
● ការងាររដ្ឋបាល
● ជាជំនួយប្រធានសាខាលើការងារគ្រប់គ្រងគ្រូបង្រៀន សិស្សានុសិស្ស និង បុគ្គលិកការិយាល័យសិក្សា។ 
● គ្រប់គ្រងឯកសាររដ្ឋបាលដែលទាក់ទងនឹងផ្នែកមធ្យមសិក្សាបឋមភូមិ។
● រៀបចំផែនការការងារប្រចាំសាលារៀន អន្តរទ្វីប អាមេរិកាំង។
● ចូលរួមប្រជុំគណៈកម្មការសាលារៀន អន្តរទ្វីប អាមេរិកាំង។
● ចូលរួមប្រជុំតាមការចាំបាច់របស់គណៈគ្រប់គ្រង។
● រៀបចំកម្មវិធីប្រឡងពាក់កណ្តាលឆមាស និងឆមាស។
● ត្រួតពិនិត្យ និងកែតម្រូវវិញ្ញាសាប្រឡងពាក់កណ្តាលឆមាស និងឆមាស។
● ចូលរួមប្រជុំរៀបចំផែនការការងារសម្រាប់ឆ្នាំសិក្សាបន្តបន្ទាប់។
● រៀបចំកម្មវិធីប្រឡងឡើងថ្នាក់។
● ចូលរួមប្រជុំជាមួយក្រុមបច្ចេកទេសគ្រប់មុខវិជ្ជា។
● ស្វែងរកទីតាំង រៀបចំកម្មវិធី បញ្ជីឈ្មោះសិស្ស និងដឹកនាំសិស្សចូលរួមដំណើរទស្សន កិច្ចសិក្សា។
● ចូលរួមប្រជុំជាមួយផ្នែកលេខាកម្មវិធីសិក្សា។
● ដឹកនាំ និងចូលរួមប្រជុំជាមួយលោកគ្រូ អ្នកគ្រូបន្ទុកថ្នាក់។
● សហការជាមួយគ្រូបន្ទុកថ្នាក់ រៀបចំកាលវិភាគប្រចាំថ្ងៃសម្រាប់សិស្សអានពត៌មាន។
● រៀបចំកាលវិភាគសិក្សារបស់សិស្សប្រចាំសប្តាហ៍។
● រៀបចំកាលវិភាគបង្រៀនរបស់គ្រូប្រចាំសប្តាហ៍។
● ត្រួតពិនិត្យ និងចុះហត្ថលេខាTime Sheet ប្រចាំខែរបស់លោកគ្រូ អ្នកគ្រូមធ្យមសិក្សាបឋមភូមិ។
● ត្រួតពិនិត្យ Sick Leave Annual Leave ប្រចាំខែរបស់លោកគ្រូ អ្នកគ្រូ ពេញម៉ោង និងពាក់កណ្តាលពេញម៉ោង។
●ត្រួតពិនិត្យ និងរៀបចំកិច្ចសន្យាការងាររបស់គ្រូ។
●សម្ភាសន៍សិស្សថ្មី។
●សម្ភាសន៍គ្រូ និងបុគ្គលិកថ្មី។
●រៀបចំបញ្ជីប្រាក់បៀវត្សរ៍ប្រចាំខែជូនលោកគ្រូ អ្នកគ្រូ។
●ពិនិត្យសៀវភៅតាមដាន និងចុះហត្ថលេខាឱ្យទាន់ពេលវេលារៀងរាល់ខែ។
●ចូលរួមប្រចាំការក្នុងកម្មវិធីរៀនបំប៉នសិស្សខ្វះមូលដ្ឋានគ្រឹះ។
●រៀបចំសិស្សតាមថ្នាក់ឱ្យមានចំនួនសមស្របតាមនិយាមគរុកោសល្យ។
●ទទួលខុសត្រូវក្នុងការត្រួតពិនិត្យលទ្ធផលពិន្ទុរបស់សិស្សរៀងរាល់ខែឱ្យបានទាន់ពេលវេលា និងត្រឹមត្រូវ។
●រៀបចំបំណែងចែកភារកិច្ចគណៈកម្មការអនុរក្សប្រឡងពាក់កណ្តាលឆមាស និងឆមាស។
●ទទួលខុសត្រូវលើកម្មវិធី៣គឺ៖ ការប្រកួតល្បងប្រាជ្ញាគណិតវិទ្យា ដំណើរទស្សនកិច្ចសិក្សា សិស្សថ្នាក់ទី៧ ដល់ទី៩ និង ការប្រឡងឡើងថ្នាក់ នឹងរៀនត្រៀមឆ្នាំសិក្សាថ្មី។
●សហការជាមួយផ្នែករដ្ឋបាលអប់រំក្នុងការរៀបចំសំណុំឯកសារសិស្សថ្នាក់ទី៧ ដល់ទី៩ ទៅកាន់មន្ទីរអប់រំ យុវជន និងកីឡា។
●សហការជាមួយផ្នែកគណនេយ្យ ទាក់ទងនឹងការបង់ប្រាក់យឺតរបស់សិស្សានុសិស្សថ្នាក់ទី៧ ដល់ទី៩។
●ស្រាវជ្រាវរកបច្ចេកទេសថ្មីៗទាក់ទងនឹងការងារគ្រប់គ្រង និងការអប់រំ។
➢	●ការងារគ្រប់គ្រង
●រៀបចំបេសកម្មផ្ទាល់ខ្លួន។
●ការងារកម្មវិធីប្រឡងពាក់កណ្តាលឆមាស និងឆមាស
●ការងារប្រជុំប្រធាន-អនុប្រធានក្រុមបច្ចេកទេស
●រៀបចំគោលដៅសម្រាប់ការងារផ្ទាល់ខ្លួន។
●ការងាររៀបចំសិក្ខាសាលាផ្សេងៗរបស់សិស្សានុសិស្ស
●ធានាលើការងារបង្រៀនរបស់គ្រូប្រចាំថ្ងៃប្រកបដោយប្រសិទ្ធភាព។
●សម្របសម្រួលការងារបង្រៀនរបស់គ្រូប្រចាំថ្ងៃ។
●រៀបចំកាលវិភាគបង្រៀនរបស់គ្រូប្រចាំសប្តាហ៍។
●រៀបចំកាលវិភាគបង្រៀនរបស់គ្រូ និងសិស្សសម្រាប់កម្មវិធីបំប៉នត្រៀមឆ្នាំថ្មី និងប្រឡងឡើង ថ្នាក់(ប្រឡងសង)។
●វាយតម្លៃលើការងារបង្រៀនរបស់គ្រូ។
●ចូលរួមជ្រើសរើសគ្រូបង្រៀន តាមតម្រូវការរបស់សាលា។
●ចាត់ចែងលោកគ្រូ អ្នកគ្រូជំនួសថ្នាក់ និងចុះហត្ថលេខាលើកំណត់ត្រាម៉ោងជំនួសរបស់លោកគ្រូ អ្នកគ្រូ។
●ចូលរួមរង្វាយតម្លៃស្នាដៃការងាររបស់លោកគ្រូ អ្នកគ្រូប្រចាំឆមាស និង ចុះហត្ថលេខាលើមតិរង្វាយតម្លៃ បណ្ណសរសើរលោកគ្រូ អ្នកគ្រូបឋមភូមិ និងបណ្ណសរសើរសិស្សថ្នាក់ទី៧ ដល់ទី៩។
● ពិនិត្យមើលការប្រឡងរបស់លោកគ្រូ អ្នកគ្រូ កុំឱ្យមានបញ្ហា។
● ទទួលខុសត្រូវចំពោះគណៈគ្រប់គ្រងនូវរាល់ការងារដែលបានប្រគល់ជូន។
● ការងារទំនាក់ទំនង
● ទំនាក់ទំនងជាមួយក្រុមការងារក្នុងស្ថាប័ន។
● ទំនាក់ទំនងជាមួយមន្ត្រី មន្ទីរអប់រំ រាជធានីភ្នំពេញ។
● ទំនាក់ទំនងជាមួយនាយកសាលារដ្ឋ (សាលាពាក់ព័ន្ធ)។
● ទំនាក់ទំនងជាមួយមាតាបិតា ឬអ្នកអាណាព្យាបាលសិស្ស។
● ទំនាក់ទំនងជាមួយស្ថាប័នផ្សេងៗពាក់ព័ន្ធវិស័យអប់រំ។
Job Requirement:
➢	មានបរិញ្ញាប្រជាន់ខ្ពស់ លើមុខជំនាញអប់រំ។ 
➢	មានសញ្ញាប័ត្រគរុកោសល្យ (គ្រូកម្រិតឧត្តម)។
➢	មានបរិញ្ញាប្រជាន់ខ្ពស់ លើមុខជំនាញអប់រំ។ 
➢	មានសញ្ញាប័ត្រគរុកោសល្យ (គ្រូកម្រិតឧត្តម)។
➢	មានគំនិតផ្តួចផ្តើមថ្មីក្នុងការអភិវឌ្ឍសមត្ថភាពគរុកោសល្យ
Company Profile:
Mengly J. Quach Education (MJQE) is known as a unique education system for its superior quality, discipline and services. It is remarkably consistent with the use creative, innovative, and critical thinking to make a difference for our young generations. We are always optimistic that our standard system will surly provide the best education for our kids and help shape their life to act with respect towards themselves.

MJQE is in a restructuring period of change. MJQE focuses its efforts to ensure all students have the academic and personal skills required to succeed in college and life. Currently, MJQE is one of the 4 companies in the MJQ Group (MJQ Education, Prasethpheap Finance, MJQ Travel and the Mengly J. Quach Media Network (MMN)). MJQ Education has 4 school-companies (Aii Language Center (Aii), American Intercon School (AIS), Go Overseas Study Overseas (SOGO) and i-Learn). There are 7 campuses of Aii and 8 campuses of AIS throughout Cambodia serving more than 17,000 students with more than 500,000 alumni since 2005. 

The MJQE is committed to building talented and committed students and providing the appropriate supports to schools to ensure all students can be successful.

MJQE is an Equal Opportunity Employer. MJQE ensures equal employment opportunities regardless of race, creed, sex, color, national origin, religion, age, sexual orientation, disability, citizenship status, political affiliation, marital status or other human differences. MJQE has a policy of active recruitment of qualified minority employees.
Our Benefits:
Competitive salary 
- Scholarship for employee, employee's children, and spouse 
- NSSF and 24 - hour worldwide accident insurance 
- Maternity, paternity, and marriage benefits
- Benefits as compliance to Prakas of Ministry of Labor and Vocational Training 
- Career advancement opportunities 
- Training opportunities for professional development 
- Annual salary increment based on experience and performance review.
Contact Info: Contact Information HR Department   012 797 939 hr@mjqeducation.edu.kh #11A, St. 402, Sangkat Tumnup Teuk, Khan Boeung Keng Kang, Phnom Penh. 012 797 939

job title: គ្រូ​ បង្រៀនហែលទឹក
company_name: ក្រុមហ៊ុន ម៉េងលី ជេ. គួច អេឌ្យូខេសិន (Mengly J. Quach Education)
position: គ្រូ​ បង្រៀនហែលទឹក
Job Description:
• គោរពបទបញ្ជាផ្ទៃក្នុងរបស់សាលា
• អនុវត្តកម្មវិធីសិក្សាឱ្យស្របតាមកម្មវិធីសិក្សារបស់ក្រសួងអប់រំ យុវជន និងកីឡា
• អនុវត្តកិច្ចតែងបង្ហាត់ ឬការត្រៀមសង្ខេបមេរៀនក្នុងការបង្ហាត់សិស្សជាប្រចាំ
• បង្កើតសំណួរ ឬវិញ្ញាសា និងអត្រាកំណែ ប្រឡងប្រចាំខែ ពាក់កណ្តាលឆមាសលើកទី១ ពាក់កណ្តាលឆមាសលើកទី២  ឆមាសលើកទី១ និងឆមាសលើកទី២ ប្រកបដោយគុណភាព បច្ចេកទេស
• វាយតម្លៃប្រចាំខែ លើការសិក្សារបស់សិស្សតាមរយៈសកម្មភាពសិក្សាក្នុងថ្នាក់ ( វិន័យ និងសីលធម៌ ២០%  សកម្មភាពប្រតិបត្តិពេលហ្វឹកហាត់នៅលើទីលាន ២០%  អវត្តមាន១០%)  និងពេលប្រឡង៥០%។
• សិក្សាស្រាវជ្រាវបន្ថែម លើវិធីសាស្រ្តល្អៗក្នុងការបង្រៀន និងបង្កើតនូវវប្បធម៌ចែករំលែកគ្នារាល់បទពិសោធន៍ការងារ
• ធ្វើជាទូតដ៏ល្អរបស់ស្ថាបន
• គោរពមនសិការវិជ្ជាជីវៈគ្រូបង្រៀនឱ្យបាន១០០%
• ចូលរួមសកម្មភាពផ្សេងៗរបស់សាលាសម្រាប់ផ្តល់នូវការអប់រំសីលធម៌ដល់សិស្សានុសិស្ស។
• ធ្វើខ្លួនជាគំរូល្អ ទៅកាន់សិស្សានុសិស្ស និងបុគ្គលិករួមការងារ
• ផ្តល់របាយការណ៍ប្រចាំខែឱ្យចាងហ្វាងទទួលបន្ទុកផ្ទាល់អំពីការអនុវត្តន៍បំណែងចែកកម្មវិធីសិក្សា ឬដំណើរការនៃការបង្ហាត់បង្រៀន លទ្ធផលសិក្សារបស់សិស្ស (លទ្ធផលវិជ្ជាមាន និងចំណុចដែល ត្រូវអភិវឌ្ឍ) តាមខែនីមួយ។
• បញ្ចូលពិន្ទុប្រឡងប្រចាំខែនីមួយៗ ពាក់កណ្តាលឆមាស ឆមាស ក្នុងប្រព័ន្ធពិន្ទុ (DATA BASE) និងផ្តល់របាយការណ៍ពិន្ទុជូនផ្នែកលេខាធិការឱ្យបានមុនថ្ងៃទី២៥ ឬតាមការកំណត់របស់សាលា។ 
• ចូលរួមការប្រជុំប្រចាំខែ ឬការប្រជុំផ្សេងៗ
• ចូលរួមសកម្មភាពសាលាផ្សេងៗដូចជា ព្រឹត្តិការសាលា ការប្រកួតសមត្ថភាពសិស្ស កម្មវិធីប្រចាំឆ្នាំ...
• បង្កើតនូវទំនាក់ទំនងយ៉ាងជិតស្និទ្ឋជាមួយសិស្ស ក្រុមការងារ  ក្រុមបច្ចេកទេស ចាងហ្វាងទទួលបន្ទុក និងប្រធានសាលា។
• រក្សាឱ្យបាននូវព័ត៌មានជាលក្ខណៈបុគ្គល និងព័ត៌មានរួមរបស់ស្ថាប័ន។
• រក្សានូវទំនាក់ទំនងល្អជាមួយនឹងបុគ្គលិកនៅខាងក្នុង និងខាងក្រៅផ្នែក របស់ខ្លួន។
Job Requirement:
• មានសញ្ញាប័ត្រគរុកោសល្យ ឬវិញ្ញាបណ្ណបត្រពាក់ព័ន្ធ
• មានសញ្ញាប័ត្រគរុកោសល្យ ឬវិញ្ញាបណ្ណបត្រពាក់ព័ន្ធ
• មានបទពិសោធន៍បង្រៀនជាក់ស្តែងពីរ(០២)ឆ្នាំយ៉ាងតិច

** How to apply:
1. Please send your Cover Letter, CV with 4x6 Current Photo to us by email hr@mjqeducation.edu.kh, and only short-list candidates will be notified.
2. Please always put your email subject as “Application for…………. (Position you applied)’’, and rename as your attached file in your full name, e.g. CV_Name. 
3. Please put all your attached documents into one file as combining as PDF file only.
Address: #11A, St. 402, Sangkat Tumnup Teuk, Khan Boeung Keng Kang, Phnom Penh.
Visit our website: www.mjqeducation.edu.kh.
Contact us via: (855) 12 797 939, Mon-Fri, 8:00am to 6:00pm.
Company Profile:
Mengly J. Quach Education (MJQE) is known as a unique education system for its superior quality, discipline and services. It is remarkably consistent with the use creative, innovative, and critical thinking to make a difference for our young generations. We are always optimistic that our standard system will surly provide the best education for our kids and help shape their life to act with respect towards themselves.

MJQE is in a restructuring period of change. MJQE focuses its efforts to ensure all students have the academic and personal skills required to succeed in college and life. Currently, MJQE is one of the 4 companies in the MJQ Group (MJQ Education, Prasethpheap Finance, MJQ Travel and the Mengly J. Quach Media Network (MMN)). MJQ Education has 4 school-companies (Aii Language Center (Aii), American Intercon School (AIS), Go Overseas Study Overseas (SOGO) and i-Learn). There are 7 campuses of Aii and 8 campuses of AIS throughout Cambodia serving more than 17,000 students with more than 500,000 alumni since 2005. 

The MJQE is committed to building talented and committed students and providing the appropriate supports to schools to ensure all students can be successful.

MJQE is an Equal Opportunity Employer. MJQE ensures equal employment opportunities regardless of race, creed, sex, color, national origin, religion, age, sexual orientation, disability, citizenship status, political affiliation, marital status or other human differences. MJQE has a policy of active recruitment of qualified minority employees.
Our Benefits:
Competitive salary 
- Scholarship for employee, employee's children, and spouse 
- NSSF and 24 - hour worldwide accident insurance 
- Maternity, paternity, and marriage benefits
- Benefits as compliance to Prakas of Ministry of Labor and Vocational Training 
- Career advancement opportunities 
- Training opportunities for professional development 
- Annual salary increment based on experience and performance review.
Contact Info: Contact Information HR Department   012 797 939 hr@mjqeducation.edu.kh #11A, St. 402, Sangkat Tumnup Teuk, Khan Boeung Keng Kang, Phnom Penh. 012 797 939

company_name: ក្រុមហ៊ុន ម៉េងលី ជេ. គួច អេឌ្យូខេសិន (Mengly J. Quach Education)
Job Description:
• Read and publicize all official memo(s) to students, attend all meetings and orientation at the beginning and/or throughout the term (meetings and orientation are mandatory).
• Assist a teacher and reinforce the instruction taught in the classroom to students.
• Supervise the students outside of the classroom at the playground, during bathroom breaks, and on field trips or study tours.
• When class is not in session, a teacher aide might assist other tasks assigned by the school.
• Organize the classroom and put supplies in order.
• Initiate, plan, organize, and participate in activities, including extracurricular activities, training, and workshops (extracurricular activity is mandatory if required).
• Work in collaboration with Aii Language Center management team.
• Assist in developing a curriculum that takes an overall approach to English study and focus on a specific aspect of language use. 
• Establish and maintain communication between parents of students and the school in the program.
• Engage parents and families in their student’s learning and acting as an ambassador for the school in the community.
• Contribute productively to the school as a whole.
• And other duties as assigned.
Job Requirement:
• Bachelor degree in Education
• Excellent problem solving skills, and able to use initiative 
• Ability to patiently work with people from a variety of backgrounds, cultures, religious views
• Ability to calmly manage and prioritize multiple tasks
• An approachable and friendly spirit, easy to smile and a can-do attitude
• Excellent computer skills with the MS Office Suite and proficient with Social Media
• Ability to understand and keep within a budget
• Excellent communication skills, both verbal and written in English
• Strong administrative and organizational skills

Please submit your cover letter, CV and 4x6 current photo in person to #140 &210, Mao Tse Tong Blvd, Phnom Penh or email to: hr@mjqeducation.edu.kh; website: www.mjqeducation.edu.kh; Tel: (855) 12 797 939

2. Please always put your email subject as “Application for…………. (Position you applied)’’, and rename as your attached file in your full name, e.g. CV_Name. 
3. Please put all your attached documents into one file as combining as PDF file only.

company_name: ក្រុមហ៊ុន ម៉េងលី ជេ. គួច អេឌ្យូខេសិន (Mengly J. Quach Education)
Job Description:
• ជួបពិភាក្សា និងណែនាំសិស្សដែលមានបញ្ហាការសិក្សាខ្សោយ បញ្ហាចិត្តសាស្រ្ត បញ្ហាអាកប្បកិរិយា និងបញ្ហាវិន័យផ្សេងៗ។
• ជួបពិភាក្សាជាមួយមាតាបិតា ឬអ្នកអាណាព្យាបាលសិស្សអំពីបញ្ហាការសិក្សា និងបញ្ហាវិន័យរបស់សិស្ស។
• សម្របសម្រួលរវាងសិស្ស និងគ្រូ រវាងមាតាបិតា ឬអ្នកអាណាព្យាបាល និងសាលា នៅពេលពួកគាត់មានការត្អូញត្អែរ ឬមានការតវ៉ាផ្សេងៗ។
• ធ្វើផែនការ និងយុទ្ធនាការផ្សេងៗដើម្បីតម្រង់ទិស និងពង្រឹងវិន័យដល់សិស្សានុសិស្ស (អនុវត្ត តាមដាន និងវាយតម្លៃ)។ 
• សហការជាមួយគ្រូបន្ទុកថា្នក់ និងផ្នែកផ្សេងៗដែលពាក់ព័ន្ទក្នុងការដោះស្រាយបញ្ហាសិស្ស។
• មើលសិស្សពេលចូលមកសាលា ចេញលេង និងចេញទៅផ្ទះ។
• ដើរត្រួតពិនិត្យតាមថ្នាក់ម្តងម្កាលពេលម៉ោងសិក្សា ដើម្បីមើលបញ្ហាសិស្ស និងគ្រូ។
• ចូលរួមប្រជុំនានាដែលពាក់ព័ន្ធ។
• ណាត់ជួបមាតាបិតា ឬអ្នកអាណាព្យាបាលសិស្ស។
• ធ្វើរបាយការណ៍ប្រចាំខែ និងប្រចាំឆ្នាំ។
• ធ្វើរបាយការណ៍ទៅចាងហ្វាងដោយផ្ទាល់មាត់ជារៀងរាល់សប្តាហ៍។
Job Requirement:
• បញ្ចប់សញ្ញាបត្របរិញ្ញាបត្រចិត្តវិទ្យា ឬសញ្ញាបត្រដែលមានតម្លៃស្មើ។  
• មានបទពិសោធន៍ការងារជាអ្នកប្រឹក្សាយោបល់ ឬបទពិសោធន៍ពាក់ព័ន្ធ យ៉ាងតិចពីរឆ្នាំ។
• មានចំណេះដឹងទាក់ទងនឹងដំណាក់កាលលូតលាស់របស់កុមារ និងជំទង់។ 
• មានចំណេះដឹង និងមានក្រមសីលធម៌ជាអ្នកប្រឹក្សាយោបល់។
• ចេះប្រើប្រាស់កម្មវិធីកុំព្យូទ័រដូចជា Ms. Word, Ms. Excel, Power Point, Internet និង Email។
• មានលក្ខណៈសម្បត្តិជាអ្នកដឹកនាំ។
• ចេះគោរពពេលវេលា ស្មោះត្រង់ រួសរាយរាក់ទាក់ ចេះបត់បែន និងអាចទទួលយកចំណេះដឹងថ្មីៗ។
• មានជំនាញសម្របសម្រួល និងដោះស្រាយបញ្ហានានា។
• អាចនិយាយ និងសរសេរភាសាខ្មែរបានល្អ និងអាចប្រើប្រាស់ភាសាអង់គ្លេសបាន។
• មានសមត្ថភាពវិភាគស្ថានភាពរបស់សិស្ស ដោយធ្វើផែនការ អនុវត្ត តាមដាន និងវាយតម្លៃ។
• មានទំនាក់ទំនងល្អ និងមានទំនួលខុសត្រូវខ្ពស់លើការងារ។
• មានការចូលរួមសកម្មភាពជួយសង្គម និងវគ្គបណ្ដុះបណ្តាលខ្លីៗ។
មានគំនិតច្នៃប្រឌិត និងការផ្ដួចផ្ដើម។

Company Profile:
Mengly J. Quach Education (MJQE) is known as a unique education system for its superior quality, discipline and services. It is remarkably consistent with the use creative, innovative, and critical thinking to make a difference for our young generations. We are always optimistic that our standard system will surly provide the best education for our kids and help shape their life to act with respect towards themselves.

MJQE is in a restructuring period of change. MJQE focuses its efforts to ensure all students have the academic and personal skills required to succeed in college and life. Currently, MJQE is one of the 4 companies in the MJQ Group (MJQ Education, Prasethpheap Finance, MJQ Travel and the Mengly J. Quach Media Network (MMN)). MJQ Education has 4 school-companies (Aii Language Center (Aii), American Intercon School (AIS), Go Overseas Study Overseas (SOGO) and i-Learn). There are 7 campuses of Aii and 8 campuses of AIS throughout Cambodia serving more than 17,000 students with more than 500,000 alumni since 2005. 

The MJQE is committed to building talented and committed students and providing the appropriate supports to schools to ensure all students can be successful.

MJQE is an Equal Opportunity Employer. MJQE ensures equal employment opportunities regardless of race, creed, sex, color, national origin, religion, age, sexual orientation, disability, citizenship status, political affiliation, marital status or other human differences. MJQE has a policy of active recruitment of qualified minority employees.
Our Benefits:
Competitive salary 
- Scholarship for employee, employee's children, and spouse 
- NSSF and 24 - hour worldwide accident insurance 
- Maternity, paternity, and marriage benefits
- Benefits as compliance to Prakas of Ministry of Labor and Vocational Training 
- Career advancement opportunities 
- Training opportunities for professional development 
- Annual salary increment based on experience and performance review.
Contact Info: Contact Information HR Department   012 797 939 hr@mjqeducation.edu.kh #11A, St. 402 Sangkat Tomnup teuk, Khan ChomkaMorn. phnom penh 012 797 939

company_name: ក្រុមហ៊ុន ម៉េងលី ជេ. គួច អេឌ្យូខេសិន (Mengly J. Quach Education)
Job Description:
•រៀបចំកិបកាសែតរៀងរាល់ព្រឹក នៅជាន់ផ្ទាល់ដី និងការរក្សាទុកទិន្នន័យ (Hard and Soft)
•តាមដាន ដោះស្រាយ ត្រួតពិនិត្យការខ្ចីសៀវភៅយឺត ឬបាត់ និងការផាកពិន័យ
•រៀបចំទុកដាក់សៀវភៅ តុកៅអី ក្នុងបណ្ណាល័យឲ្យមានសណ្តាប់ធ្នាប់ របៀបរៀបរយ និងអនាម័យ
•បោះត្រាក្នុងសៀវភៅ
•អ៊ុតក្របសៀវភៅ
•ធ្វើបារកូដ (Barcode) សៀវភៅ
•បញ្ចូលកាតឡុកសៀវភៅ
•គ្រប់គ្រងការខ្ចី និងសងសៀវភៅក្នុងបណ្ណាល័យ
•បញ្ចូលពាក្យសុំចូលជាសមាជិបណ្ណាល័យ បោះត្រា និងចុះហត្ថលេខា
•ត្រួតពិនិត្យមើលសិស្សពេលសិស្សចូលបណ្ណាល័យ និងការសម្របសម្រួលផ្សេងៗ
•ថតរូបភាពសកម្មភាពសិស្សអានសៀវភៅក្នុងបណ្ណាល័យ
•ស្រង់ស្ថិតិអ្នកចូលប្រើប្រាស់បណ្ណាល័យរៀងរាល់ថ្ងៃ
•បោសសម្អាតអនាម័យ បន្ទប់បណ្ណាល័យ ធ្នើសៀវភៅ និងកុំព្យូទ័រ
•ធ្វើបញ្ជីរបាយការណ៍ និងប្រាក់ផាកពិន័យ ទៅកាន់ផ្នែកគណនេយ្យ
•ធ្វើរបាយការណ៍ប្រចាំសប្តាហ៍ ប្រចាំខែ ប្រចាំវគ្គសិក្សា ប្រចាំឆ្នាំ
•បំពាក់សម្ភារផ្សេងៗ ឱ្យឯកសារ (បិទលេខកូដ សលាកប័ត្រខ្ចីសង Barcode •ពាក្យកម្មសិទ្ធ និងស្លាកផ្សេងៗ
•បកលេខកូដចាស់ចេញពីសៀវភៅ
•ស្នើសុំសម្ភារដែលត្រូវប្រើប្រាស់ប្រចាំថ្ងៃ
•ប្រគល់កាសែតទៅរក្សាទុកនៅបណ្ណសារដ្ឋាន(សប្តាហ៍ទី១នៃខែបន្ទាប់)
•ផ្តល់ជូនកម្មវិធីនិទានរឿង បត់រូបភាព កែច្នៃសម្ភារ ដល់សិស្សថ្នាក់ទី១-៦ ដែលចូលតាមកាលវិភាគ
•ស្រង់ឈ្មោះ និងធ្វើបញ្ជីបញ្ជីឈ្មោះសមាជិកដែលបានចំណាយពេលច្រើនក្នុងបណ្ណាល័យ
•ចែកបណ្ណសរសើរដល់សមាជិកដែលបានចំណាយពេលច្រើនក្នុងបណ្ណាល័យ
•សម្អាតអនាម័យតាមធ្នើសៀវភៅទាំអស់ (រៀបសៀវភៅតាមធ្នើឡើងវិញ)។
•រៀបចំតុបតែងសោភ័ណភាពបណ្ណាល័យ
•ធ្វើបញ្ជីចំណងជើងសៀវភៅដែលត្រូវស្នើសុំទិញបន្ថែម
•ចុះបញ្ជីសារពើភ័ណ្ឌសម្ភារ
•ទទួលការចុះអធិការកិច្ចរបស់ក្រសួង-មន្ទីរអប់រំ សម្រាប់ថ្នាក់មធ្យមសិក្សា បឋមភូមិ •និងទុតិយភូមិ កំឡុងខែវិច្ឆិកា-មករា នាដើមឆ្នាំសិក្សា
•ចូលរួមវគ្គបណ្តុះបណ្តាលនានាដែលពាក់ព័ន្ធបច្ចេកទេសបណ្ណាល័យ។
Job Requirement:
•ទទួលបានវិញ្ញាបនបត្របញ្ចប់ថ្នាក់បរិញ្ញាបត្រ ឬវិញ្ញាបនបត្រដែលមានតម្លៃស្មើ
•ទទួលបានវិញ្ញាបនបត្របញ្ចប់ការសិក្សាមុខវិជ្ជាជំនាញបណ្ណារក្ស  និងបញ្ចប់ការបណ្តុះបណ្តាលនានាដែលពាក់ព័ន្ធបច្ចេកទេសបណ្ណាល័យ
•ចេះភាសាអង់គ្លេស
•ទទួលបានវគ្គបណ្តុះបណ្តាលនានាដែលពាក់ព័ន្ធបច្ចេកទេសបណ្ណាល័យ

company_name: ក្រុមហ៊ុន ម៉េងលី ជេ. គួច អេឌ្យូខេសិន (Mengly J. Quach Education)
Job Description:
• ថែរក្សាសម្ភារបរិក្ខា និងឧបករណ៍ប្រើប្រាស់ទាំងអស់ក្នុងអគារកុំឱ្យមានការខូចខាត និងកុំឱ្យបាត់បង់។
• ទទួលខុសត្រូវលើការថែទាំ និងជួសជុលប្រព័ន្ធទឹក ភ្លើង ម៉ាស៊ីនត្រជាក់ ព្រមទាំងសម្ភារ និងឧបករណ៍ផ្សេងៗក្នុងអគារ ឱ្យមានដំណើរការល្អ។ 
• ទទួលខុសត្រូវលើការជួសជុលទាំងអស់ឱ្យមាន គុណភាពល្អ ប្រសិទ្ធភាពខ្ពស់ និងមានសោភ័ណ្ឌភាពស្អាតទទួលយកបាន។
• ទទួលខុសត្រូវលើឧបករណ៍សម្រាប់ជួសជុលដែលនៅក្នុងឃ្លាំងឱ្យមានភាពគង់វង្ស។
• រៀងរាល់ថ្ងៃសៅរ៍ ត្រួតពិនិត្យតាម របង  ក្នុងអគារ និងបរិស្ថាន ឱ្យមានសុវត្ថិភាព ។
• សម្រាប់កូនសោរខ្ចីសន្តិសុខដើម្បីជួសជុលនៅតាមអគារ ឫថ្ងៃអាទិត្យយកពីអ្នកស្នាក់នៅសាលា។
• ពេលទំនេរពីការងារ ត្រូវជួយតាមផ្នែកដែលត្រូវការកម្លាំង សម្រាប់ថ្ងៃស្អែក និងបន្ទាន់ខ្លំាងភ្លាមៗ។
• បុគ្គលិកថែទំាអគារតម្រូវ ឱ្យចេះធ្វើច្រើនជំនាញ ទឹក ភ្លើង ម៉ាស៊ីនត្រជាក់ ឈើ សំណង់ បាញ់ថ្នាំទូទៅ លាបថ្នាំជញ្ជំាង ពិដាន និងការងារផ្សេងៗទៀត។  
• សម្រាប់បុគ្គលិកថែទំាអគារ ដែលស្នាក់នៅសាលាមានច្បាប់អ្នកផ្ទះ សម្រាប់ថ្ងៃអាទិត្យ ឫថ្ងៃបុណ្យ។ 
• មានសិទ្ធទទួលបណ្ណស្នើសុំ ពីប្រធានគ្រូ ឫចាងហ្វាង ហើយប្រគល់ជូនប្រធានផ្នែក។
• កត់គីឡូទឹក ភ្លើងយុំាមី និងស្មាតម៉ាតរៀងរាល់ចុងខែប្រគល់ជូន លេខាធិការ ។
• ធ្វើការងារជួសជុលសម្ភារប្រចាំថ្ងៃ នៅតាមអគារដែលមានបញ្ហា។
• ឆ្លើយតបទៅប្រធានផ្នែកពេលការងារបញ្ចប់។
• បើកសម្ភារពីឃ្លាំងពេលមានតម្រូវការប្រើប្រាស់ប្រចាំថ្ងៃ។
• ត្រួតពិនិត្យសម្ភារជាងមុនពេលចូលធ្វើ និងកំពុងធ្វើ។
• ត្រួតពិនិត្យគុណភាពការងារជាងពេលធ្វើរួច។
• ត្រួតពិនិត្យមើលសណ្តាប់ធ្នាប់ និងសោភ័ណ្ឌភាពឱ្យបានស្អាតជានិច្ចនៅក្នុងអគារទាំងមូល និងកត់ត្រារាល់ចំណុចខូចខាតរបាយការណ៍ទៅប្រធានផ្នែក ទុកធ្វើថ្ងៃបន្ទាប់ ឫធ្វើភ្លាមៗជាក់ស្តែង។
• រាល់ការងារជាងខាងក្រៅសាលាធ្វើ១០០ភាគរយនៅតាមអគារត្រូវមានបុគ្គលិកថែទំាអគារ ឫជាងសាលាចំាត្រួតពិនិត្យ ពីដើមរហូតដល់ចប់។
• ស្តាប់ Telegram នៅតាមអគាររៀងៗខ្លួន និងក្រុមដែលពាក់ព័ន្ធ ដើម្បីទទួលការងារ និងដើម្បីទទួលបានព័ត៌មាន។
• ត្រួតពិនិត្យបញ្ជីត្រួតពិនិត្យអគារមុន និងក្រោយ ថ្ងៃឈប់សម្រាកអំឡុងពេលបុណ្យជាតិធំៗ។
• ធ្វើរបាយការណ៍លទ្ធផលការងារប្រចាំថ្ងៃ និងដាក់របាយការណ៍ប្រចាំខែជូនប្រធានផ្នែក។
• ទទួលការងារពីប្រធានផ្នែក ។
Job Requirement:
• បញ្ចប់ការសិក្សាថ្នាក់ទី១២ 
• មានអាយុចាប់ពី ២៥ឆ្នាំ ដល់ ៥០ឆ្នាំ
• មានបទពិសោធន៍ទាក់ទងការងារ ប្រព័ន្ធអគ្គិសនី ប្រព័ន្ធទឹក ម៉ាស៊ីនត្រជាក់ ថែទំាគ្រឿងបរិក្ខាយ៉ាងតិច ២ឆ្នាំ 
• អាចបត់បែនតាមពេលវេលា ម៉ោងធ្វើការរបស់ក្រុមហ៊ុន ការងារមិនមានដែនកំណត់
• មានការព្យាយាម និងភាពអត់ធ្មត់ក្នុងការងារ 
• មានភាពរួសរាយរាក់ទាក់ និងទំនាក់ទំនងល្អ 
• មានភាពស្មោះត្រង់ និងការទទួលខុសត្រូវខ្ពស់ក្នុងការងារ

** How to apply:
1. Please send your Cover Letter, CV with 4x6 Current Photo to us by email hr@mjqeducation.edu.kh, and only short-list candidates will be notified.
2. Please always put your email subject as “Application for…………. (Position you applied)’’, and rename as your attached file in your full name, e.g. CV_Name. 
3. Please put all your attached documents into one file as combining as PDF file only.
Address: #11A, St. 402, Sangkat Tumnup Teuk, Khan Boeung Keng Kang, Phnom Penh.
Visit our website: www.mjqeducation.edu.kh.
Contact us via: (855) 12 797 939, Mon-Fri, 8:00am to 6:00pm.
Company Profile:
Mengly J. Quach Education (MJQE) is known as a unique education system for its superior quality, discipline and services. It is remarkably consistent with the use creative, innovative, and critical thinking to make a difference for our young generations. We are always optimistic that our standard system will surly provide the best education for our kids and help shape their life to act with respect towards themselves.

MJQE is in a restructuring period of change. MJQE focuses its efforts to ensure all students have the academic and personal skills required to succeed in college and life. Currently, MJQE is one of the 4 companies in the MJQ Group (MJQ Education, Prasethpheap Finance, MJQ Travel and the Mengly J. Quach Media Network (MMN)). MJQ Education has 4 school-companies (Aii Language Center (Aii), American Intercon School (AIS), Go Overseas Study Overseas (SOGO) and i-Learn). There are 7 campuses of Aii and 8 campuses of AIS throughout Cambodia serving more than 17,000 students with more than 500,000 alumni since 2005. 

The MJQE is committed to building talented and committed students and providing the appropriate supports to schools to ensure all students can be successful.

MJQE is an Equal Opportunity Employer. MJQE ensures equal employment opportunities regardless of race, creed, sex, color, national origin, religion, age, sexual orientation, disability, citizenship status, political affiliation, marital status or other human differences. MJQE has a policy of active recruitment of qualified minority employees.
Our Benefits:
Competitive salary 
- Scholarship for employee, employee's children, and spouse 
- NSSF and 24 - hour worldwide accident insurance 
- Maternity, paternity, and marriage benefits
- Benefits as compliance to Prakas of Ministry of Labor and Vocational Training 
- Career advancement opportunities 
- Training opportunities for professional development 
- Annual salary increment based on experience and performance review.

company_name: ក្រុមហ៊ុន ម៉េងលី ជេ. គួច អេឌ្យូខេសិន (Mengly J. Quach Education)
Job Description:
• Read and publicize all official memo(s) to students, attend all meetings and orientation at the beginning and/or throughout the term (meetings and orientation are mandatory).
• Teach Literacy and numeracy along with personal, social and emotional skills.
• Employ a variety of instructional techniques and teaching strategies to meet different aptitudes and interests of students, including whole group/ small group or individual learning.
• Follow course syllabus provided by Aii Language Center.  
• Help with the integration of technology into the classroom, helping set up computers and projectors, for example. 
• Be well planned for her/ his class. Design and follow a complete teaching plan.
• Initiate, plan, organize, and participate in activities, including extracurricular activities, training, and workshops (extracurricular activity is mandatory if required).
• Work in collaboration with Aii Language Center management team.
• Assist in developing a curriculum that takes an overall approach to English study and focus on a specific aspect of language use. 
• Teach students English skills, such as listening, reading, writing and speaking.
• Establish and maintain communication between parents of students and the school in the program.
• Engage parents and families in their student’s learning and acting as an ambassador for the school in the community.
• Contribute productively to the school as a whole.
• Write student report cards using the online continuous assessment with their overall performance.  
• Organize learning materials and resources.
• Use a variety of activities and instructional methods.
• Assess student’s performance and progress to ensure they are mastering the skills on regular basis.
• Monitor children’s interactions and nurture cooperation and sharing.
• Follow and comply with teaching standards.
• Establish and enforce rules for behavior, and procedures for maintaining order.
• Adapt teaching methods and instructional materials to meet students’ varying needs and interests.
• And other duties as assigned.
Job Requirement:
• Bachelor degree in Education or equivalent
• Master degree is a plus 
• Excellent problem solving skills, and able to use initiative 
• Ability to patiently work with people from a variety of backgrounds, cultures, religious views
• Ability to calmly manage and prioritize multiple tasks
• An approachable and friendly spirit, easy to smile and a can-do attitude
• Excellent computer skills with the MS Office Suite and proficient with Social Media
• Ability to employ technology 
• Excellent communication skills, both verbal and written in English
• Strong administrative and organizational skills 

** Only shortlisted applicants will be contacted within 7 working days
Please submit your cover letter, CV and 4 x 6 current photo to email HR department of MJQeducation as below.

job title: គ្រូ ការ៉ាត់តេ
company_name: ក្រុមហ៊ុន ម៉េងលី ជេ. គួច អេឌ្យូខេសិន (Mengly J. Quach Education)
position: គ្រូ ការ៉ាត់តេ
Job Description:
• គោរពបទបញ្ជាផ្ទៃក្នុងរបស់សាលា
• អនុវត្តកម្មវិធីសិក្សាឱ្យស្របតាមកម្មវិធីសិក្សារបស់ក្រសួងអប់រំ យុវជន និងកីឡា
• អនុវត្តកិច្ចតែងបង្ហាត់ ឬការត្រៀមសង្ខេបមេរៀនក្នុងការបង្ហាត់សិស្សជាប្រចាំ
• បង្កើតសំណួរ ឬវិញ្ញាសា និងអត្រាកំណែ ប្រឡងប្រចាំខែ ពាក់កណ្តាលឆមាសលើកទី១ ពាក់កណ្តាលឆមាសលើកទី២  ឆមាសលើកទី១ និងឆមាសលើកទី២ ប្រកបដោយគុណភាព បច្ចេកទេស
• វាយតម្លៃប្រចាំខែ លើការសិក្សារបស់សិស្សតាមរយៈសកម្មភាពសិក្សាក្នុងថ្នាក់ ( វិន័យ និងសីលធម៌ ២០%  សកម្មភាពប្រតិបត្តិពេលហ្វឹកហាត់នៅលើទីលាន ២០%  អវត្តមាន១០%)  និងពេលប្រឡង៥០%។
• សិក្សាស្រាវជ្រាវបន្ថែម លើវិធីសាស្រ្តល្អៗក្នុងការបង្រៀន និងបង្កើតនូវវប្បធម៌ចែករំលែកគ្នារាល់បទពិសោធន៍ការងារ
• ធ្វើជាទូតដ៏ល្អរបស់ស្ថាបន
• គោរពមនសិការវិជ្ជាជីវៈគ្រូបង្រៀនឱ្យបាន១០០%
• ចូលរួមសកម្មភាពផ្សេងៗរបស់សាលាសម្រាប់ផ្តល់នូវការអប់រំសីលធម៌ដល់សិស្សានុសិស្ស។
• ធ្វើខ្លួនជាគំរូល្អ ទៅកាន់សិស្សានុសិស្ស និងបុគ្គលិករួមការងារ
• ផ្តល់របាយការណ៍ប្រចាំខែឱ្យចាងហ្វាងទទួលបន្ទុកផ្ទាល់អំពីការអនុវត្តន៍បំណែងចែកកម្មវិធីសិក្សា ឬដំណើរការនៃការបង្ហាត់បង្រៀន លទ្ធផលសិក្សារបស់សិស្ស (លទ្ធផលវិជ្ជាមាន និងចំណុចដែល ត្រូវអភិវឌ្ឍ) តាមខែនីមួយ។
• បញ្ចូលពិន្ទុប្រឡងប្រចាំខែនីមួយៗ ពាក់កណ្តាលឆមាស ឆមាស ក្នុងប្រព័ន្ធពិន្ទុ (DATA BASE) និងផ្តល់របាយការណ៍ពិន្ទុជូនផ្នែកលេខាធិការឱ្យបានមុនថ្ងៃទី២៥ ឬតាមការកំណត់របស់សាលា។ 
• ចូលរួមការប្រជុំប្រចាំខែ ឬការប្រជុំផ្សេងៗ
• ចូលរួមសកម្មភាពសាលាផ្សេងៗដូចជា ព្រឹត្តិការសាលា ការប្រកួតសមត្ថភាពសិស្ស កម្មវិធីប្រចាំឆ្នាំ...
• បង្កើតនូវទំនាក់ទំនងយ៉ាងជិតស្និទ្ឋជាមួយសិស្ស ក្រុមការងារ  ក្រុមបច្ចេកទេស ចាងហ្វាងទទួលបន្ទុក និងប្រធានសាលា។
• រក្សាឱ្យបាននូវព័ត៌មានជាលក្ខណៈបុគ្គល និងព័ត៌មានរួមរបស់ស្ថាប័ន។
• រក្សានូវទំនាក់ទំនងល្អជាមួយនឹងបុគ្គលិកនៅខាងក្នុង និងខាងក្រៅផ្នែក របស់ខ្លួន។
Job Requirement:
• មានសញ្ញាប័ត្រគរុកោសល្យ ឬវិញ្ញាបណ្ណបត្រពាក់ព័ន្ធ
• មានសញ្ញាប័ត្រគរុកោសល្យ ឬវិញ្ញាបណ្ណបត្រពាក់ព័ន្ធ
• មានបទពិសោធន៍បង្រៀនជាក់ស្តែងពីរ(០២)ឆ្នាំយ៉ាងតិច

Company Profile:
Mengly J. Quach Education (MJQE) is known as a unique education system for its superior quality, discipline and services. It is remarkably consistent with the use creative, innovative, and critical thinking to make a difference for our young generations. We are always optimistic that our standard system will surly provide the best education for our kids and help shape their life to act with respect towards themselves.

MJQE is in a restructuring period of change. MJQE focuses its efforts to ensure all students have the academic and personal skills required to succeed in college and life. Currently, MJQE is one of the 4 companies in the MJQ Group (MJQ Education, Prasethpheap Finance, MJQ Travel and the Mengly J. Quach Media Network (MMN)). MJQ Education has 4 school-companies (Aii Language Center (Aii), American Intercon School (AIS), Go Overseas Study Overseas (SOGO) and i-Learn). There are 7 campuses of Aii and 8 campuses of AIS throughout Cambodia serving more than 17,000 students with more than 500,000 alumni since 2005. 

The MJQE is committed to building talented and committed students and providing the appropriate supports to schools to ensure all students can be successful.

MJQE is an Equal Opportunity Employer. MJQE ensures equal employment opportunities regardless of race, creed, sex, color, national origin, religion, age, sexual orientation, disability, citizenship status, political affiliation, marital status or other human differences. MJQE has a policy of active recruitment of qualified minority employees.
Our Benefits:
Competitive salary 
- Scholarship for employee, employee's children, and spouse 
- NSSF and 24 - hour worldwide accident insurance 
- Maternity, paternity, and marriage benefits
- Benefits as compliance to Prakas of Ministry of Labor and Vocational Training 
- Career advancement opportunities 
- Training opportunities for professional development 
- Annual salary increment based on experience and performance review.

Job Description:
• Provide clear feedback and direction to camera operators and producers to ensure that you are getting the best rushes.
• Manage all internal videos and other digital multimedia project.
• Developing and producing digital based products and services for use in communication, training, research, community relationship development, programs and events, as well as within individual and corporate presentations and conferences.
• Organize and manage deliverables by tracking and reporting on status of multiple multimedia projects
• Check all videos and photos after editing by staff
• Upload Video of Dr. Mengly’s speech to Google Drive for archive
• Edit (include audio, video, color correction) short video packages for use on the MJQE social media channel, promotional and training purposes
• Incorporate graphics and mix sound within edits
• Oversee color grading, graphics and post-production sound
• Provide training and support to develop the capacity of other staff members
• Video editing (School Videos, Dr. Mengly’s Family, MJQTV, etc)
• Lighting and audio engineering for field production
• Reposting charity photo of Dr. Mengly J. Quach to Facebook Page
• In general, normal office hours will apply but the nature of the role means that a flexible approach to working time will be necessary.
• Actively involved in discussion of IT issue and its status, provide feedback on effectiveness of post- IT corrections process and give recommendation for change
• Encourage and promote a collaborative, trust and transparent working culture
• Other tasks assigned by Head of IT.
Job Requirement:
• Bachelor’s Degree or relevant field.

KNOWLEDGE, SKILLS AND EXPERIENCE:

• At least 5 years of video editor experience
• Good knowledge in digital technology and editing software package (Sony Vegas, Premiere and After Effects)
• Ability to manage team.
• Honesty, excellent interpersonal skills, strong negotiation skills and attention to detail
• Ability to manage teams and ability to work independently
• Staff supervision, training/coaching 
• Good written and spoken English

Job Description:
Compliance – Legal, Taxation, Regulatory Reporting
- Support the Finance Manager/Supervisor to complete accurate and timely filing of tax returns, audits, declarations, applications/renewals of all required licenses and other financial-related matters to local authorities
- Fully comply with all applicable laws and regulations, including maintenance of necessary accounting records as per local requirements
- Prepare declarations and deposits of accounts to banks, Chamber of Commerce and other local bodies as required
- Prepare Value Added Tax, withholding tax, noise, airport and other tax declarations and payments in accordance with local legislation

Control and Risk Assessment
- Ensure the company’s principle accounting policies are followed, such as the Finance Manual (Head Office), Outport Accounting and Internal Control Manual (overseas countries) and Credit Control Policy and Guidelines
- Ensure proper authorisation of contracts and expenditures
- Support regular audits (at least annually) on finance processes to identify any breaches of, or risks to, company policies
- Report any breaches of Company policy

Management and Financial Reporting
- Ensure timely and accurate recordings of revenue, expenses and balance sheet items in the general ledger
- Compile monthly and annual accounting schedules, bank reconciliations and other account reconciliations
- Ensure preparation of cash flow forecast summarising cash movements within the port
- Assist in preparation of budgetary and ad hoc analysis as required

Cost Control
- Assist in preparation of submissions for overhead and route costs budgets and forecasts
- Review actual spend compared to budget and encourage cost savings where appropriate
- Prepare monthly analysis for the Finance Manager/Supervisor as required
- Provide financial analysis to assist business units with local contract negotiations

Credit Control
- Ensure compliance with established credit policy for appointing new agents and work with the sales teams to evaluate potential new agents in line with this policy
- Assist Sales and Finance Managers to obtain necessary security from agents
- Work with the sales teams to stay informed of the financial status of agents to minimise exposure and losses
- Identify any default payments and pursue collection through Billing and Settlement Plan, bank guarantees, collection agents, legal avenues, etc.

Banking and Treasury
- Assist the Finance Manager/Supervisor to oversee the cash management process, including petty cash across local offices and replenishment of funds
- Ensure banking records are kept up-to-date and appropriate bank account reconciliations are performed

Administration and Supplier Management
- Manage and maintain accurate local inventory and asset registers
- Ensure vendor details and delegation of authority list is up-to-date in SAP at all times
- Ensure rates in SAP Flight-to-Settle module are correct and inform Head Office Purchasing department of required changes as necessary
- Handle Finance Purchase Order creation and issue invoices as required
- Process local invoices including Flight-to-Settle invoices
- Monitor rejected payments and provide assistance to local vendors
- Any other reasonable task as required 

Business Support and Process Improvement
- Assist the Finance Manager to identify opportunities for process improvement and working efficiency
- Provide Finance-related support to other local departments as required
- Provide support to Regional Finance Office with country-related and local language matters as required

E & A
- Emergency and Accident and Crisis Response responsibilities as required
Job Requirement:
Academic Qualifications
- Sound accounting knowledge is required
- A degree in Accounting or a related discipline is an advantage Knowledge, skills, training and experience
- Experience in the airline industry is an advantage
- Experience in SAP is an advantage
- Sound understanding of local country’s business practices
- A good team player with strong interpersonal skills and can interact with all levels within the organisation and region
- Demonstrable experience in improving current work practices and implementing new ideas
- Strong planning, problem-solving and organisational skills and is able to prioritise and manage multiple tasks and deadlines
- Strong understanding of Cathay Pacific policies and procedures
- Solid written, oral communication, negotiation and presentation skills
- Adapts to and embraces constant change
Application deadline: 10 days after posting
 
How to apply: : please click this link to apply for the job
Contact: 069888744
Website: http://www.cathaypacific.com

Candidates not notified within eight weeks may consider their application unsuccessful. All related information will be kept in our file for up to 24 months. A copy of our Personal Information Collection Statement will be provided
upon request by contacting our Data Protection Officer.
Company Profile: Let your passion fly! We’re proud to be one of the world’s leading airlines. Our reputation is built on a long track record of success, an ongoing commitment to our home Hong Kong, and on the delivery of customer service that’s straight from the heart. All of this is possible due to our talented people who share our passion for aviation and our commitment to being the best. Our global family can open up a world of opportunities for you. This means that your first role at Cathay Pacific won’t be your last. It could take you anywhere. Join us and discover just how far you can go!

Job Description: Apply new construction technology, labor-saving technology and system in order to provide construction products to client with high performance compared to cost. Realize client requirement of construction products sincerely in compliance with contract, local regulation and standard. Execute process control in order to maintain or improve quality/function of construction process. Ensure Quality Management System sustainability. Prevention of fatalities through risk assessment and tight site supervision. Improvement of Health & Safety conditions through Plan–Do–Check–Act. Prevent pollution through effective utilization of resources. Preventive action for harmful substance controlThe following functions and documentary obligations are required to be performed in a timely, accurate manner to the full satisfaction and approval of Executive Manager. - Estimate and scope MEP trades during pre-construction- Review Contract Documents, making suggestions/modifications as they relate to the MEP trades- Manage and lead MEP subcontractors throughout duration of the project (from Groundbreaking through Commissioning and Turnover to Owner)- Assist Scheduling department with developing detailed CPM schedules for all MEP installation activities, including cost and resource loading- Work with Superintendent on project logistics and temporary facility plans- Review and approve material and equipment for MEP systems prior to installation- Monitor the installation and start-up of MEP systems and commissioning of project with Engineer & OwnerCoordinate activities, materials procurement and other related activities with Project Manager and Field Staff- Communicate progress and prepare appropriate reports as neededSupervise, develop and mentor project staff, if applicableLead and direct the 3-D coordination process to resolve all conflicts prior to start of installations- Take overall responsibility for the performance of all MEP tradesSupervise review and coordination of submittals and shop drawings- Real performance on Section tasks.- Any interface work with other organizations for smooth job handling.- Improvement of job handling manner under EM assistance.- Timely reporting of key subject to EM when necessary.
Job Requirement: -  Bachelor’s Degree in Mech/Elec Engineering is desirable.- At least 8 years, experience as MEP Manager in the Construction industry.- Strong Background in working with people from diverse backgrounds and cultures.- Strong technical background in managing construction of multi-use projects.- Highly proficient with computer applications, coordination, negotiations- Results-oriented, able to take constructive criticism and move forward, able to lead the Site Team to timely, quality and design compliant project completion- Japanese National or Foreigners preferred.- Understanding CMEDCC Management philosophy.- Willing to be stationed in Phnom Penh, Cambodia.- Competencies + Creative Vision + Project Management + Problem Solving + Leadership + Collaborative & Multi-disciplinary Working + Communication + Stakeholder Management & Conflict Resolution
Company Profile: CMEDCC is a Cambodian construction company launched in Phnom Penh in 2015. After two years of successful operations in the Kingdom, we have become one of the leading construction companies in the country.Taking pride in being Cambodian and in the Kingdom’s history, great heritage, and rich culture, CMEDCC expects to be a main player in the construction industry in designing and building a better future for this country.With a current diverse professional team of approximately 300, with international management teams, all working hand in hand to deliver our commitment to: “Build for the Best”.We are currently looking for new talents to join our team. If you want to work for a fast-growing company offering wonderful professional career opportunities to its employees and a happy working environment, don’t miss out on what could be your future dream job.
Contact Info: Contact Information HR Department  061777875 careers@cmedcc.com #252-254, Street 63 Conner Street 400, Sangkat Boeung Keng Kang I,  Khan Chamkarmon, Phnom Penh, Cambodia 061777875

Job Description: The role of Structural Design Manager is to manage the civil and structural team, formulate design and delivery schedule, ensure timely delivery, professionally coordinate with other design disciplines and CMED departments, and to ensure safety, integrity and adequacy of design to fulfil international design codes and CMED standards on all projects.  - Lead and give direction to Structural Senior Designer/Engineer, and Structural Designer/Engineer, and all Structural Design Group members.- Preparing reports, design, specification and drawings- Lead the Structural Design and relevant building authority submission process and to ensure approval is obtained in timely manner. - To Inspect and assess building structural design, properties, condition and relevant documents where applicable on project and project tender basis. - Involve in the Soil Investigation and Site Survey of build sites to determine the suitability of the earth for the requirements of the upcoming project.- Examine structures at risk of collapse and advising how to improve their structural integrity, such as recommending removal or repair of defective parts or rebuilding the entire structure;- Co-ordinate and consult with other members of the projects, including Engineers, Environmental Specialists, Architects, and Landscape Architects.- Analyse configurations of the basic structural components of a building or other structure;- Calculate the pressures, stresses and strains that each component, such as a beam or lintel, will experience from other parts of the structure due to human use or environmental pressures such as weather or earthquakes;- Consider the strength of various materials, e.g. timber, concrete, steel and brick, to see how their inclusion may necessitate a change of structural design;- Make drawings, specifications and computer models of structures in compliance to CMED and building authority requirement and standards.- Liaise with CMED Project team and Structural contractors to ensure erection of building structure is fully implemented as per design construction and shop drawings. Regular site visits will be required for inspections, site meetings and other relevant matters during construction phase.- Liaise with other designers, including architects, to agree on safe designs and their fit with the aesthetic concept of the construction;Where applicable, liaise with government authorities in their own inspections relating to the project. - Must be versatile and experienced in designing various typology of building structures.
Job Requirement: Bachelor and/or Master’s degree in Architectural Structural Design required. Proven track record with minimum 10 year experience in Building and Construction Industry. Good analytical and problem-solving skillsBe confident, assertive and independent.Excellent communication and negotiation skill.Good team player.Relationship building and people management skill.Good interpersonal skill in English and other languages (Mandarin, Japanese and Khmer) are desirable.Thorough understanding in civil and structural design codes and standards in Singapore, and/or Japan, Thailand, Vietnam, China, Malaysia, etc. Computer skills: Various structural loading analysis programs, MS Office, MS Project, AutoCAD, and Sketchup.Preferably Vietnamese.Understand CMEDCC Management philosophy.Work ConditionsCandidate will work both in a temperature-controlled office environment and in the field with exposure to varying degrees of weather conditions while visiting re-construction job sites and structures or doing field investigations/research. Must be physically, mentally and emotionally able to perform the essential functions of the job.

Job Description:
Liaise with Product Marketing or CRM on the effective campaigns required to deliver the overall results
Develop and agree briefs for relevant programmes
Brief either external or internal teams on campaign requirements
Manage the effective execution / production of marketing campaigns – on time and on budget
Evaluate & monitor marketing initiatives to optimize marketing activities and campaign
Maintain and contribute to the overall communications roadmap
Ensure the approval process for all materials are followed
Ensure consistency and adherence to the Wing brand guidelines
Monitor the campaign results – refine and optimise as appropriate
Manage the delivery and implementation of marketing activities, programs or campaigns

Bachelor degree in marketing, business administration or other related fields.
At least 2 to 3 years working experience
Experience with coordinating marketing and communication projects
Excellent written & verbal communication skills in both Khmer & English
Computer proficiency (Ms. Word, Excel, PowerPoint)
Excellent written and verbal communication skills including copy writing, proof reading, delivering engaging content and co-ordinating communications processes
Proven ability to work on own initiative, meeting objectives and tight deadlines under pressure
Company Profile:
Wing Bank (Cambodia) Plc – the bank for every Cambodian – is driven by the vision to provide every Cambodian with convenient access to financial services relevant to, and for the improvement of their daily lives.

Wing Bank has revolutionized the way Cambodians access financial services by introducing instant, secure, and convenient Mobile Financial Services since 18 August 2008.

Today, Wing Bank serves the entire Cambodian population with 100% coverage of the districts in Cambodia thanks to the innovative Wing Bank App, over 10,000 Wing Cash Xpress agents, over 55,000 merchants, and partnerships with industry giants such as Mastercard, MoneyGram, AliPay, WeChat Pay, Western Union, Visa, and Ria.

Wing Bank provides an array of advanced financial products both for individual and corporate customers. These include loans, deposits, micro savings, credit referral services, money transfers, utility and insurance payments, supply chain payments, payroll services and even phone top-ups. In addition, Wing offers retail payments via “WingPay”, and has also introduced the “WingMall” e-commerce platform.

Both small and large companies alike are now using Wing’s payroll and disbursement services, speeding up their payments. Over 80% of Wing’s agents and 50% of customers are women, making Wing a shining example of gender inclusion in the region.

Wing Bank is committed to providing financial, gender and digital inclusion to the unbanked and the under-banked, allowing every Cambodian to enjoy convenience and security when it comes to financial services
Contact Info: Contact Information HR Department   078 988 290 / 078 989 509 / 078 989 114 jobs@wingbank.com.kh No. 721, Preah Monivong Blvd., Sangkat Beung Keng Kang 3, Khan Chamkar Mon, Phnom Penh, Cambodia 078 988 290 / 078 989 509 / 078 989 114

job title: មន្ត្រីឥណទានCredit officer ជាច្រើននាក់($260-$400)
position: មន្ត្រីឥណទានCredit officer ជាច្រើននាក់($260-$400)
Job Description:
**ទីតាំងមាន៖  សាខា ក្រុងតាខ្មៅ 5នាក់,    សាខា ចោមចៅ 5នាក់,    សាខា ផ្សារត្រាំខ្នារ 10នាក់,    សាខា ផ្សារថ្នល់ទទឹង 1នាក់។

1.ទំនាក់ទំនងជាមួយអាជ្ញាធរមូលដ្ឋាននៅក្នុងតំបន់ប្រតិបត្តិការ 
2.ធ្វើការផ្សព្វផ្សាយជាមួយប្រជាពលរដ្ឋក្នុងតំបន់ ប្រតិបត្តិការ 
3.ផ្តល់ប្រាក់កម្ចីដល់អតិថិជនតាមផែនការរបស់ស្ថាបនដាក់ឲ្យ 
4.សិក្សាសំណើសុំខ្ចីប្រាក់ របស់អតិថិជនផ្តល់ប្រាក់កម្ចី ជូនអតិ ថិជន ( បើកប្រាក់ជូនអតិជន ) ។
5.ប្រមូលប្រាក់ពីអតិថិជន មកទូទាត់ជាមួយបេឡាធិការ ។
6.ដោះស្រាយជាមួយ អតិថិជនដែលបង់ប្រាក់យឺត ។
7.រាយការណ៍ នឹងធ្វើរបាយការណ៍ជូនប្រធានសាខា ។
8.ការងារមួយចំនួនទៀតដែលផ្តល់ដោយប្រធានសាខា ។
Job Requirement:
1សិស្សដែលប្រឡងជាប់ ឬធ្លាក់បាក់ឌុប នឹងសិស្សនិស្សិតដែលកំពុង តែសិក្សា ឬបញ្ចប់ការសិក្សានៅតាម សាកលវិទ្យាល័យ ។
2.ត្រូមានកាយសប្បទាគ្រប់គ្រាន់ ។
3មានភាពស្មោះត្រង់ នឹងមានឆន្ទះបំពេញការងាររបស់ខ្លួន។	
4.ជាមនុស្សមានភាពបត់បែននិងមានទំនួលខុសត្រូវខ្ពស់លើ លើការងាររបស់ខ្លួន ។
5.ជាមនុស្សដែលមានទំនាក់ទំនងល្អ ជាមួយអ្នកដ៏ទៃ។
6.មានក្រមសិលធម៌  នឹងមានភាពរួសរាយរាក់ទាក់ ។


** សំណងទូទាត់នឹងអត្ថប្រយោជន៍ទទួលបាន
1.ទទួលបានប្រាក់បៀវត្សចាប់ពី (260$-400$) ។
2.ទទួលបានប្រាក់ឧបត្ថម ថ្ងៃបុណ្យចូលឆ្នាំខ្មែរ នឹងភ្ជុំបិណ្ឌ
3. ទទួលបានអាហារូបករណ៍១០០%ពីសាកលវិទ្យាល័យ 
ដែលខ្លួនកំពុងសិក្សា។
4.ផ្តល់ជូនកន្លែងស្នាក់នៅ ថ្លៃទឹក ភ្លើងដោយឥតបង់ប្រាក់
5.ធានារ៉ាប់រងគ្រោះថ្នាក់ ២៤ ម៉ោង និងសុខភាព។
6. ប្រាក់រង្វាន់លើកទឹកចិត្តលើស្នាដៃការងារដែលសម្រេចបាន      
7.ផ្តល់ជូនកាតទូរស័ព្ទ ឯកសណ្ឋាន និងសភារៈសម្រាប់ប្រើ   ប្រាស់ សម្រាប់បំពេញការងារ។
8.ឱកាសចាប់យកតំណែងនានាពីក្រេប៉ូ ។
9.មានប្រាក់កម្ចីសម្រាប់បុគ្គលិក ដែលបម្រើការក្នុង ក្រេប៉ូ។

Job Description:
1. Scope of working:

Site Engineer is reporting directly to site manager/Construction Management Director and supervision day to day operation of site work. 

2. Duties & Responsibilities:

- Follow up with site engineer of contractor and/or sub-contractor to ensure that work is being carried out as per design/specification/or planning
- Interact with project manager for clarification in architectural, conducting regular job site inspections, assist in the quality and safety audit
- Identify and highlight possible risk on project
- Accurately inventorying construction material 
- Finishing work
- Coordination for verification of extra claims raise by direct manager;
- Other tasks assigned by manager.
Job Requirement:
3. Qualification & Requirement:

- Degree in Civil Engineering and other equivalent degree;
- Fresh graduated or 2 year of work experience in similar position; 
- Be able to manage workers at the assign site;
- Strong construction knowledge and ability to control the quality and cost;
- Good oral and written English and Khmer communication skills;
- Good negotiation skills, interpersonal skills, and problem solving skills;
- Be friendly, flexible, honestly, hard-working, and be able to work under the pressure.

4. Working Days and Hours:

- Monday to Saturday: 	7:00am to 11:00am & 1:00pm to 5:00pm
- Lunch time: 		11:00am to 1:00pm

5. Working place:

- Site Finishing Engineer is based in Site/Branch of Borey Peng Huoth, the department of construction.

6. Relationship:

- Site Finishing Engineer works under supervision & report directly to Site Manager.

7. Salary and Benefit:

- Salary (Negotiable)
- Up to 300% annual incentive
- Annual Salary increment
- Annual Staff Party
- Annual Trip
- Education Sponsorship
- Internal and External Training 
- Seniority Pay
Company Profile:
Borey Peng Huoth was founded in 2005 and becomes one of the most prominent Property Development companies in Cambodia today. With our vast expertise in the market, ambition to grow further and a constant drive for innovation, Borey Peng Huoth has been transformed to Borey Peng Huoth Group, which consists of Borey Peng Huoth Property Development, Borey Peng Huoth Construction, and Borey Peng Huoth Shopping Mall.  We have been extending our development projects to the most attractive locations in the Kingdom of Cambodia.

As a matter of fact, due to the growing and expanding operation, currently we are seeking for many qualified and talented candidates to fill the following vacant positions.

Job Description: This role is fully responsible for the overall performance or result of the Design Department, he will report to the Managing Director.• Involved in the Project planning, organizing and management of design team to meet the client expectation and Monitor  the design process from feasibility studies/report,  standard, designed development, technical design, tender document, bid process and construction consultation.• Meet with corporate heads and clients on a regular basis.• Preparing and presenting design proposals to clients communicate with the client and advice client to get the final solution.• Develop and prepare the Project Master schedule for project, follow up, review, revise according to the project by maintain deadline of the project smoothly.• Manage the out sourced design company (in case) for the cost and work quality point of view.• Manage the in-house design cost.• Manage the productivity of in-house and out -source for time and cost management.• To exhibit  strong  design expertise  Develop &  implement  quality  of  design and lead design production  according  to  building  codes, law, client  requirements  and  architectural  graphic standards.• To exhibit strong design and technical expertise with clear understanding of materials, structure, method statement, quality, buildable, and basic MEP systems.• Prepare and establish the specification• Prepare and establish the Department Policy I Guideline I SOPs I Workflow as the Design Department HOD.• Review the Construction document (Materials, shop drawings, method statement ...) to comply with the specification.• Manage dealing with-problem coming up from the construction.• Manage and fully  control  all the  deign process to  match the  client  requirement,  time  line specified by Project management  department,  expected cost, quality  and standard including Structural team and MEP team under Department.• Manage and fully control Structural section and MEP section under Department.• To maintain effective working relationships with line and staff functions to ensure the efficient work flow environment.• To exhibit tasks using computer programs such as AutoCAD Architecture, 3D Studio MAX, Sketch up Pro., V-Ray Plug-in, Adobe Creative Suites at Very good level or higher.• For Design & Build Project (D&B), check and approve the shop drawing as 'ARCHITECT'.• Execution of monthly and weekly report to General Manager/ Managing Director.• Any other tasks assigned by General Manager/ Managing Director
Job Requirement: • Bachelor or Master Degree of Architecture• Minimum 10 years in Design management and hands-on training junior team• International working  exposure will be highly preferred• Microsoft Office and Microsoft Project at good level or higher level• Understanding of CMEDCC's Management Philosophy.• Be willing to be stationed in Phnom Penh, Cambodia• Occasional travel by airplane and automobile in conducting business is necessary.   • Ability to communicate orally with board of directors, customers, vendors, shareholders, management, and other co-workers, both individually and in front of a group is crucial. Regular use of the telephone, email and any other forms of electronic applications for communication is essential.• Sitting for extended period is common. Hearing and vision within normal ranges is essential for normal conversations, to receive ordinary information and to prepare or inspect documents.• Good reasoning ability is required to solve a wide range of business problems. Able to apply statistical calculation, analysis of variance, correlation techniques, and sampling theory. Able to understand and utilize financial report and legal document to conduct business.
Company Profile: CMEDCC is a Cambodian construction company launched in Phnom Penh in 2015. After two years of successful operations in the Kingdom, we have become one of the leading construction companies in the country.Taking pride in being Cambodian and in the Kingdom’s history, great heritage, and rich culture, CMEDCC expects to be a main player in the construction industry in designing and building a better future for this country.With a current diverse professional team of approximately 300, with international management teams, all working hand in hand to deliver our commitment to: “Build for the Best”.We are currently looking for new talents to join our team. If you want to work for a fast-growing company offering wonderful professional career opportunities to its employees and a happy working environment, don’t miss out on what could be your future dream job.

Company Profile:
Prudential (Cambodia) Life Assurance PLC began operations in Cambodia in January 2013. It is the leading life insurer in Cambodia with more than USD280 million assured and 27,000 policies issued (as at 31 September 2015). One of the first life insurers in Cambodia, Prudential Cambodia is committed to raising the awareness of life insurance among the Cambodian people and helping them protect and secure their financial futures.

Prudential Cambodia is part of UK-based Prudential plc. Founded in 1848, Prudential plc is an international financial services group with significant operations in Asia, the US and the UK. It serves around 25 million insurance customers and have £505 billion of assets under management (as at 30 June 2015). Prudential plc is listed on the stock exchanges in London, Hong Kong, Singapore and New York.

Prudential plc is not affiliated in any manner with Prudential Financial, Inc., a company whose principal place of business is in the United States of America.

Job Description:
职位描述：description of job:
1. 根据公司的业务发展目标，确定市场营销策略及推广计划，整合各种媒体渠道资源并推动落实；
- Following to company's business development goals
- Determine marketing strategies and promotion plans
- Integrate various media channel resources and promote the implementation
2. 根据公司的招商计划制定渠道推广方案，完成招商文案设计、目标人群及投放区域的设定，以最低的成本完成合作伙伴的招募工作
- Develop a channel promotion plan according to the company's Merchants targets
- Complete copywriting designs of the Merchants ‘recruitment
- Setting of target population and delivery areas
- Minimize advertisement budget for merchant recruitments 
3. 时刻关注市场动态，组织开展市场调研工作，并结合公司的营销策略制定针对性的营销方案并推动落实
- Pay attention to market dynamics, organize market research work, and formulate targeted marketing plans based on the company's marketing strategies and promotion implementation
4. 规划、组织相关公关活动或品牌推广活动，在目标客户群中建立公司的品牌知名度和美誉度；
- Plan and organize related PR or Branding activities to establish the company's brand awareness and reputation among the target customer groups
5. 根据公司业务目标，使用不同的高效的市场方案，并做好费用管控；
- According to the company's business goals, use different efficient market solutions, and good at cost control
6. 做好团队管理及人才梯队的培养，营造健康积极的部门工作氛围
- Potential in team management, talented training, and create a healthy and positive departmental working atmosphere
Job Requirement:
* 教育education
大专以上学历，专业不限，市场营销专业优先考虑，
- College degree or above, no major limitation, marketing major is preferred,
* 经验experience
三年以上市场经验，两年以上团队管理经验，有成功案例的优先考虑；
- More than three years of marketing experience, more than two years of team management experience, successful performances are preferred;
* 技能 skill
1. 敏锐的市场洞察力及优秀的数据分析能力
- Keen market insight and excellent data analysis capabilities;；
2. 对Facebook营销、运营有独到的见解且有成功的案例
- Have unique insights on Facebook marketing and operations and have successful performances
3. 良好的沟通协调能力和内外部团队合作能力，逻辑思维能力突出，
- Good communication and coordination skills, internal and external teamwork skills, outstanding logical thinking skills,
4. 学习能力强，能承受较强的工作压力，能接受加班；
- Strong learning ability, able to work with pressure, and able to work overtime;
5. 英语或中文可作为工作语音；
- English or Chinese can be used as spoken language

Company Profile:
From a very humble beginning as a small roofing sheet roll former in 1997, ISI STEEL, A member of ISI GROUP, has successfully transformed itself from a family-run business into a midsize corporation leading Cambodia's steel processing industry. With modern processing facilities, world-class management systems and technology, dedicated staff and nationwide distribution networks serving our customers nationwide, ISI STEEL has become a truly reliable and respectable local brand synonymous with quality roofing and wall cladding systems and structural steel products.

This would not have been possible without the strong support of our customers, local and international business partners, our staff's dedication and hard work, and last but not least the government efforts for maintaining the political stability and sustainable economic growth. To ensure our company’s sustainable development and industry-leading position, we are committed to further invest in upgrading our manufacturing facilities, expanding our distribution network, building up our human capital, technology infrastructure, and product innovations to better meet our customer's need and expectation.

While continuing to strengthen our core capabilities in the manufacturing and distribution of quality coated steel products, we have over the years ventured into a number of related diversifications such as pre-engineering steel building fabrication, property development including industrial park, residential, offices and resorts developments, and other construction materials trading business through our subsidiary and affiliated companies to capture the opportunities in the growing economy of Cambodia.

Job Description:
To manage and direct the operation of the catering unit and sites (CPU, customer facilities, catering outlets), within timescales, budgets and within direct/ indirect headcount numbers. To provide excellent standards of service at all times to maximise client enjoyment of products and to ensure the site and its assets are safe and secure at all times.

** Key responsibilities and accountabilities
- Lead and manage all area managers and supervisors to ensure monthly / annual budget targets are met or surpassed.
- Manage monthly action plans for each manager to ensure continuous improvements are met and ensure seasonal changes are actioned
- Conduct monthly one to ones with area managers to ensure personal goals are achieved to maximise managers potential and bonus expectations. 
- Coordinate and chair monthly area managers meeting to discuss results and action plans
- Ensure customer requirements/specifications and service requirements are complied with on all customer accounts. This includes production processing, on-time performance, equipment inventory, and quality assurance controls.
- Ensure that Newrest tools (Winrest, RSE, Teams, …) are daily correctly use by all concerned persons, staff are trained, and supervise/monitor set up and deployment is in line with the Newrest Cambodia development.
- Monitor all menu plans to ensure customer satisfaction and cost of good sales are in line with the budget. 
- Support, assist and develop lean initiatives and quality initiatives to achieve operational efficiencies. 
- Monitor all training programs that are required to be conducted to ensure adherence to all Newrest policies and procedures.
- Support and ensure compliance to all customer, internal and external audit requirements.
- Maintain customer communication to ensure all requests, investigations, and or related issues are concluded to the satisfaction of the customer and Newrest standards.
- Ensures the security of the facility by monitoring and maintaining existing protocols.  
- Promote and drive Continuous Improvements.
- Drive to meet business objectives and goals set.
- Be both analytical and business minded to compile effective business plans and solutions
- Prioritise workloads to ensure duties are carried out in a timely manner
- Work on own initiative working at pace and with a high level of accuracy
- Operational awareness, understand of HACCP, COSHH, DDA, Food Hygiene, Health and Safety requirements.
Job Requirement:
** Skills and Knowledge
- Minimum 5 years’ experience in catering 
- Strong interpersonal skills and the ability to interact effectively with multiple departments and customers.
- Demonstration of strong but calm approach to management of staff and subordinates in all areas.
- Act in a Democratic Management style, taking on board others ideas and working to the end goal / target
- Excellent written and oral communication skills in English.

** Work Related Circumstances
Must be flexible and able and willing to work extra hours and weekends, bank holidays and evenings when required to meet seasonal, event and visitor demands. Consider shift start and finish times and transport links to sites. 

** Essential Requirements 
Complete all relevant paperwork within specified standards and timeframes.  Ensure all specified training HACCP, ISO, and food safety standards are adhered to at all times. Complete any other duties as requested by the country manager.
Contact Info: Contact Information HR Department   092 333 150 / 098 666 986 / 097 666 0424 kh-hr@newrest.eu #07, street 380, BKK1, Phnom Penh. 092 333 150 / 098 666 986 / 097 666 0424
