job title: Assistant Manager, IT Security and Governance
position: Assistant Manager, IT Security and Governance
Job Description:
Job Summary:
This role is responsible for protecting Bank’s computers, systems, networks, and data against cyber-attacks and security breaches. She/he shall be responsible for establishing and maintaining the bank’s vision, strategy, and program to ensure information assets and technologies are adequately protected.  The role is to manage the governance, planning, and risk management functions and ensures appropriate policies and controls are in place for effective service delivery.
Job Responsibilities:
•	Develop, implement and monitor a strategic, comprehensive enterprise information security and IT risk management program.
•	Develop and enhance an information security management framework.
•	Understand and interact with related parties to ensure the consistent application of policies and standards across all technology projects, systems, and services.
•	Provide leadership to the enterprise's information security function.
•	Partner with business stakeholders across the company to raise security awareness.
•	Security operations: Real-time analysis of immediate threats, and triage when something goes wrong.
•	Cyber risk and cyber intelligence: Keeping abreast of developing security threats, and helping the board understand potential security problems that might arise from acquisitions or other big business moves.
•	Data loss and fraud prevention
•	Rolling out security hardware and software and making sure IT and network infrastructure are designed with best security practices in mind.
•	Identity and access management: Ensuring that only authorized people have access to restricted data and systems.
•	Investigations and forensics: Determining what went wrong in a breach, dealing with those responsible if they are internal, and planning to avoid repeats of the same crisis.
•	Ensure and Monitor effective implementations of the information security policies and procedures.
•	Coordinate/Work effectively in the Internal Audit program with the Auditors.
•	Communicate the governance activities, policies, and decisions with the IT Management and Business Leadership and keep them informed of IT governance decisions that will affect IT services and projects.
•	Release Management: In conjunction with application and infrastructure teams, track configuration items and maintain technical documentation control.
•	Change Requests: Ensuring that change requests are correctly administered, documented, maintained, and coordinated in a timely fashion.
•	Change Management calendar: Establish and maintain a Change calendar, keeping Production informed of the forward schedule of work and managing the release of changes to the Production environment.
•	Incident reporting: Maintain up-to-date and accurate records of the incident and problem resolution activities.
Job Requirement:
Job Requirements:
•	Relevant certification e.g. CISO, NIST, and COBIT 
•	Bachelor’s Degree in Information Technology, Computer Science, or other related equivalence
•	Experience in the Bank industry at least 5+ years
•	Experience 3+ as a person responsible for information security
•	Experience with information security framework e.g., ISO20000 and ISO27001
•	Knowledge of security and governance frameworks
•	Demonstrate strong strategic thinking, analytical, and leadership skills.
•	Strong problem-solving skills, with the ability to influence others.
•	Demonstrable strategic thinking, analytical and problem-solving skills, and detail-oriented.
•	Leadership skills, conflict resolution, and well organizing tasks.

job title: នាយកអប់រំសិក្សាធិការភាសាខ្មែរ
position: នាយកអប់រំសិក្សាធិការភាសាខ្មែរ
Job Description:
ល់ការដឹកនាំបំផុសគំនិត និងកំណត់គោលបំណង សម្រាប់បុគ្គលិក និងសិស្សានុសិស្ស។
•	ធ្វើការជាមួយឪពុកម្តាយសិស្ស និងគណៈគ្រប់គ្រងសាលា ដើម្បីបង្កើនការចូលរួមរបស់ពួកគាត់នៅសាលារៀនយើង និងការអភិវឌ្ឍធនធានសម្រាប់សាលារៀន។
•	បន្តការអនុវត្តន៍ផែនការអភិវឌ្ឍន៍ ដើម្បីធានាឲ្យមានការរីកចម្រើនជាបន្តបន្ទាប់ដល់សាលារៀន។
•	ត្រួតពិនិត្យ និងវាយតំលៃការអនុវត្តរបស់សាលារៀន និងឆ្លើយតប និងធ្វើរបាយការណ៍ ជូននាយិកាគរុកោសល្យ និងនាយកប្រតិបតិ្ត សាលា តាមតម្រូវការ។ 
•	ត្រៀបចំរបាយការណ៍សង្ខេបនូវលទ្ធផល ហើយបកស្រាយនាពេលប្រជុំផ្នែកគរុកោសល្យ បន្ទាប់ពី ការប្រឡងនីមួយៗ។ 
•	ធានាថា គោលដៅ និងការអនុវត្តរបស់សាលារៀនពឹងផ្អែកលើតម្រូវការថ្នាក់ជាតិ ថ្នាក់តំបន់ និងការសិក្សាអប់រំ។
•	បង្កើតកាលវិភាគគោលប្រចាំឆ្នាំ សម្រាប់កម្មវិធីសិក្សា ដោយផ្អែកលើកម្មវិធីសិក្សាជាតិ ដែលចេញ ដោយក្រសួងអប់រំយុវជន  និងកីឡា។
•	ធានាថា រាល់ឯកសារទាំងអស់ត្រូវបានរៀបចំជាស្រេច តាមតម្រូវការរបស់ក្រសួងអប់រំ (ឧទាហរណ៍ សៀវភៅរដ្ឋបាល)។
•	រៀបចំការចុះអធិការកិច្ចរបស់ក្រសួង មន្ទីរ និងការិយាល័យអប់រំ បើសិនចាំបាច់។
•	ការវាយតម្លៃរបស់សិស្សានុសិស្ស
•	ផ្ទៀងផ្ទាត់ និងពិនិត្យពិន្ទុ ការចុះបញ្ជី និងរបាយការណ៍លទ្ធផលនៃការប្រឡង ដើម្បីវាយតំលៃ ការកើនឡើង  និងការរីកចំរើនរបស់សិស្ស។
•	ដឹកនាំការវាយតំលៃសិស្សានុសិស្ស។
Job Requirement:
•	សញ្ញាបត្របរិញ្ញាបត្រតាមជំនាញ/មុខវិជ្ជា ឬសញ្ញាបត្រខ្ពស់ជាងនេះ
•	វិញ្ញាបនបត្រគរុកោសល្យ(បរិញ្ញាបត្រ + ១) ដែលចេញដោយក្រសួងអប់រំយុវជននិងកីឡា ឬបរិញ្ញាបត្រជាន់ខ្ពស់ ផ្នែកអប់រំ
•	បទពិសោធន៍យ៉ាងតិចចំនួន ១០ឆ្នាំក្នុងការបង្រៀន
•	បទពិសោធន៍គ្រប់គ្រងរយៈពេល៣ឆ្នាំឡើងទៅ
•	ស្រឡាញ់ និងប្តេជ្ញាក្នុងការបង្រៀនក្មេងស្រីមានជីវភាពក្រីក្រ
•	ចេះសម្របខ្លួន និងចេះបត់បែនតាមស្ថានភាពការងារ

Company Profile:
Wing Bank (Cambodia) Plc – the bank for every Cambodian – is driven by the vision to provide every Cambodian with convenient access to financial services relevant to, and for the improvement of their daily lives.

Wing Bank has revolutionized the way Cambodians access financial services by introducing instant, secure, and convenient Mobile Financial Services since 18 August 2008.

Today, Wing Bank serves the entire Cambodian population with 100% coverage of the districts in Cambodia thanks to the innovative Wing Bank App, over 10,000 Wing Cash Xpress agents, over 55,000 merchants, and partnerships with industry giants such as Mastercard, MoneyGram, AliPay, WeChat Pay, Western Union, Visa, and Ria.

Wing Bank provides an array of advanced financial products both for individual and corporate customers. These include loans, deposits, micro savings, credit referral services, money transfers, utility and insurance payments, supply chain payments, payroll services and even phone top-ups. In addition, Wing offers retail payments via “WingPay”, and has also introduced the “WingMall” e-commerce platform.

Both small and large companies alike are now using Wing’s payroll and disbursement services, speeding up their payments. Over 80% of Wing’s agents and 50% of customers are women, making Wing a shining example of gender inclusion in the region.

Wing Bank is committed to providing financial, gender and digital inclusion to the unbanked and the under-banked, allowing every Cambodian to enjoy convenience and security when it comes to financial services
Contact Info: Contact Information HR Department   078 988 290 / 078 989 509 / 078 989 114 jobs@wingbank.com.kh No. 721, Preah Monivong Blvd., Sangkat Beung Keng Kang 3, Khan Chamkar Mon, Phnom Penh, Cambodia 078 988 290 / 078 989 509 / 078 989 114

Company Profile: AIA Cambodia is guided by our Purpose to help Cambodians live Healthier, Longer, Better lives. Since commencing business in 2017, we’ve become the first life insurer to provide coverage on 26 critical illnesses. As among the Kingdom’s leading insurers, AIA Cambodia today offers market-leading life solutions for all walks of life ranging from tailor-made crucial coverage plans that include critical illnesses, accidents, hospital allowances and overseas emergency assistance.AIA Cambodia has strived to make a significant, positive impact for our customers and communities. As we look to the future, this commitment is reinforced by our Purpose: to help millions of people live Healthier, Longer, Better Lives. Our Purpose guides the decisions we make and the actions we take as an organization — empowering and enabling people to understand and manage their health, while meeting their long-term savings and protection needs. Helping create a healthier Asia is one of the most important and valuable things we can do for our communities, today and tomorrow.AIA Cambodia is the only Cambodian life insurer awarded HR Asia’s “Best Companies to Work for in Asia” for three consecutive years, in 2020, 2021 and 2022. Headquartered in Phnom Penh, the company currently has branches in Siem Reap, Kampot, Kampong Cham and Battambang.
Contact Info: Contact Information HR Department   070 949 111 kh.careers@aia.com  12th Floor, Exchange Square, Street 106-61  ,Sangkat Wat Phnom, Khan Daun Penh, Phnom Penh, Cambodia 070 949 111

Job Description:

Job Description:
- Gather and analyze data/information from different sources for preliminary audit assessment under the guidance of senior auditor/supervisor to identify potential risks to the audit mission by macro process at provincial level.

- Conduct audit testing on operational and financial transactions in branch offices and interview clients to evaluate the design and implementation of internal controls by entities.

- Collect sufficient and appropriate audit evidence on specific macro processes under the supervision of the senior operational auditor or supervisor to rate the quality of internal controls for those macro processes.

- Follow up, during the audit mission, previous audit recommendations by entities (provincial offices, branches and mini-branches) to assess whether auditees have actioned recommendations and to classify the status of each recommendation.

- Consolidate the findings of assigned auditing tasks, including root causes and recommendations, in a working paper and submit to the senior operational auditor or supervisor to ensure the complete and accurate recording of identified breakdowns in internal controls.
Job Requirement:
- Degree in Business Administration or related fields.

- Minimum 1 year experience in auditing or related field.

- Experience in auditing, accounting, internal control and compliance checking.

- Willing to travel to other provinces.

- Good computer literacy.

- Good verbal and written communication in both English and Khmer.

Job Description:
** Job Overview
Come work at KDSH Engineering Co., Ltd., one of the leading local drilling companies in our industry in the country. We are looking to hire two experienced Construction Project
Managers to manage the workload of our existing teams at various construction sites. If you're excited to be part of a winning team, KDSH Engineering Co., Ltd. is an excellent
company for you. Make your next career move with us. If you love procedures, processes, and organizations and are looking for a challenging opportunity, we are the right place for you and you are the right candidate for us.

** Responsibilities
● Oversee construction projects from beginning to end
● Manage the budget and estimate costs
● Determine the necessary equipment, materials, and manpower needed
● Keep track of inventory, tools and equipment
● Ensure supplies and equipment are ordered and delivered according to schedule
● Prepare reports regarding job status
● Resolve any problems that may arise
● Ensure compliance with safety regulations and building codes
● Evaluate risks
● Train and mentor construction workers and construction laborers depending on the size of the project
● Collaborate with suppliers, subcontractors, engineers, architects and key team
members of the project team
● When applicable, assist management team in negotiating with external vendors on contract agreements
● Obtain the appropriate permits and licenses from authorities for construction sites
● Plan construction operations
● Ensure all deadlines are met
● Hire contractors and staff including construction laborers
● Delegate responsibilities
● Allocate and manage resources to ensure that they are available when they are needed throughout the construction projects
● Keep all stakeholders aware of the progress on projects and prepare progress reports regularly
● Handle any environmental or local community issues that may come up during a project
● Conduct site checks to monitor progress and quality standards
Job Requirement:
● BSc/BA degree in Architecture, Building Science, Engineering, Construction Management, or another related field
● PMP or an equivalent certification would be considered an asset
● Extensive previous work experience managing teams, projects, and budgets for construction projects
● Excellent knowledge of construction materials and equipment
● Highly organized
● Previous experience in a leadership role with strong and proven leadership skills
● Knowledge of MS Office Suite and open to learn new project management tools
● Previous work experience in construction management or another similar role
● Understanding of construction management processes
● Able to plan ahead
● Familiar with construction and project management software programs
● Excellent knowledge of relevant rules and regulations as well as quality standards and human resources
● Conflict resolution and conflict management experience
● Excellent time management ability
● Able to multitask with a strong understanding of core manager duties
● Excellent communication skills and interpersonal abilities, including negotiation skills

Job Description:
** Job Overview
Come work at KDSH Engineering Co., Ltd., one of the leading local drilling companies in our industry in the country. We are looking to hire an experienced Finance Manager to lead our existing team. If you're excited to be part of a winning team, KDSH Engineering Co., Ltd. is an excellent company for you. Make your next career move with us. If you are looking for a challenging opportunity to make changes to an organization and to transform the construction industry, then you are the right candidate.

** Responsibilities for Finance Manager
● Direct report to the CEO, the General Manager, and the Board of Directors
● Monitor the day-to-day financial operations within the company (payroll, invoicing, account payable, account receivable, and other transactions)
● Prepare monthly and quarterly management reporting
● Participate in strategic data analysis, research, and modeling for senior company leadership
● Support project analysis, validation of plans, and ad-hoc requests
● Manage the company's financial accounting, monitoring, and reporting systems
● Ensure compliance with accounting policies and regulatory requirements
Job Requirement:
● Bachelor's degree in Finance or Accounting; CPA a plus
● 5-8 years of experience in accounting and/or financial analysis
● Ability to synthesize large quantities of complex data into actionable information
● Ability to work and effectively communicate with senior-level business partners
● Excellent business judgment, analytical, and decision-making skills
● Knowledge of financial reporting and data mining tools such as SQL, Access, etc.
● Strong demonstrated use of Excel, Word, and PowerPoint
● Experience using or knowledge of an accounting software (such as QuickBook, Xero) is a great asset

Job Description:
- Ensure that production goals are met our expectation of the actual plan
- Plans with her/his team the production, anticipates problems, and suggests corrective actions.
- Implement in full of manufacturing and practice
- Maintain a normal production output and good cooperation with Quality control department
- Identify and implement creative and innovative ideas to get the sustainable business
- Adheres to security procedures and set the example for her/his team to follow and must be responsible for accurate completion.
- Act as a coach, mentor-motivator of his/her team. This means being actively involved in the performance management process by having the communication goals and values, giving feedback continuously (both positive and constructive), listen, show empathy, organize corrective actions and training, assess performance in an objective way with Communication for individual and team goals with values.
- Managing the training done by his team leaders with key effectiveness areas by setting, monitoring, and reviewing Performance and taking corrective action, as necessary.
- Be an active participant in the production with colleagues, and management team and act as a production team member by pointing out quality/ (production issues), attending meetings, making suggestions to improve output control with regards to the logistics planning of the factory to make sure that production is balanced
- Communicate to preparation/Laurelton cooperated partners by making sure discrepancy estimation are worked closely to HSE team to prevent accidents and injuries in the production floor and others with understand the lean manufacturing related to 6’s rule and SOP (Standard Operation Procedures).
Job Requirement:
- Bachelor’s Degree
- 10+ years of production management operations in middle or senior management role handling team of supervisors and workers
- Good understanding of flow of production processes and working with support teams like Quality, Finance, HR, IT , Admin etc.
- Excellent team work and communication skills.
- Good spoken English and basic English writing ability.
- 5 years’ experience with manufacturing or Global Company.
- Previous leadership experience manufacturing and good at English communication and computer skills
- Strong problem solving/people management skill working in diverse group and complexity environment.
- Strong communication and negotiation from bottom up.
- Self-confidence, respected, high integrity
- Excellent teamwork and Proficient in evaluation on technology
- Good at presentation skill and production data analytical skill
- Previous experience with performance management and good at statistical skills.

** How to apply

job title: អ្នកបើកបរ​ (រថយន្តដឹកប្រេង)
position: អ្នកបើកបរ​ (រថយន្តដឹកប្រេង)
Job Description:
	តួនាទី នឹងការទទួលខុសត្រូវសំខាន់ៗ 
•	បើកបរថយន្តដឹកប្រេងនៅភ្នំពេញ និងទៅខេត្តផ្សេងៗ 
•	ដាក់ និងដឹកជញ្ជូនទំនិញ (ប្រេងម៉ាស៊ូត និងសាំង) 
•	ពិនិត្យយានយន្តដោយប្រើសៀវភៅកំណត់ហេតុ 
•	រៀបចំយានយន្តសំរាប់ការដាក់ប្រេងអោយទាន់ពេលវេលា។ 
•	ដឹកជញ្ជូនប្រេងទៅកាន់គោលដៅដែលបានកំណត់ឲ្យមានប្រសិទ្ធភាព 
•	មើលការខុសត្រូវ និងបំពេញកំណត់ហេតុ និងរបាយការណ៍ នៃការដឹកជញ្ជូនទាន់ពេលវេលា ចំងាយក្នុងការដឹក ចំនួនប្រេងដែលចំណាយ និងរបាយការណ៍ជួសជុល ផ្សេងៗ 
•	ពិនិត្យយានយន្តមុនពេលដាក់ប្រេង (ប្រើសៀវភៅកំណត់ហេតុ) 
•	អនុវត្តតាមនីតិវិធីនៃការដាក់ប្រេង នឹងការទម្លាក់ប្រេង។ 
•	រក្សាភាពស្អាតរបស់យានយន្ត និងទុកសម្ភារៈសុវត្តិភាពឲ្យមានសុវត្តិភាព និងត្រឹមត្រូវតាមកន្លែង។
•	លាង និង ពិនិត្យយានយន្តមុនពេលប្រគល់ឲ្យអ្នកបើកបរបន្ទាប់ 
•	មើលការខុសត្រូវការថែទាំ និងជួសជុល យាន្តយន្ត និងរ៉ឺម៉ក និងប្រាកដថាដំណើរការបានល្អតាមនីតិវិធីសុវត្ថិភាព 
•	ធ្វើឲ្យមានសុវត្តិភាពក្នុងការដាក់ប្រេងនិងធ្វើការត្រួតពិនិត្យ 
•	រក្សាឯកសារចាំបាច់ទាំងអស់ឲ្យបានត្រឹមត្រូវនៅក្នុងឡាន (ធានារ៉ាប់រង ឆៀក នឹងឆៀកអាជីវកម្មរថយន្ត កាតគយប្រចាំឆ្នាំ។
•	អនុវត្តតាមបទបញ្ញាត្តិរបស់ឃ្លាំងផ្ទុកប្រេង រឺ ទំនិញ ។ 
•	រាយការណ័ទៅអ្នកគ្រប់គ្រងការដឹកជញ្ជូនប្រសិនបើមានអ្វីខុសប្លែកពីធម្មតាទាក់ទងនឹងប្រតិបត្តិការណ និងគ្រោះថ្នាក់។ 
•	ធ្វើតាមបទបញ្ញត្តិរបស់ក្រុមហ៊ុន……។ 
•	ចូលរួមក្នុងកិច្ចប្រជុំ និងវគ្គបណ្តុះបណ្តាលដែលរៀបចំដោយថ្នាក់ដឹកនាំ។
Job Requirement:
	លក្ខណសម្បត្តិបេក្ខជន
•	យ៉ាងតិចរៀនចប់ថ្នាក់ទី ១២ 
•	មានសញ្ជាតិខ្មែរ និង មាន អត្តសញ្ញាណប័ណ្ណកម្ពុជា 
•	មានអាជ្ញាប័ណ្ណបើកបរ រឺប័ណ្ណបើកបរប្រភេទ ងគ (CE) 
•	មានសៀវភៅគ្រួសារ រឺសៀវភៅស្នាក់នៅ 
•	អាចអាននឹងសរសេរភាសាខ្មែរបាន 
•	ចេះភាសាផ្សេងៗទៀតគឺជាគុណប្រយោជន៏មួយ 
•	លិខិតបញ្ជាក់ឥរិយាបថ 
•	កំណត់ហេតុព្រហ្មទណ្ឌ (ត្រូវបានអនុវត្ត) 
•	លិខិតបញ្ជាក់ឪនភាពនៃចក្ខុវិស័យ (ការពិនិត្យភ្នែក) 
•	មានបទពិសោធន៏យ៉ាងហោចណាស់២ឆ្នាំ នៅក្នុងការប្រើឡានដឹកប្រេងឥន្ធន: នឺងឡានដឹកប្រេងហើយមានអាយុចាប់ពី២៥ទៅ៥០ឆ្នាំ។ 
•	មានឆន្ទះ និងភាពស្មោះត្រង់ ក្នុងការធ្វើការ
Company Profile:
RMA entered the Cambodian market in 1992 as an exclusive provider of dedicated system solutions for commercial and non-commercial enterprises in the sectors of infrastructure, energy and logistics. Gradually, the company has been growing alongside the development of Cambodia and expanded to automotive, agricultural and heavy equipment, warehouse solutions, financial services, car rental and food franchise management.  In addition to business expansion, RMA Cambodia has also focused its attention on human resources by providing internships and employment opportunities to approximately 2,000 local and professional staff with a number of expatriates working together to share their skills and expertise.

RMA Cambodia has also been very active within local communities. We consistently work with local authorities and organizations to provide financial and technical assistance in essential key sectors, such as health, environment, education and sports.

We aim to help Cambodia grow and prosper.

OUR SERVICES AND PRODUCTS:

RMA Cambodia and its affiliate Asia Vehicle Rental (AVR) are offering franchised car rental services through the global brand AVIS. Rentals are customized with brand-new Ford vehicles and experienced English-speaking chauffeurs. AVIS also offers car rental and leasing that meets all types of customers requirements for business trips, leisure or field work, with or without chauffeurs.

RMA Cambodia has a financing arm, RMA Financial Services, offers financing solutions to flexibly meet the needs of corporate and retail customers for the purchase of their own automotive and heavy equipment, agricultural machinery and warehouse solution equipment.

RMA Cambodia is also a provider of heavy equipment products and solutions in construction, road building and maintenance, and agriculture, namely JCB, Mitsubishi FUSO and John Deere. RMA Cambodia is an agent for the world’s leading brands in these industries.
Contact Info: Contact Information Bunthoeun Keo (Mr.)  088 222 8261 | 016-061 698 602 recruitment.kh@rmagroup.net #27, St. 134, SangkatMittapheap, Khan 7 Makara, Phnom Penh 088 222 8261 | 016-061 698 602

Company Profile:
Cambodia Beverage Company Ltd (CBC) referred too locally as Coca-Cola Cambodia is a leading manufacturer & distributor of non-alcoholic ready to drink (NARTD) beverages throughout Cambodia. With our state-of-the-art bottling plant (commissioned in 2016) situated within PPSEZ, one of the leading Economic Zones in Phnom Penh.

The company produces 16 different beverages, under 8 brands, and within 5 different NARTD categories (Sparkling, Tea, Energy, Water, and Isotonic) which is supplied to our customers throughout the Kingdom.
CBC directly employs more than 850 staff while creating indirect employment opportunities for another 8,000+ staff across the Kingdom.

We are proud that >99.7% of our workforce are Cambodian nationals and that >31% of our staff are female, with women making up 37% of the senior management team. We are committed to increasing our female diversity and are targeting to have 50% female staff by 2030.
We are committed to integrating sustainability into everything we do.

By 2030 we aim to collect and recycle a bottle or can for each one we sell by 2030 and use at least 50% recycled material in our packaging.
We are committed to return to nature and communities 100%+ of the water we use in our drinks and their production. We are working to increase water security where we operate, source ingredients, and touch people's lives.

Job Description:
** Purchasing activities
- Establish and administer purchasing standards which meet company purchasing procedures and policies.
- Plan, organize, control, manage and evaluate the work of the Purchasing Department; establish operational plans and initiatives to meet department goals and objectives to achieve cost efficiency and effectiveness.
- Develop annual Budget plan and LRP plan for purchasing in alignment with production volume and headcount.
- Developing and monitoring performance measures against the annual operating budget and other departmental KPIs.
- Direct the development of formal enquiries, Request for Quote/Qualification, Request for Information and Request for Proposal; ensures all applicable legal and contractual provisions are met; participate in the evaluation of quotations received and take necessary decisions as per policies. Perform or assist others in the performance of price/cost analysis; negotiate contract provisions; prepare specifications as required
- Determine appropriate contracts for various types of procurement; review requisitions/purchase orders and related documents for completeness, accuracy and compliance with department and company procedures and requirements; review invoices and other documentation for compliance; resolve disputed invoices.
- Analyze purchasing activities and develop good negotiation strategies and processes to ensure cost effectiveness and recommend policy and procedure for improvements.
- Analysis of lead time and overall supply chain procurement costs. Optimize freight cost.
- Ensure quality of supply – quantity and quality.
- Manage vendor selection process and ensure business conduct policy adherence by all suppliers.
- Monitor payments and approve as appropriate.
- Conduct supplier audits, as necessary.

** Stores management activities
- Ensure timely deliveries of Technical supplies, consumables, Capital equipment and other material through effective stores management.
- Analyze stores stocks, Minimum order level, safety stock, and slow-moving items and take appropriate corrective actions for the efficient usage of the stock.
- Develop good mechanism and coordination process and metric between stores, purchase, and other user department to avoid
shortages and overstock.
- Establish proper controls for receipt, storage, and issuance of the material for accuracy and report variances.
- Coordinate the storage, repurpose and disposal of surplus materials, capital equipment’s and other equipment’s with required documentation and agreements
- Ensure 6S deployment in Stores, loading bay and scrap areas.
- Establish proper controls on safety and specially the controls to store and handle hazardous chemicals and gases in partnership with EHS function.
- Coordinate the storage, repurpose and disposal of surplus materials/red tag items, capital equipment’s and other equipment’s with required documentation and agreements

** Import and export activities
- Ensure the import export section if functioning correctly and that all orders are placed in a timely manner
- Work with dept. managers and imp/exp. officer to ensure procurement plans are in place and up to date
- Liaise with customs as necessary
- Coordinate with Antwerp, Pelham, and shipping agencies for Diamond shipments. Administer diamond receipt and shipment
procedures in partnership with other stakeholders.
- Coordinate with Melee consolidation, grading department for receipt of diamonds to plant and shipment to Pelham.
- Manage KPC Process with local govt. Ministry. (Commerce ministry)
- Ensure master lists are submitted and up to date
- Liaise with shipping agents

** General management
- Work with finance to ensure all finance department requirements are fulfilled
- Drive technology improvement projects for effective stores management.
- Alternative vendor development
- Identifying procurement risks and risk mitigation strategy.
- Work closely with project Manager, engineering manager and other departmental managers and provide purchasing support on key capital projects.
- Work closely with LDV purchasing team for benchmarking and common initiatives and projects.
- Identifying opportunities of improvement in purchasing processes, Technology, and development of people to meet the plant growth 

** Lead, Coach and Training; Communication
- Champion and coach the team on company values, initiatives.
- Plan and evaluate the performance of assigned staff; establish performance measures and personal development goals; monitor performance; provide coaching to staff for improvement and development
- Identify training needs of the staff for skill improvement and partner with HR for training plan.
- Ensure effective and transparent communication within and with other departments through formal and informal communication.

** Improvements and participation in Company Initiative.
- Lead TiPS initiative in department and deploy TiPS elements such as 6S, daily accountability.
- Coach and guide team on change management and usage of IDEAS platform.
- Create safety, 6S Culture.
- Use SCM initiatives to optimize stores inventory

** Compliance
- Manage compliance and internal audit activities as directed
- Ensure all departments are in compliance with purchasing policy and regulations
- Read, interpret, and explain local or import-export regulations, policies, procedures and specifications; maintain accurate records and files which meet the Tiffany /Laurelton internal audit requirements.
Job Requirement:
- University degree
- Strong background in purchasing and vendor management
- Defining problems; establishing facts and drawing valid conclusions.
- Managing situations requiring fairness, firmness, and sound judgment.
- Reading, understanding, interpreting and applying local, laws and regulations
- Regarding procurement and contracts.
- Analyzing procurement methods relative to current and future needs.
- Effectively resolving complex contract, procurement, and obsolete inventory issues.
- Establishing and maintaining cooperative working relationships with department heads & managers, supervisors, employees, vendors, suppliers, contractors.
- Excellent management and coaching skills
- Excellent communicator
- Excellent spoken and good written English Language ability.
- Excellent spoken and written Khmer Language ability
- Proficient computer skills in MS Office and Excels
- Ability to maintain confidentiality
- Exposure to NAVSISION or any other procurement software
- Strong background in audit, compliance and development of policy and procedure
- Prior experience working for international company
- 5 years’ experience in similar position
- Experience managing stores

** How to apply
Become a member of our Laurelton Team and you will be rewarded with a competitive salary and benefits package and the opportunity to contribute to a dynamic and exciting organization. To be considered for the above position(s), please submit your resume/CV and cover letter to careers.cambodia@laureltondiamonds.com

Job Description: Job Description• Work with the design team to fully understand the shop drawings and production drawings• Ensure that all the MEP confirmed drawings are accompanied with detailed list of MEP material specifications, for instance, functional design, sizes and shapes• Ensure that the MEP engineers responsible for building know the MEP drawing that assigned to them with absolute clarity with all the details and particularity and peculiarity accounted for• Assist site MEP engineers and MEP foremen with technical advice and administrative support• Ensure strict and correct translation of MEP drawings into construction on site• Work in close collaboration with MEP foremen to ensure the correct installation of re-bars and form work in strict compliance with the MEP Material installation methods• Organize and conduct project meetings for critical MEP activities• Assist the MEP engineers in their coordination and relation with the subcontractors and vendors• Collaborate with the procurement team for periodical review and update of the material order plan to ensure effective purchase order of MEP material• Intervene when there are conflicts between MEP engineers and subcontractors or vendors• Coordinate vendors’ work to ensure smooth site work progress and ensure that no one team’s work is held up by other teams• Supervise the sub-contractors’ and venders’ work to ensure order and safety at the construction site• Maintain staff’s performance by counseling and disciplining via planning, monitoring, and appraising job results• Advise/steer the company toward new construction technology• Advise the company on key construction personnel selection• Advise the procurement team of potential MEP material suppliers
Job Requirement: • Bachelor's Degree in Electrical or Mechanical Engineering• Minimum 3 years of experience in designing MEP services of Building construction.• Good understanding of MEP Building construction• Good knowledge of Cambodian building code• Knowledge of MEP Design and drawing• Strong analytical skills• Strong sense of urgency and accuracy• Attention to details• Strong communication and people skills
Company Profile: Since its founding in 1982, Chip Mong has focused extensively on the changing needs of the society and the strengthening of its relationships with business communities, both domestically and internationally. In recent years, Chip Mong has experienced tremendous growth and evolved into one of the largest groups of companies in the country, comprising seven wholly-owned subsidies, three joint-ventures, and two hotel projects. Chip Mong’s businesses include construction and materials, consumers goods, property development, beverages, general industrials, hospitality, retail and feed. The Company also offers a vast array of consumer products from well-known manufacturers throughout the region.

job title: Service Advisor ( Chinese is Prefer) Urgent
position: Service Advisor ( Chinese is Prefer) Urgent
Job Description:
Job Description

•	Greeting customers and Answering questions about service outcomes and scheduling and booking appointments, vehicle drop-off, and vehicle pick-up.
•	Consulting with Service Technician regarding necessary repairs and possible alternatives to expensive repairs.
•	Providing customers with information and advice on warranty protections.
•	Calling customers to advise them about service changes or car pick-up times.
•	Maintaining positive customer relationships to ensure repeat business.
•	Ensuring all details on services rendered and costs are related to customers and processing their payments.
•	Liaising with service technicians about parts ordering and ensuring parts are available when needed.
•	 Handling customer complaints and ensure all filing is kept up to date
•	Ensure method of payment is clarified.
•	Other task will be assigned by Head of Department or GM.
Job Requirement:
Job Requirements
- At least 2 year in hospitality and business sector.
- Basic automotive knowledge and experience in this field.
- Has experience Customer Relation is an advantage.
- Good command in communicating in English, Chinese is a plus
- Must hold a valid Cambodia driving license.
- Have excellent communication skills, as well as an aptitude and great attitude to lean and develop.

Job Description:
Job description

Responsibilities:
•	Diagnose and perform vehicle maintenance and repairs according guidelines
•	Inform Service Adviser of vehicle maintenance/repair requirements and assist in the development of an effective customer consultation
•	Inform Tower/Dispatch when repairs are finished and ensure that repair stories are complete, well written and include a properly documented complaint, cause and correction story
•	Check and verify parts before installation Assist in general housekeeping of the workshop
•	Strictly communicate with leader for support to prevent conducting unreliable jobs
•	Well inform to Service Advisors before starting to conduct additional repair jobs
•	Fully support Service Advisors when conducting promotional campaign
•	Keep up-to-dates on the latest technical information such as technical service bulletins
•	Perform other task as assigned by Leader/Manager
•	Maintain tools and equipment in good condition and cleanliness
Job Requirement:
Requirements:
•	High school diploma and/or post-secondary diploma/degree in Automotive Repairs and Technical School or other related fields
•	Team player, initiative, friendly, fresh and service oriented 
•	Good teamwork and communication with stakeholders
•	Be able to understand the repair manual or technical tip in English
•	A minimum of 3 years’ experience as a Technician (or including apprenticeship)
•	In depth knowledge of and background in technical diagnosis and repair as well as electrical systems.
•	European car product knowledge.
•	Exceptional customer service skills with the desire to exceed expectations
•	Strong written and oral communication skills
•	Ability to write a story clearly and concisely
•	Ability to meet tight deadlines with attention to detail
•	Analytical, decision making and problem solving skills
•	Strong organizational and prioritization skills with the ability to multitask
•	Highly self-motivated, committed team-player with the desire to learn
•	Willing to learn as a part of further personal development

Job Description:
Job Description

•	Complete knowledge about the vehicles features, specifications must able to produce the catalog when the customer asked for it.

•	You have to be aware of all the new vehicle inclusions and also complete knowledge about the models available in the inventory. 
•	explain the customers with benefits sometimes compare two models and help them derive the best choice.
•	Ability to understand the client requirements and provide solutions based on their requirement as you need to explain about the features of certain vehicles that suits customer needs.

•	Effectively communicate the quotes through proper communication channels such as emails.
•	Follow up with the customers who have visited the showroom.Helping them in doing the Test drive of the vehicles and help them understand the benefits and features of that particular vehicle
•	Ability to create sales through giving quality information that matches the needs of the customers.
•	Must be knowledgeable in knowing all the dealership sales process.
• Visiting outside potential prospects and sell brand new vehicle to meet set target
• Building good brand image of the company and product in the market
• Reporting on current market situation and competitor's activities
• Attending team meeting and contributing to team effort by accomplishing related results as needed
• Reviewing own sales performance, aiming to meet or exceed targets
• Maintaining and developing relationship with existing customers via meeting, telephone call and email
• Reporting / planning by weekly and monthly which assigned by supervisor or manager
• Other tasks assigned by manager.
Job Requirement:
Job Requirements
• Bachelor Degree of Business administration or related fields
• Both males & female
• 1-2 years’ experiences in sales field or 1 year experience in Automotive Industry
• Knowledgeable about cars accessories and specifications
• Good command in English communication, Chinese is an advantage
• Be able to use Microsoft word & Excel and Microsoft Outlook
• Easy-going, humble and Friendly

Company Profile: Pour un Sourire d’ Enfant (PSE) or For a Child’s Smile is a non-profit organization and founded by Christian and Marie-France des Pallières, was established since 1995 in Cambodia. PSE’s mission is to help the most marginalised and debrided children escape from destitution and lead them to decent, skilled and well remunerated jobs. PSE has six main programmes adapted to the needs of the children, those programmes include: food, health, protection, education and schooling, vocational training, and helping families. PSE help children more than 6,500 and 3000 families. We are operating in Phnom Penh, Sihanouk Ville and Siem Reap.
Contact Info: Contact Information Recruitment Team Technical Manager 093617555 recruitment@pse.ngo No. 402, Trea village, Sangkat Steung Meanchey, Khan Meanchey, Phnom Penh 093617555

Job Description:
** IMPORT GENERAL GOODS
- Prepare import master list and submit to customs and CDC for approval
- Work closely with purchase manager/ purchasing team to import material, equipment as required time frame
- Check import documents Invoice, Packing List, AWB against import master list
- Keep track of goods delivery and update to purchasing manager/ team
- Contact carrier & forward doc. for proceeding of customs formalities.
- Follow up until the goods arrive in factory
- Get those import document expenses and submit to finance team
- Prepare reports, statistics, and records by the end of the month, etc.
- Prepare import cut stock and submit to CDC for certificate of compliance
- Make sure the import and export as compliance local regulation

** IMPORT/EXPORT:
- Liaise with overseas partners to determine quantities and shipping dates
- Arrange paperwork and formalities for the import/export of product by cooperate with customs
- Prepare document for clearance and KPC (Kimberly Process Certificate)
- Check and arrange export process formalities are fully complied with their partners to arrange transportation and necessary paperwork to customs for approval for items to export
- Pack the goods and Issue Invoice, packing list, other related docs (contact with forwarder for shipping cost) send to director for approval and follow up until the goods arrive destination
- Prepare reports export as monthly basis by filling document and make the report to supervisor or manager
- Prepare weekly internal invoice

** INTERNAL TRANSFER
- Work closely with concerned department to get details packing list for internal transfer
- Discuss with concerned department for transfer schedule
- Make sure the transfer as agreed schedule
- Sent internal transfer document to oversee finance team for approval
- Make track of rough import and export process
- Prepare monthly report for ministry of commerce
- Prepare monthly records and report to department manager
- Other duties as assigned by direct superior or upper management
- Prepare document for internal transfer
Job Requirement:
- Colleague’s graduate
- Experience of Imp/ Exp and customs formalities with clear procedures
- Strong Communication and interpersonal skills
- Good Attitude, responsible and result oriented
- Good English and computer literate
- Experience working with foreign companies

Company Profile:
Cambodia Beverage Company Ltd (CBC) referred too locally as Coca-Cola Cambodia is a leading manufacturer & distributor of non-alcoholic ready to drink (NARTD) beverages throughout Cambodia. With our state-of-the-art bottling plant (commissioned in 2016) situated within PPSEZ, one of the leading Economic Zones in Phnom Penh.

The company produces 16 different beverages, under 8 brands, and within 5 different NARTD categories (Sparkling, Tea, Energy, Water, and Isotonic) which is supplied to our customers throughout the Kingdom.
CBC directly employs more than 850 staff while creating indirect employment opportunities for another 8,000+ staff across the Kingdom.

We are proud that >99.7% of our workforce are Cambodian nationals and that >31% of our staff are female, with women making up 37% of the senior management team. We are committed to increasing our female diversity and are targeting to have 50% female staff by 2030.
We are committed to integrating sustainability into everything we do.

By 2030 we aim to collect and recycle a bottle or can for each one we sell by 2030 and use at least 50% recycled material in our packaging.
We are committed to return to nature and communities 100%+ of the water we use in our drinks and their production. We are working to increase water security where we operate, source ingredients, and touch people's lives.

Job Description: - Conduct financial, business, operational, strategic, and compliance audits under minimal direction/supervision.    - Ensure successful completion of audits, from start to finish, inclusive of planning, fieldwork, and reporting activities.    - Assist in developing annual audit plan and audit program.    - Document audit work in an organized, accurate, and concise manner, clearly supporting the identified findings and conclusions reached in the audits performed.    - Prepare audit report including making recommendations that mitigate risk/control deficiencies and add value.    - Follow up with the auditee to ensure that audit recommendations have been effectively implemented.    - Identify opportunities to:     + Enhance current audit methodologies and recommend improvements to the audit process/activities.     + Improve, streamline, reinvent audit activities through data analytics or automation.     + implement continuous monitoring and auditing procedures.    - Assist in special ad-hoc reviews, fraud investigations, and other special projects.    - Able to express audit results as quantifiable outcomes, in financial terms where possible.    - Able to not just test for compliance, but also strategic risks to the company.
Job Requirement: - Bachelors' degree with major in Computer Science, MIS, or equivalent education. Big 4 experience is a strong merit.    - A minimum of at least 2 years of audit experience is required.    - Knowledge of the International Professional Practices Framework (IPPF), COSO Framework, data analytics (in an audit environment), and audit management software will be an added advantage.    - Excellent delivery and project management skills, e.g. managing own time, prioritizing audits appropriately, and ensuring deadlines and objectives are met. Promptly communicates ahead of time any potential problems that would prevent timely completion of the audit.    - Possess good judgment, strong ethical values/integrity and is able to maintain independence and standards of professionalism.    - Highly inquisitive, has a keen eye for details, a good listener, and the maturity to appreciate the sensitivity of each audit.    - Excellent verbal and written communication skills, and confident in engaging with all levels of company management including the Board Audit Committee.    - Ability to initiate, build, and maintain effective relationships with the auditee and across Axiata Group to achieve results. Comfortable working in a team environment and independently.    - Champions change continuous improvement and innovation and support others in the pursuit of these.

Job Description: - Develop and maintain vulnerability management standards, processes, and guidelines    - Develop and maintained vulnerability assessment and pen testing calendar    - Perform vulnerability assessment and pen testing (IT/Telco network, operating system, database, and mobile application)    - Analyse vulnerabilities assessment results, recommend remediation and mitigation strategies    - Performing forensic and analyse incident investigation    - Identify false positives and risk acceptance candidates    - Clearly understand and communicate risks associated with vulnerabilities    - Perform Red Team adversary simulation activities, applying attacker tools, tactics, and procedures in a safe and controlled manner.    - Conduct logical security audits and hands-on technical security evaluations    - Develop subject matter expertise in focused areas of security    - Implement and manage tools (SIEM, SOC, CDP, EDR, PAM/PIM, Nessus, Metaplot, Nexpose, …)    - Maintaining, coordination and evaluation incident management via SOC/EDR between SOC/EDR vendor and incident response owner for the remediation    - Develop and maintaining up to date remediation tracking of incident identified via SOC    - Develop deliverable reporting on vulnerability remediation progress.    - Conduct research on current vulnerabilities and exploits using publicly available, trusted resources and other finished vulnerability products

job title: Training Manager, Partnership Distribution (1 Year Contract)
position: Training Manager, Partnership Distribution (1 Year Contract)
Job Description: 1.Support in recruiting and developing training executive(s).  2. Develop training material including the contents, activities and schedule that are suited to all levels of management.3. Ensure the training budget is spent efficiently and effectively.4. Review existing training materials from time to time to ensure adequacy.5. Ensure all sales staff meets regulatory requirements (internal & external).6. Monitor training effectiveness and give feedback to the management/team in order to improve training delivery. 7. Develop training needs analysis to determine possible new or refresher training. 8. Work with financial institution partners, brokers and digital channels to determine training needs of the sales staff. 9. Ensure training activities are well tracked and training reports are accurately produced. 10. Develop sales tools that are useful for all the partnership distribution channels.11. Build good business partnership relationship with PD management, regional sales managers, bancassurance life planners, and distribution partners (financial institutions, brokers, digital channels).

Education & Experience

• At least 3 years of working experience training and development, preferably in financial or insurance industry
• Sales experience will be an advantage

Specific Skills (knowledge, skills and competencies/abilities)
• Knowledge of life insurance industry will be an advantage
• Proficient communications skills to effectively explain policies with partnership distribution force and internal stakeholders
• Good presentation skills
• People relationship skills
• People motivation skills
• English proficiency 
• Able to use email, internet and computer
Company Profile: AIA Cambodia is guided by our Purpose to help Cambodians live Healthier, Longer, Better lives. Since commencing business in 2017, we’ve become the first life insurer to provide coverage on 26 critical illnesses. As among the Kingdom’s leading insurers, AIA Cambodia today offers market-leading life solutions for all walks of life ranging from tailor-made crucial coverage plans that include critical illnesses, accidents, hospital allowances and overseas emergency assistance.AIA Cambodia has strived to make a significant, positive impact for our customers and communities. As we look to the future, this commitment is reinforced by our Purpose: to help millions of people live Healthier, Longer, Better Lives. Our Purpose guides the decisions we make and the actions we take as an organization — empowering and enabling people to understand and manage their health, while meeting their long-term savings and protection needs. Helping create a healthier Asia is one of the most important and valuable things we can do for our communities, today and tomorrow.AIA Cambodia is the only Cambodian life insurer awarded HR Asia’s “Best Companies to Work for in Asia” for three consecutive years, in 2020, 2021 and 2022. Headquartered in Phnom Penh, the company currently has branches in Siem Reap, Kampot, Kampong Cham and Battambang.

Company Profile: ចាប់តាំងពីចុងឆ្នាំ២០០៤ មក រាជរដ្ឋាភិបាលកម្ពុជាដោយមានក្រសួងសេដ្ឋកិច្ចនិងហិរញ្ញវត្ថុជាសេនាធិការ បានចាប់អនុវត្តកម្មវិធីកែទម្រង់ការគ្រប់គ្រងហិរញ្ញវត្ថុសាធារណៈជាជំហានៗ មានរយៈពេលវែងដែលមានគោលបំណងកែលម្អប្រព័ន្ធគ្រប់គ្រងហិរញ្ញវត្ថុសាធារណៈរបស់កម្ពុជាឆ្ពោះទៅរកស្តង់ដារអន្តរជាតិ។ ការអនុវត្តកម្មវិធីនេះបានទទួលជោគជ័យជាបន្តបន្ទាប់ ហើយបច្ចុប្បន្នកំពុងបន្តអនុវត្តកម្មវិធីកែទម្រង់ការគ្រប់គ្រងហិរញ្ញវត្ថុសាធារណៈដំណាក់កាលទី៣។ អគ្គលេខាធិការដ្ឋានគណៈកម្មាធិការដឹកនាំការងារកែទម្រង់ការគ្រប់គ្រងហិរញ្ញវត្ថុសាធារណៈ គឺជាសេនាធិការរបស់គណៈកម្មាធិការដឹកនាំការងារកែទម្រង់ការគ្រប់គ្រងហិរញ្ញវត្ថុសាធារណៈនៃក្រសួងសេដ្ឋកិច្ចនិងហិរញ្ញវត្ថុ មានមុខងារ និងភារកិច្ចសម្របសម្រួលការរៀបចំ និងការអនុវត្តការងារ គោលនយោបាយសេដ្ឋកិច្ចនិងហិរញ្ញវត្ថុ ព្រមទាំងសម្របសម្រួលការរៀបចំ និងការអនុវត្តកម្មវិធីកែទម្រង់ការគ្រប់គ្រងហិរញ្ញវត្ថុ សាធារណៈ។ ដោយមានចក្ខុវិស័យច្បាស់លាស់ និងក្នុងនាមជាសេនាធិការប្រកបដោយគុណភាព ស័ក្ដិសិទ្ធិភាព និងប្រសិទ្ធភាព អគ្គលេខាធិការដ្ឋានត្រូវការចាំបាច់នូវមន្ត្រីបម្រើការងារមួយចំនួនដែលមានសមត្ថភាព មានជំនាញ និងមានបទពិសោធន៍សមស្របតាមការងារនីមួយៗ។

Job Description: -Coordinate with the commercial admin team to understand all promotions programs, receive all proposal claims, and ensure check properly before settlement to our customers. - Coordinate with commercial admin team to clarify and understand new promotion proposal before the official announcement- Prepare actual expense vs budgets for Sale & Marketing division, production, and administrative departments- Perform management reporting for financial analysis and forecast project revenue and expenses- Check new promotion or champion, propose to align with budgets according to the company guidelines - Check promotional reimbursement from distributors following guidelines and approval proposal- Generate and compare report from system vs DMS system before releasing gratis claim to manager review - Highlight and investigate overclaims or duplicate claim from distributors and report to the manager - Keep promotions document with a proper filling and structuring- Submit a report to the manager for approval and record into system timely with proper GL, cost center, and descriptions- Compare actual claim vs accrued expense to ensure all the promotion is on track and manageable - Prepare weekly, monthly, quarterly, and annual departmental expense reports- Analyze budgeting and accounting reports of each department and enforce expenditure controls

job title: AC Technician / ជាងម៉ាស៊ីនត្រជាក់
company_name: ក្រុមហ៊ុន ម៉េងលី ជេ. គួច អេឌ្យូខេសិន (Mengly J. Quach Education)
position: AC Technician / ជាងម៉ាស៊ីនត្រជាក់
Job Description:
Scope of Work / ទំហំការងារ:
- ត្រួតពិនិត្យ ជួសជុលថែទំា និងដំឡើងថ្មី ម៉ាស៊ីនត្រជាក់ គ្រប់អគារទំាងអស់។
- រៀបចំដំណើរការ ផែនការ ការងារ និងអនុវត្តការងារឱ្យមានប្រសិទ្ធិភាព។
- អនុវត្តផែនការ ដែលប្រធានផ្នែកដាក់ឱ្យ ឱ្យបាន១០០ភាគរយ។

KEY RESPONSIBILITIES / ការទទួលខុសត្រូវសំខាន់ៗ

1. ទទួលខុសត្រូវលើការថែទំា ជួសជុល និងដំឡើងថ្មី ម៉ាស៊ីនត្រជាក់ តាមអគារនីមួយៗ ឱ្យស្របតាមតម្រូវការ និងមានដំណើរការល្អ។
2. ទទួលបណ្ណស្នើសុំពីផ្នែកផ្សេងៗសិក្សា និងដោះស្រាយការងារគម្រោងនីមួយៗ ឱ្យទាន់ពេលវេលា។
3. រៀបចំផែនការណ៍ការងារក្នុងក្រុមធ្វើប្រចាំថ្ងៃ។
4. រាល់សកម្មភាពការងារ នៅពេលចាប់ផ្តើមការងារ និងបន្ទាប់ពីបញ្ចប់ការងារត្រូវថតរបាយការណ៍ផ្ញើមកប្រធានផ្នែកផ្ទាល់ នៅក្នុងក្រុមតេលេក្រាម (13. Maintenance Unit) ។
5. ទទួលខុសត្រូវលើកាសិក្សាគម្រោងការងារឱ្យមាន គុណភាព តម្លៃសមរម្យ សោភ័ណ្ឌភាព។
6. ទទួលខុសត្រូវលើការសហការ ការងារជាមួយជាងខាងក្រៅពេលមានការងារពុំអាចធ្វើបាន ឬបន្ទាន់ច្រើន។
7. ទទួលខុសត្រូវរៀបចំរបាយការណ៍ ការងារគម្រោងតាមបណ្ណស្នើសុំ ភ្ជាប់ជាមួយនិងបណ្ណការងារ។
8. ទទួលខុសត្រូវលើសម្ភារដែលបើកចេញពីស្តុក និងសម្ភារអ្នកស្នើសុំដាក់ទិញ ពេលយកទៅប្រើប្រាស់ក្នុងគម្រោងការងារ បើមានការបាត់បង់ ឬមិនបានកត់ត្រាចូលក្នុងរបាយការណ៍បណ្ណការងារ។
9.ទទួលខុសត្រូវផ្ទៀងផ្ទាត់របាយការណ៍សម្ភារបើកចេញពីស្តុកជាមួយ និងបណ្ណការងារស្នើសុំបើកសម្ភាររៀងរាល់ចុងខែ។
10. ទទួលខុសត្រូវការងារខ្លួនឯងពី ចាប់ផ្ដើម រហូតដល់បញ្ចប់ការងារ។
11. ចូលរួមសហការ ការងារជាមួយបុគ្គលិកក្នុងផ្នែកទាំងអស់រាល់សកម្មភាពការងារប្រចាំថ្ងៃ។
12. បង្កើតនៅគំនិតថ្មីៗ ដែលជួយសម្រួលទៅដល់ការងារនៅក្នុងផ្នែកឱ្យដំណើរការបានល្អប្រសើរ។
13. ជួយសម្របសម្រួលការងារទូទៅមួយចំនួនជំនួសប្រធានផ្នែក។ 
14. ត្រួតពិនិត្យឃ្លាំងសម្ភារ ជាមួយអ្នកគ្រប់គ្រងសន្និធិ ដើម្បីទិញសម្ភារចូលស្តុកប្រចាំខែ។ 
15. ត្រួតពិនិត្យបញ្ជីឧបករណ៍ ក្នុងផ្នែកមួយ ជាមួយអ្នកគ្រប់គ្រងស្តុក។
16. ទទួលខុសត្រូវការថែរក្សាឧបករណ៍ ដែលសាលាបើកឱ្យប្រើប្រាស់។ 
17. ទទួលការងារពីប្រធានផ្នែក។

** បញ្ជាក់៖
1. ត្រូវប្រកាន់ខ្ជាប់នូវអត្តចរិកការងារមួយចំនួនដូចជា មានក្រមសីលធម៌វិជ្ជាជីវៈ មានភាពស្មោះត្រង់ ការងារត្រូវធ្វើឱ្យទាន់ពេលកំណត់ ប្រើពាក្យសម្ដីឱ្យបានសមរម្យ ម៉ឺងម៉ាត់ហ្មត់ចត់ មិនលម្អៀង រួសរាយរាក់ទាក់ និងរហ័សរហួន ឧស្សាហ៍ព្យាយាម  មិនបង្អូសបន្លាយ ឬកេងប្រវ័ញ្ចកិបកេងពេលវេលា ហាមគេចវេសការងារ មានចិត្តចេះសហការគ្នា ចេះសន្សំសំចៃ  និងមានទំនួលខុសត្រូវខ្ពស់ក្នុងការងារ និងត្រូវមើលបញ្ហា ឱ្យឃើញជាបញ្ហា។
2. ធ្វើការងារដោយគោរពទៅតាមគោលការណ៍ដែលក្រុមហ៊ុនបានចែង។
3. ការចេញពីទីតាំងការងារដោយគ្មានការអនុញ្ញាត ពីប្រធានផ្នែកត្រូវបញ្ឃប់ពីការងារ។
4. ត្រូវមានសៀវភៅឬឯកសារកត់ត្រា រាល់មានការប្រជុំ ឬពេលមានការងារពីថ្នាក់លើដាក់ឱ្យ។
5. ពេលបំពេញការងារ ត្រូវមានសម្ភារបួនប្រភេទ សម្ភារការពារ សម្ភារការពារសុវត្ថិភាព សម្ភារធ្វើ និងសម្ភារសម្រាប់សម្អាត។
6. ចេះចែករំលែករាល់ព័ត៌មានថ្មីៗ ដែលបានទទួលទៅឱ្យបុគ្គលិកនៅក្នុងផ្នែកទាំងអស់បានដឹង។
Job Requirement:
** EDUCATION / ការសិក្សា:
- បញ្ចប់បរិញ្ញាបត្រ ឯកទេស ម៉ាស៊ីនត្រជាក់ និងពាក់ព័ន្ធ
KNOWLEDGE, SKILLS AND EXPERIENCE / ចំណេះដឹង ជំនាញ និងបទពិសោធន៍:
- មានអាយុចាប់ពី ២៥ឆ្នាំ ដល់ ៥០ឆ្នាំ។
- មានបទពិសោធន៍រយៈពេល ០៣ឆ្នាំឡើងទៅ។
- អាចប្រើប្រាស់កម្មវិធី Ms Word, Excel, PowerPoint ,Email។ 
- ធ្លាប់ទទួលបានការបណ្តុះបណ្តាលទាក់ទងជំនាញបច្ចេកទេស និងមានឯកសារដែលទទួលស្គាល់។
- អាចបត់បែនតាមពេលវេលា ម៉ោងធ្វើការរបស់ក្រុមហ៊ុន ការងារមិនមានដែនកំណត់។
- មានការព្យាយាម និងភាពអត់ធ្មត់ក្នុងការងារ។ 
- មានភាពរួសរាយរាក់ទាក់ និងទំនាក់ទំនងល្អ។ 
- មានភាពស្មោះត្រង់ និងការទទួលខុសត្រូវខ្ពស់ក្នុងការងារ។
- ការដំឡើងកន្ទុយម៉ាស៊ីនត្រជាក់ (ត្រូវសិក្សាពីទីតាំងខ្យល់ចេញចូលម៉ាស៊ីន)។
- ការថ្លឹងម៉ែត្រទឹកឱ្យបានត្រឹមត្រូវ។
- ការរៀបចំប្រអប់ទុយោហ្គែន។
- ការប្រើប្រាស់ទុយោស្ពាន់ត្រឹមត្រូវតាមស្តង់ដារបស់ម៉ាស៊ីនត្រជាក់។
- គុណភាពជួសជុល។
- ការងារលាងសម្អាតម៉ាស៊ីនត្រជាក់។
- ការងារមុនដំឡើងម៉ាស៊ីនត្រជាក់ (ត្រូវមានរៀបចំសម្ភារជាគម្រោងទុកមុន)។
- ការងារបិទរុន្ធជញ្ជាំង។
- ការដោះដូរទីតាំងម៉ាស៊ីនត្រជាក់។
- ការប្រើប្រាស់ឧបករណ៍តាមបទដ្ឋានបច្ចេកទេសឱ្យបានត្រឹមត្រូវ។
- ការងារធ្វើតាមប្លង់ដែលប្រធានផ្នែកដាក់ឱ្យ។
- ការប៉ាន់ស្មានសម្ភារមុនពេលធ្វើគម្រោងការងារអ្វីមួយ។
- ការងារធ្វើតែមួយដង។
- ការគ្រប់គ្រងគម្រោងមួយ
Company Profile:
Mengly J. Quach Education (MJQE) is known as a unique education system for its superior quality, discipline and services. It is remarkably consistent with the use creative, innovative, and critical thinking to make a difference for our young generations. We are always optimistic that our standard system will surly provide the best education for our kids and help shape their life to act with respect towards themselves.

MJQE is in a restructuring period of change. MJQE focuses its efforts to ensure all students have the academic and personal skills required to succeed in college and life. Currently, MJQE is one of the 4 companies in the MJQ Group (MJQ Education, Prasethpheap Finance, MJQ Travel and the Mengly J. Quach Media Network (MMN)). MJQ Education has 4 school-companies (Aii Language Center (Aii), American Intercon School (AIS), Go Overseas Study Overseas (SOGO) and i-Learn). There are 7 campuses of Aii and 8 campuses of AIS throughout Cambodia serving more than 17,000 students with more than 500,000 alumni since 2005. 

The MJQE is committed to building talented and committed students and providing the appropriate supports to schools to ensure all students can be successful.

MJQE is an Equal Opportunity Employer. MJQE ensures equal employment opportunities regardless of race, creed, sex, color, national origin, religion, age, sexual orientation, disability, citizenship status, political affiliation, marital status or other human differences. MJQE has a policy of active recruitment of qualified minority employees.
Our Benefits:
Competitive salary 
- Scholarship for employee, employee's children, and spouse 
- NSSF and 24 - hour worldwide accident insurance 
- Maternity, paternity, and marriage benefits
- Benefits as compliance to Prakas of Ministry of Labor and Vocational Training 
- Career advancement opportunities 
- Training opportunities for professional development 
- Annual salary increment based on experience and performance review.
Contact Info: Contact Information HR Department   012 797 939 hr@mjqeducation.edu.kh #11A, St. 402, Sangkat Tumnup Teuk, Khan Boeung Keng Kang, Phnom Penh. 012 797 939

job title: Electrician / ជាងអគ្គិសនី
company_name: ក្រុមហ៊ុន ម៉េងលី ជេ. គួច អេឌ្យូខេសិន (Mengly J. Quach Education)
position: Electrician / ជាងអគ្គិសនី
Job Description:
Overall Purpose of the Role / គោលបំណងរួមនៃតួនាទី: 
- ទំនួលខុសត្រូវលើដំណើរការ ការងារទូទៅផ្នែកអគ្គិសនី នៃផ្នែកថែទំា។

Scope of Work / ទំហំការងារ:
- ត្រួតពិនិត្យថែទំាជួសជុលគ្រឿងបរិក្ខារអគ្គិសនី ទូភ្លើង  រៀបចំប្រព័ន្ធថ្មីបន្ថែម គ្រប់អគារទំាងអស់។
- រៀបចំដំណើរការ ផែនការ ការងារ និងអនុវត្តការងារឱ្យមានប្រសិទ្ធិភាពខ្ពស់។
- អនុវត្តផែនការ ដែលប្រធានផ្នែក ឬប្រធានក្រុមដាក់ឱ្យ ឱ្យបាន១០០ ភាគរយ។

KEY RESPONSIBILITIES / ការទទួលខុសត្រូវសំខាន់ៗ

1. ទទួលការងារពីប្រធានផ្នែក ឬប្រធានក្រុមលើការត្រួតពិនិត្យថែទំា ជួសជុលសម្ភារ ឧបករណ៍ គ្រឿងបរិក្ខារអគ្គិសនី និងរៀបចំប្រព័ន្ធថ្មីបន្ថែមតាមអគារនីមួយៗ ឱ្យស្របតាមស្តង់ដាបទដ្ឋានបច្ចេកទេស និងមានដំណើរការល្អ។
2. ទទួលបណ្ណស្នើសុំពីផ្នែកផ្សេងៗ សិក្សា និងដោះស្រាយការងារគម្រោងនីមួយៗឱ្យទាន់ពេលវេលា។
3. រៀបចំផែនការណ៍ការងារក្នុងក្រុមធ្វើប្រចាំថ្ងៃ។
4. រាល់សកម្មភាពការងារ នៅពេលចាប់ផ្តើមការងារ និងបន្ទាប់ពីបញ្ចប់ការងារត្រូវថតរបាយការណ៍ផ្ញើមកប្រធាន
ផ្នែកផ្ទាល់ នៅក្នុងក្រុមតេលេក្រាម (13. Maintenance Unit) ។
5. ទទួលខុសត្រូវលើកាសិក្សាគម្រោងការងារឱ្យមាន គុណភាព តម្លៃសមរម្យ សោភ័ណ្ឌភាព។
6. ទទួលខុសត្រូវលើការសហការ ការងារជាមួយជាងខាងក្រៅពេលមានការងារពុំអាចធ្វើបាន ឬបន្ទាន់ច្រើន។
7. ទទួលខុសត្រូវរៀបចំរបាយការណ៍ ការងារគម្រោងតាមបណ្ណស្នើសុំ ភ្ជាប់ជាមួយ និងបណ្ណការងារ។
8.ទទួលខុសត្រូវលើការអនុវត្តការងារតាម Check List នៅតាមអគារ។ 
9. ទទួលខុសត្រូវលើសម្ភារដែលបើកចេញពីស្តុក និងសម្ភារអ្នកស្នើសុំដាក់ទិញ ពេលយកទៅប្រើប្រាស់ក្នុងគម្រោងការងារ បើមានការបាត់បង់ ឬមិនបានកត់ត្រាចូលក្នុងរបាយការណ៍បណ្ណការងារ។
10. ទទួលខុសត្រូវផ្ទៀងផ្ទាត់របាយការណ៍សម្ភារបើកចេញពីស្តុកជាមួយ និងបណ្ណការងារស្នើសុំបើកសម្ភាររៀងរាល់ចុងខែ។
11. ទទួលខុសត្រូវការងារខ្លួនឯងពីចាប់ផ្ដើម រហូតដល់បញ្ចប់ការងារ។
12. ចូលរួមសហការ ការងារជាមួយបុគ្គលិកក្នុងផ្នែកទាំងអស់រាល់សកម្មភាពការងារប្រចាំថ្ងៃ។
13. បង្កើតនៅគំនិតថ្មីៗ ដែលជួយសម្រួលទៅដល់ការងារនៅក្នុងផ្នែកឱ្យដំណើរការបានល្អប្រសើរ។
14. ត្រួតពិនិត្យឃ្លាំងសម្ភារ ជាមួយអ្នកគ្រប់គ្រងសន្និធិ ដើម្បីទិញសម្ភារចូលស្តុកប្រចាំខែ។ 
15. ត្រួតពិនិត្យបញ្ជីឧបករណ៍ក្នុងផ្នែក ជាមួយអ្នកគ្រប់គ្រងស្តុក។
16. ទទួលខុសត្រូវការថែរក្សាឧបករណ៍ ដែលសាលាបើកឱ្យប្រើប្រាស់។ 
17. ទទួលការងារពីប្រធានផ្នែក។

** បញ្ជាក់៖
1. ត្រូវប្រកាន់ខ្ជាប់នូវអត្តចរិកការងារមួយចំនួនដូចជា មានក្រមសីលធម៌វិជ្ជាជីវៈ មានភាពស្មោះត្រង់ ការងារត្រូវធ្វើឱ្យទាន់ពេលកំណត់ ប្រើពាក្យសម្ដីឱ្យបានសមរម្យ ម៉ឺងម៉ាត់ហ្មត់ចត់ មិនលម្អៀង រួសរាយរាក់ទាក់ និងរហ័សរហួន ឧស្សាហ៍ព្យាយាម  មិនបង្អូសបន្លាយ ឬកេងប្រវ័ញ្ចកិបកេងពេលវេលា ហាមគេចវេសការងារ មានចិត្តចេះសហការគ្នា ចេះសន្សំសំចៃ  និងមានទំនួលខុសត្រូវខ្ពស់ក្នុងការងារ និងត្រូវមើលបញ្ហា ឱ្យឃើញជាបញ្ហា។
2. រាល់បញ្ជីត្រួតពិនិត្យ (Check List) ទាំងអស់ត្រូវត្រួតពិនិត្យឱ្យបានហ្មត់ចត់មុនពេលផ្ញើ របាយការណ៍ ព្រោះអ្នកនឹងទទួលខុសត្រូវលើបញ្ហាដែលកើតមានឡើងដោយការធ្វេសប្រហែស។ ករណីថ្នាក់លើ និងផ្នែក CCTV ត្រួតពិនិត្យឃើញថាការអនុវត្តការងារត្រួតពិនិត្យបញ្ជីត្រួតពិនិត្យ (Check List) មានករណីខុសប្រក្រតី ក្លែងបន្លំឯកសារដោយគ្រាន់តែគូសសញ្ញា  ឬ  ហើយផ្ញើរបាយការណ៍ដោយមិនបានដើរត្រួតពិនិត្យ៖
•	លើកទី០១   ព្រមានជាលាយលក្ខណ៍អក្សរ និងផាកពិន័យ $ ២៥។
•	លើកទី០២   ព្រមានជាលាយលក្ខណ៍អក្សរលើកចុងក្រោយ និងផាកពិន័យ  $ ៥០។
•	លើកទី០៣  ព្យួរការងារ និងផាកពិន័យ  $ ១០០។
•	លើកទី០៤  បញ្ឈប់ពីការងារ។  
3. ធ្វើការងារដោយគោរពទៅតាមគោលការណ៍ដែលក្រុមហ៊ុនបានចែង។
4. ការចេញពីទីតាំងការងារដោយគ្មានការអនុញ្ញាត ពីប្រធានផ្នែកត្រូវបញ្ឈប់ពីការងារ។
5. ត្រូវមានសៀវភៅ ឬឯកសារកត់ត្រា រាល់មានការប្រជុំ ឬពេលមានការងារពីថ្នាក់លើដាក់ឱ្យ។
6. ពេលបំពេញការងារ ត្រូវមានសម្ភារបួនប្រភេទ សម្ភារការពារ សម្ភារការពារសុវត្ថិភាព សម្ភារធ្វើ និងសម្ភារ
សម្អាត។
7. ចេះចែករំលែករាល់ព័ត៌មានថ្មីៗ ដែលបានទទួលទៅឱ្យបុគ្គលិកនៅក្នុងផ្នែកទាំងអស់បានដឹង។
Job Requirement:
EDUCATION / ការសិក្សា:
- បញ្ចប់បរិញ្ញាបត្រ ឯកទេស អគ្គិសនី និងពាក់ព័ន្ធ
KNOWLEDGE, SKILLS AND EXPERIENCE / ចំណេះដឹង ជំនាញ និងបទពិសោធន៍:
- មានអាយុចាប់ពី ២៥ឆ្នាំ ដល់ ៥០ឆ្នាំ។
- មានបទពិសោធន៍រយៈពេល ០២ឆ្នាំឡើងទៅ។
- ធ្លាប់ទទួលបានការបណ្តុះបណ្តាលទាក់ទងជំនាញបច្ចេកទេស និងមានឯកសារដែលទទួលស្គាល់។
- អាចបត់បែនតាមពេលវេលា ម៉ោងធ្វើការរបស់ក្រុមហ៊ុន ការងារមិនមានដែនកំណត់។
- មានការព្យាយាម និងភាពអត់ធ្មត់ក្នុងការងារ។ 
- មានភាពរួសរាយរាក់ទាក់ និងទំនាក់ទំនងល្អ។ 
- មានភាពស្មោះត្រង់ និងការទទួលខុសត្រូវខ្ពស់ក្នុងការងារ។
- ការប្រើប្រាស់ឧបករណ៍អគ្គិសនីតាមបទដ្ឋានបច្ចេកទេស។
- គុណភាពការជួសជុលប្រព័ន្ធភ្លើង។
- គុណភាព និងសោភ័ណ្ឌការដំឡើងប្រព័ន្ធភ្លើង។
- ការប្រើប្រាស់ប្រអប់ភ្លើងឱ្យបានត្រឹមត្រូវជាមួយខ្សែភ្លើង។
- គុណភាព និងសោភ័ណ្ឌភាពការរត់ប្រអប់ភ្លើង។
- សមត្ថភាពក្នុងការដោះស្រាយពេលភ្លើងមានបញ្ហា។
- ការប្រើប្រាស់ខ្សែភ្លើង ឱ្យត្រូវជាមួយបន្ទុកភ្លើងទៅតាមស្តង់ដាបច្ចេកទេស។
- ការមើលឃើញចំណុចគ្រោះថ្នាក់មុនពេលកើតឡើង។
- ការងារត្រូវធ្វើតាមប្លង់ដែលប្រធានផ្នែកដាក់ជូនឱ្យ។
- ការប៉ាន់ស្មានសម្ភារមុនពេលធ្វើគម្រោងការងារអ្វីមួយ។
- ការងារធ្វើតែមួយដង។
- ការគ្រប់គ្រងគម្រោងការងារមួយត្រូវមានភាពច្បាស់លាស់។
- ត្រូវរៀបចំសណ្តាប់ធ្នាប់ពេលបំពេញការងារ និងក្រោយពេលធ្វើរួច។
- ការពារសុវត្ថិភាពក្នុងពេលបំពេញការងារ។
Company Profile:
Mengly J. Quach Education (MJQE) is known as a unique education system for its superior quality, discipline and services. It is remarkably consistent with the use creative, innovative, and critical thinking to make a difference for our young generations. We are always optimistic that our standard system will surly provide the best education for our kids and help shape their life to act with respect towards themselves.

MJQE is in a restructuring period of change. MJQE focuses its efforts to ensure all students have the academic and personal skills required to succeed in college and life. Currently, MJQE is one of the 4 companies in the MJQ Group (MJQ Education, Prasethpheap Finance, MJQ Travel and the Mengly J. Quach Media Network (MMN)). MJQ Education has 4 school-companies (Aii Language Center (Aii), American Intercon School (AIS), Go Overseas Study Overseas (SOGO) and i-Learn). There are 7 campuses of Aii and 8 campuses of AIS throughout Cambodia serving more than 17,000 students with more than 500,000 alumni since 2005. 

The MJQE is committed to building talented and committed students and providing the appropriate supports to schools to ensure all students can be successful.

MJQE is an Equal Opportunity Employer. MJQE ensures equal employment opportunities regardless of race, creed, sex, color, national origin, religion, age, sexual orientation, disability, citizenship status, political affiliation, marital status or other human differences. MJQE has a policy of active recruitment of qualified minority employees.
Our Benefits:
Competitive salary 
- Scholarship for employee, employee's children, and spouse 
- NSSF and 24 - hour worldwide accident insurance 
- Maternity, paternity, and marriage benefits
- Benefits as compliance to Prakas of Ministry of Labor and Vocational Training 
- Career advancement opportunities 
- Training opportunities for professional development 
- Annual salary increment based on experience and performance review.

job title: Mechanic ជាងម៉ាស៊ីនភ្លើង
company_name: ក្រុមហ៊ុន ម៉េងលី ជេ. គួច អេឌ្យូខេសិន (Mengly J. Quach Education)
position: Mechanic ជាងម៉ាស៊ីនភ្លើង
Job Description:
Overall Purpose of the Role / គោលបំណងរួមនៃតួនាទី: 
- ទំនួលខុសត្រូវលើដំណើរការ ការងារទូទៅផ្នែកម៉ាស៊ីនភ្លើង នៃផ្នែកថែទាំ 
Scope of Work / ទំហំការងារ:
- ត្រួតពិនិត្យ ជួសជុលថែទំា ម៉ាស៊ីនភ្លើង និងប្រព័ន្ធភ្លើង។
- រៀបចំដំណើរការ ផែនការ ការងារ និងអនុវត្តការងារឱ្យមានប្រសិទ្ធិភាពខ្ពស់។
- អនុវត្តផែនការដែលប្រធានផ្នែកដាក់ឱ្យ ឱ្យបាន១០០ភាគរយ។
1. ទទួលខុសត្រូវលើការងារការថែទំា ជួសជុល ម៉ាស៊ីនភ្លើង និងប្រព័ន្ធភ្លើងតាមអគារនីមួយៗ។
2. ទទួលបណ្ណស្នើសុំពីផ្នែកផ្សេងៗ សិក្សានិងដោះស្រាយការងារគម្រោងនីមួយៗ ឱ្យទាន់ពេលវេលា។
3. រៀបចំផែនការណ៍ការងារក្នុងក្រុមធ្វើប្រចាំថ្ងៃ។
4. រាល់សកម្មភាពការងារនៅពេលចាប់ផ្តើមការងារ និងបន្ទាប់ពីបញ្ចប់ការងារត្រូវថតរបាយការណ៍ផ្ញើមកប្រធានផ្នែកផ្ទាល់នៅក្នុងក្រុមតេលេក្រាម (13. Maintenance Unit) ។
5. ទទួលខុសត្រូវលើកាសិក្សាគម្រោងការងារឱ្យមាន គុណភាព តម្លៃសមរម្យ សោភ័ណ្ឌភាព។
6. ទទួលខុសត្រូវលើការសហការ ការងារជាមួយជាងខាងក្រៅពេលមានការងារពុំអាចធ្វើបាន ឬបន្ទាន់ច្រើន។
7. ទទួលខុសត្រូវរៀបចំរបាយការណ៍ ការងារគម្រោងតាមបណ្ណស្នើសុំភ្ជាប់ជាមួយនិងបណ្ណការងារ។
8. ទទួលខុសត្រូវលើការអនុវត្តការងារតាម Check List នៅតាមអគារ។ 
9. ទទួលខុសត្រូវលើសម្ភារដែលបើកចេញពីស្តុក និងសម្ភារអ្នកស្នើសុំដាក់ទិញ ពេលយកទៅប្រើប្រាស់ក្នុងគម្រោងការងារ បើមានការបាត់បង់ ឬមិនបានកត់ត្រាចូលក្នុងរបាយការណ៍បណ្ណការងារ ។
10. ទទួលខុសត្រូវផ្ទៀងផ្ទាត់របាយការណ៍សម្ភារបើកចេញពីស្តុកជាមួយ និងបណ្ណការងារស្នើសុំបើកសម្ភាររៀងរាល់ចុងខែ។
11. ទទួលខុសត្រូវការងារខ្លួនឯងតាំងពីចាប់ផ្ដើម រហូតដល់បញ្ចប់ការងារ។
12. ចូលរួមសហការ ការងារជាមួយបុគ្គលិកក្នុងផ្នែកទាំងអស់រាល់សកម្មភាពការងារប្រចាំថ្ងៃ។
13. បង្កើតនៅគំនិតថ្មីៗដែលជួយសម្រួលទៅដល់ការងារនៅក្នុងផ្នែកឱ្យដំណើរការបានល្អប្រសើរ។
14. ត្រួតពិនិត្យឃ្លាំងសម្ភារ ជាមួយអ្នកគ្រប់គ្រងសន្និធិ ដើម្បីទិញសម្ភារចូលស្តុកប្រចាំខែ។ 
15. ត្រួតពិនិត្យបញ្ជីឧបករណ៍ក្នុងផ្នែកជាមួយអ្នកគ្រប់គ្រងស្តុក។
16. ទទួលខុសត្រូវការថែរក្សាឧបករណ៍ ដែលសាលាបើកឱ្យប្រើប្រាស់។ 
17. ទទួលការងារពីប្រធានផ្នែក ។

** បញ្ជាក់៖
1. ត្រូវប្រកាន់ខ្ជាប់នូវអត្តចរិកការងារមួយចំនួនដូចជា មានក្រមសីលធម៌វិជ្ជាជីវៈ មានភាពស្មោះត្រង់ ការងារត្រូវធ្វើឱ្យទាន់ពេលកំណត់ ប្រើពាក្យសម្ដីឱ្យបានសមរម្យ ម៉ឺងម៉ាត់ហ្មត់ចត់     មិនលម្អៀង រួសរាយរាក់ទាក់ និងរហ័សរហួន ឧស្សាហ៍ព្យាយាម  មិនបង្អូសបន្លាយ ឬកេងប្រវ័ញ្ចកិបកេងពេលវេលា ហាមគេចវេសការងារ មានចិត្តចេះសហការគ្នា ចេះសន្សំសំចៃ  និងមានទំនួលខុសត្រូវខ្ពស់ក្នុងការងារ និងត្រូវមើលបញ្ហា ឱ្យឃើញជាបញ្ហា។
2. រាល់បញ្ជីត្រួតពិនិត្យ (Check List) ទាំងអស់ត្រូវត្រួតពិនិត្យឱ្យបានហ្មត់ចត់មុនពេលផ្ញើ របាយការណ៍ ព្រោះអ្នកនឹងទទួលខុសត្រូវលើបញ្ហាដែលកើតមានឡើងដោយការធ្វេសប្រហែស។ ករណីថ្នាក់លើ និងផ្នែក CCTV ត្រួតពិនិត្យឃើញថាការអនុវត្តការងារត្រួតពិនិត្យបញ្ជីត្រួតពិនិត្យ (Check List) មានករណីខុសប្រក្រតី ក្លែងបន្លំឯកសារដោយគ្រាន់តែគូសសញ្ញា  ឬ  ហើយផ្ញើរបាយការណ៍ដោយមិនបានដើរត្រួតពិនិត្យ៖
•	លើកទី០១   ព្រមានជាលាយលក្ខណ៍អក្សរ និងផាកពិន័យ  $ ២៥។
•	លើកទី០២   ព្រមានជាលាយលក្ខណ៍អក្សរលើកចុងក្រោយ និងផាកពិន័យ  $ ៥០។
•	លើកទី០៣  ព្យួរការងារ និងផាកពិន័យ  $ ១០០។
•	លើកទី០៤   បញ្ឈប់ពីការងារ។  
3. ធ្វើការងារដោយគោរពទៅតាមគោលការណ៍ដែលក្រុមហ៊ុនបានចែង។
4. ការចេញពីទីតាំងការងារដោយគ្មានការអនុញ្ញាត ពីប្រធានផ្នែកត្រូវបញ្ឈប់ពីការងារ។
5. ត្រូវមានសៀវភៅ ឬឯកសារកត់ត្រា រាល់មានការប្រជុំ ឬពេលមានការងារពីថ្នាក់លើដាក់ឱ្យ។
6. ពេលបំពេញការងារ ត្រូវមានសម្ភារបួនប្រភេទ សម្ភារការពារ សម្ភារការពារសុវត្ថិភាព សម្ភារធ្វើ និងសម្ភារ
សម្អាត។
7. ចេះចែករំលែករាល់ព័ត៌មានថ្មីៗ ដែលបានទទួលទៅឱ្យបុគ្គលិកនៅក្នុងផ្នែកទាំងអស់បានដឹង។

Company Profile:
Mengly J. Quach Education (MJQE) is known as a unique education system for its superior quality, discipline and services. It is remarkably consistent with the use creative, innovative, and critical thinking to make a difference for our young generations. We are always optimistic that our standard system will surly provide the best education for our kids and help shape their life to act with respect towards themselves.

MJQE is in a restructuring period of change. MJQE focuses its efforts to ensure all students have the academic and personal skills required to succeed in college and life. Currently, MJQE is one of the 4 companies in the MJQ Group (MJQ Education, Prasethpheap Finance, MJQ Travel and the Mengly J. Quach Media Network (MMN)). MJQ Education has 4 school-companies (Aii Language Center (Aii), American Intercon School (AIS), Go Overseas Study Overseas (SOGO) and i-Learn). There are 7 campuses of Aii and 8 campuses of AIS throughout Cambodia serving more than 17,000 students with more than 500,000 alumni since 2005. 

The MJQE is committed to building talented and committed students and providing the appropriate supports to schools to ensure all students can be successful.

MJQE is an Equal Opportunity Employer. MJQE ensures equal employment opportunities regardless of race, creed, sex, color, national origin, religion, age, sexual orientation, disability, citizenship status, political affiliation, marital status or other human differences. MJQE has a policy of active recruitment of qualified minority employees.
Our Benefits:
Competitive salary 
- Scholarship for employee, employee's children, and spouse 
- NSSF and 24 - hour worldwide accident insurance 
- Maternity, paternity, and marriage benefits
- Benefits as compliance to Prakas of Ministry of Labor and Vocational Training 
- Career advancement opportunities 
- Training opportunities for professional development 
- Annual salary increment based on experience and performance review.

Job Description: - To prepare monthly Stock Order Index according to sale forecasts, actual sale and stock balance to plan for ordering; -To ensure to use the fresh forecast and stock balance when preparing the Stock Order Index; -To handle all Planning and POs and work closely with Sale Dept. as well as with Supplier; -To work closely with Inventory Controller to ensure that there is no stock run out; -To perform regularly collect monthly Rolling Forecasts from Sale Dept. and prepare Stock Order Index and 6 months Rolling Forecast; -To keep note on import licenses expiry date and its balance to ensure that the quantity order is valid to import; -To consult regularly with Shipping Coordinator related to the arrangement if needed prior to shipment each time before issuing PO; -To ensure the product is being registered and that the import license is available for the ordered products (if needed); -To ensure the related documents such as PO, Invoice and Packing List and other documents related to Inventory and ACF being passed to Inventory and ACF punctually; -To keep update and maintain filling of all POs and Shipments related docs in an appropriate folders as staffed in the SOPs; -Update Messenger Report, Temperature control report, Special record of late delivery report, Goods Inspection Reports (Receive & Return). -Data entry into Database & Solomon system correctly. -To ensure all inventory related work processes are being implemented according to the procedures stated in the SOPs; -To comply the company rule & regulation; -To Participate with Quality of Work Environment Program through KAIZEN & 5S; and -To perform other related tasks as assigned by superior.
Job Requirement: -Bachelor of Accounting or related fields -Minimum three years experience in purchasing, FIFO, inventory analysis, and demand planning  -Purchasing principles and practices -Good command in English-Inventory control and management -Shipping and receiving practices, procedures and terminology -Good communication skill -Be independent, professional, confidential and objective
Company Profile:
The Dynamic Group has been supporting Cambodia's healthcare, agriculture, quality control industries for the last 20s years. Our vision is improving Quality of Life, Shaping Better Tomorrows. With over 400 highly-qualified staffs, the Dynamic Group leads in applying global technologies and delivering value to the various communities that we are serving.

With no fewer than seven companies in its stable, the Dynamic Group brings the world’s latest technological advancements to one of the world’s fastest growing economies.

-Dynamic Scientific

Company Profile:
RMA entered the Cambodian market in 1992 as an exclusive provider of dedicated system solutions for commercial and non-commercial enterprises in the sectors of infrastructure, energy and logistics. Gradually, the company has been growing alongside the development of Cambodia and expanded to automotive, agricultural and heavy equipment, warehouse solutions, financial services, car rental and food franchise management.  In addition to business expansion, RMA Cambodia has also focused its attention on human resources by providing internships and employment opportunities to approximately 2,000 local and professional staff with a number of expatriates working together to share their skills and expertise.

RMA Cambodia has also been very active within local communities. We consistently work with local authorities and organizations to provide financial and technical assistance in essential key sectors, such as health, environment, education and sports.

We aim to help Cambodia grow and prosper.

OUR SERVICES AND PRODUCTS:

RMA Cambodia and its affiliate Asia Vehicle Rental (AVR) are offering franchised car rental services through the global brand AVIS. Rentals are customized with brand-new Ford vehicles and experienced English-speaking chauffeurs. AVIS also offers car rental and leasing that meets all types of customers requirements for business trips, leisure or field work, with or without chauffeurs.

RMA Cambodia has a financing arm, RMA Financial Services, offers financing solutions to flexibly meet the needs of corporate and retail customers for the purchase of their own automotive and heavy equipment, agricultural machinery and warehouse solution equipment.

RMA Cambodia is also a provider of heavy equipment products and solutions in construction, road building and maintenance, and agriculture, namely JCB, Mitsubishi FUSO and John Deere. RMA Cambodia is an agent for the world’s leading brands in these industries.

Job Description:
General Manager will be responsible for growing the distribution and sales segment of the business. Additionally General Manager will be responsible for financial oversight, manufacturing, operations, sales, marketing, and setting the strategic vision for the business. Additional responsibility will include, but will not be limited to:

** Job Description
- Devising and implementing business plans, and identifying new strategic opportunities to ensure long term profitability and growth of the business.
- Directing and coordinating organization's financial and budget activities to fund operations, maximize investments, and increase efficiency.
- Overseeing the fiscal activities of the organization including budgeting, reporting, and auditing.
- Developing high quality business strategies and plans ensuring their alignment with short-term and long-term objectives
- Overseeing all operations and business activities to ensure they produce the desired results and are consistent with the overall strategy and mission.
- Building trust relations with key partners, stakeholders, and act as a point of contact for important shareholders.
- Analyzing problematic situations and occurrences and providing solutions to ensure company survival and growth.
- Direct and coordinate organization's financial and budget activities to fund operations, maximize investments, and increase efficiency.
- Maintaining a deep level of knowledge of industry and markets.
- Assortment wise, handle stocks and management pieces allocation to each showroom, transfer if necessary, monitor the replenishment. 
- Handle with Clients complaint/owner request 
- Recruit/mentor coach each of department head to assist/guide them to achieve their annual KPI.
- Monitor on Annual Performance Appraisal and team productivity 
- Provide direction and guidance to employees in their assigned job duties. 
- Reporting to CFO/Chairman with strategic plan.
Job Requirement: - Degree or Master Degree in Business Management.- At least 5 years of experience in a senior leadership position (Regional Manager, General Manager, Managing Director, etc.) of a medium to large business, with full operational, and strategic responsibility.- 3-5 years progressive experience in construction industry of project management related to site projects or brand operation.- Experience in franchise/distribution model of business.- Must demonstrate strong brand awareness in building materials sector.- Clients base in similar industry.- Good knowledge of different business functions.- Strong negotiation skills- Mature with strong leadership.- Possess high level of organization skills (comprehensive tasks planning, time schedule organization, cross department meeting lead, and tight follow-up) with analytical mindset (based on business needs) and effective communication.- Good team player with proven ability to partner with both project site business leaders to define local strategies and objectives.** Interested candidates, please apply to  hr@hscdecor.com.kh or contact +(855)86 850 666 for further details. - Address: No. 18, Street 432, Sangkat Boeng Trorbek, Khan Chamkamon, Phnom Penh

There are two Showrooms that can show our product and the material and was managed by the expert manager who has many experiences.
